title: The Challenge for a Full-Speed Run
entry: Isla hints at a full-speed trial race, sparking excitement in Ami, Evelyn, and the others. A pure-speed race takes shape, and everyone lines up eagerly, ready to witness Isla’s true pace.

title: The Race Begins
entry: As everyone lines up, Care and the others prepare for a straight sprint with no obstacles. Isla and Evelyn take off, with Isla's start creating a shockwave that knocks down everyone else. By the time Evelyn reaches a quarter of the way, Isla has crossed the finish, showcasing her full speed in an awe-inspiring display.

title: Isla’s First True Effort
entry: Isla crosses the finish line, her muscles defined like never before, as everyone realizes they may have witnessed her trying at full capacity for the first time. Ami, Evelyn, Care, and the others are left in awe of her power and stamina.

title: Isla’s Endurance and Power
entry: Ami remarks on Isla’s endurance, describing how she can maintain her high speed without tiring. Isla proudly offers to take on a long-distance race next, and everyone shares an appreciation for her unmatched resilience.

title: The 50-Mile Challenge
entry: Lee suggests a solo race for Isla, noting that motorcycles wouldn’t help the others keep up. A massive 50-mile highway behind Ami’s complex is chosen, but Lee warns Isla of the danger of running next to Ami’s mile-long strides.

title: The Race Begins
entry: On Lee's signal, Isla takes off, blowing him backward. Care catches him just as Tim and Alex are pushed into Evelyn's shoe. Meanwhile, Isla and Ami race along the highway, with Isla showing unprecedented speed while dodging Ami’s strides.

title: Isla Wins the Race
entry: Isla reaches the finish first, displaying power and endurance that leave everyone in awe. Her physique is sharper and more defined, and the team realizes they may have just seen her true strength.

title: Evelyn Tests Isla’s Durability
entry: Lee suggests that Care and Evelyn test Isla’s durability. Care’s squeeze confirms Isla’s resilience, and Evelyn, applying just a '2' on her strength scale, praises Isla’s unmatched toughness.

title: Ami on the Power of Evelyn’s Strength
entry: Ami calculates that even at a '2,' Evelyn’s strength is equivalent to hundreds of billions of tons, which Isla withstands—a feat nearly impossible for any material.

title: Isla Enters the Titan Gym
entry: Lee grants Isla entry to the Titan Gym, a place even he can’t enter. Ami and Evelyn lead Isla inside, where she eagerly anticipates new training challenges, designed to push the limits of even the strongest.

title: Lee’s Tour of the Safety Zone for Isla
entry: Lee leads Isla through the safety zone, showcasing its quake-resistant floors and features designed to withstand Ami’s and Evelyn’s tremors. Isla, impressed, promises to respect the space and keep it as a true sanctuary.

title: The Evil Poker Emerges
entry: Lee adopts his 'Evil Poker' persona, playfully declaring his invincibility over the loudspeaker. Care, Isla, and Ami join in on the fun, humorously accepting his alter ego and vowing to be on the lookout for the mischievous 'Poker.'

title: Lee Pokes Isla and Runs
entry: Lee playfully pokes Isla and runs off into the safety zone, announcing his invincibility through the loudspeaker. Isla and the others laugh, enjoying his antics, with Isla vowing to keep an eye out for the 'Evil Poker' from now on.

title: Lee Learns About Care as the Secret Challenger
entry: Lee arrives at Ami’s cozy corner, where Ami teases him about a secret challenger. Lee is surprised to learn that the challenger is Care, who has been secretly part of Ami’s plan all along. They playfully discuss Care’s impressive stats, and Lee, after some nervous stalling, agrees to face her in an arm-wrestling match. Care’s immense strength becomes clear, but Lee tries creative tactics to move her arm, eventually claiming victory with clever maneuvers.

title: Lee's Backup Challengers Enter
entry: Lee calls in backup challengers—Grace, Lila, Mia, and Harper—causing excitement among the group. Ami is impressed by Lee’s strategic move, and the challengers set their own rules, adding variety and new dynamics to the matches. Harper starts the gauntlet with Care, who struggles initially but regains control. The lineup promises an epic showdown, and Lee playfully coordinates the challenges with Ami and the group.

title: Mia Defeats Care with Focus and Calm
entry: Mia challenges Care with a rule that restricts full flexing. Both hold their positions with immense strength, but Mia’s calm focus prevails as she slowly overpowers Care. Despite Care breaking the rule and flexing, Mia still wins, impressing everyone with her control and patience. The group acknowledges Mia’s victory, and Care agrees to follow the rules more strictly moving forward.

title: Lila's Strength Overwhelms the Team
entry: Lila faces Care with a rule that only arm strength is allowed, leading to a competitive match where Lila’s strength shines. Care, Tim, Alex, Isla, Harper, and Mia team up to push Lila’s arm, but she resists them all effortlessly, showcasing her titanic power. With one last flex, Lila drives their hands down and wins, earning admiration and respect from the group for her unbeatable strength.

title: Introducing Grace's Challenge with Care
entry: Lee introduces Grace, mentioning her family connection to Evelyn and her remarkable strength. Grace’s previous feats, including overpowering Ami, make everyone cautious and respectful. Grace sets her own challenge: Care must stay on the table while Grace’s flexing bicep takes up more space. Care struggles but manages to hang on with determination, only slipping off at the last second. The group marvels at Grace’s immense power and control.

title: Titanic Damage Stories and New Titanium Reinforcement
entry: Lee shows Grace the reinforced room, explaining past incidents where Ami, Isla, and Evelyn’s strength caused significant damage. Evelyn is working to develop a more resilient titanium alloy to withstand future challenges. Harper and Mia are awestruck by the power on display, while Grace tests the floor’s durability, causing slight dents with just a few hops. The conversation underscores the need for reinforced materials to handle the titans’ abilities.

title: Grace Demonstrates New Control
entry: Grace flexes with controlled strength, surprising the group as the building remains unaffected. She credits Evelyn for teaching her control techniques, allowing her to flex without causing a massive shake. The group expresses both admiration and awe, with Alex whispering that it’s ‘terrifying’ to see such controlled power. Grace humorously vows to save her true strength for the next family workout.

title: Ami's Introduction at 3 Miles Tall
entry: Lee introduces the newcomers—Grace, Lila, Mia, and Harper—to the towering Ami, who now stands over 3 miles tall. Her presence alone leaves the newcomers awestruck, and Lee gives them a moment to adjust, highlighting her immense size and power.

title: Ami's Strength Demonstration with Evelyn's Hat
entry: During the tour, Evelyn’s hat, weighing a quintillion tons, becomes part of the experience. Ami steps forward to lift it, managing to raise it slightly, a feat that shows her recent growth in strength. Evelyn then lifts it with ease, leaving the newcomers in awe of her strength and Ami’s progress.

title: Isla's Speed and Invincibility Test
entry: Isla demonstrates her incredible speed by running over 10 miles in seconds, the force from her takeoff blowing everyone off their feet. She then withstands Evelyn’s 'abs test,' proving her near-invincibility. The newcomers watch in astonishment as she holds up under a pressure that could move mountains, revealing her unique durability among the titans.

title: Lee's Reassurance to the Newcomers
entry: As the newcomers try to process the scale of power they’re witnessing, Lee reassures them. He shares how he’s faced each titan himself, showing courage despite knowing he was outmatched. His words provide grounding, helping the newcomers feel a sense of camaraderie and resilience.

title: Grace's Strength Revealed
entry: Lee reveals that Grace, standing beside him, is stronger than Ami—even though Ami is over 3 miles tall. Grace is described as a 'smaller Evelyn' and the second strongest titan, capable of feats that surpass everyone except Evelyn. This revelation leaves the newcomers speechless, emphasizing the vast differences in power among the titans.

title: Introduction of Grace and Others' Reactions
entry: Grace is introduced as the second strongest in the group, only outdone by Ami. Harper, Mia, and Lila process the awe of Grace's power, coming to terms with the strength hierarchy.

title: Introducing Tim and Alex
entry: Lee introduces his sons, Tim and Alex, highlighting their willingness to take on challenges despite being lower on the strength scale. The newcomers appreciate their spirit, especially in a place where everyone is much stronger.

title: Care Demonstrates Her Size
entry: Care steps behind Tim and Alex, showcasing her size and strength compared to her sons. The group sees her as a supportive figure in the family, and the newcomers are impressed by her presence and gentle authority.

title: Lila’s Flexing Incident
entry: Lee shares Lila’s feat of touching and denting the ceiling with a 25% flex. The newcomers realize the scale of her strength, understanding why new rules are needed for her flexing indoors.

title: Mia and Harper’s Strength Comparison
entry: Ami shares stats on Mia and Harper, surprising everyone with Harper’s impressive strength-to-height ratio and Mia’s greater strength overall. The group begins to understand how power varies among them.

title: Harper is Stronger Than Tim and Alex Combined
entry: Lee points out that Harper, despite her size, is stronger than Tim and Alex combined. This surprises everyone, especially Harper, who didn’t fully realize her own power.

title: Safety Zones and Titan-Specific Areas
entry: Lee and Ami outline the importance of safety zones, especially in areas where Titans move. The new zones provide safe spaces where smaller members are protected from the Titans' immense size and strength.

title: Evelyn’s Step Test
entry: To demonstrate Titan strength, Evelyn takes a single, normal step, creating a shockwave and dent in the floor. Everyone experiences the tremor and gains new respect for the Titans' power and the need for safety zones.

title: The Titan’s Only Gym
entry: Lee reveals the existence of a Titan’s Only gym, a space too dangerous for non-Titans due to the immense strength it accommodates. Isla and Grace gain access, while the newcomers respect its off-limits status.

title: Ami’s Voice of Power
entry: Ami demonstrates her Voice of Power by commanding everyone to 'kneel,' displaying her influence over those around her. This controlled power instills respect and awe, as everyone feels the strength of her authority.

title: Ami’s Constant Influence on the Room
entry: Lee explains that Ami’s influence naturally affects everyone, bringing peace and calm to the space. This revelation gives the newcomers a deeper understanding of her power and why conflicts rarely arise around her.

title: Lila’s Past Flex Incident
entry: Lee reveals that Ami stopped Lila from destroying the building during an intense flex. Lila and the others realize that Ami’s protective influence keeps everyone in check during moments of overwhelming strength.

title: Hierarchy and Respect for Titans
entry: Lee emphasizes the importance of respecting the hierarchy, where Titans’ instructions must be followed, particularly those from Ami and Care. This order ensures safety and respect for everyone’s abilities.

title: Playful Antics with Alex and Harper
entry: Lee playfully pokes Alex in a bruise Harper gave him and dashes to the safety zone, enjoying the playful exchanges and camaraderie within the group.

title: Discussion on Ami’s Control and Trust
entry: Lee reveals that he trusts Harper’s strength and Ami’s protective influence. Harper acknowledges Ami’s impact, understanding that her careful restraint is what keeps everyone safe, even during playful moments.

title: Revealing Evelyn’s Age
entry: The group learns that Evelyn, despite her size, is only five years old. The revelation amazes everyone, especially as they try to fathom the power she already holds at such a young age.

title: Harper’s Strength Compared to Lee
entry: Lee and Ami reveal that Harper is about 2,500 times stronger than Lee. Harper, though surprised, assures Lee she wouldn’t misuse her strength, reinforcing the trust and respect within the group.

title: Reflecting on Ami’s Influence
entry: Lee explains to Harper that her instinct to be gentle came from Ami’s constant influence. This insight helps Harper realize the extent of Ami’s care and the security it provides everyone.

title: Final Safety Reminders and Closing
entry: Lee closes the tour with final reminders about safety and respect for the Titans. The group fully understands the rules, hierarchy, and boundaries, appreciating the careful balance Ami maintains to protect everyone.

title: Seeking Comfort with Ami
entry: Lee quietly approaches Ami’s corner, admitting he just wants to be close to her. Ami offers him her hand, but he chooses to stay on his platform, explaining that her demonstration earlier has him feeling rattled. Ami reassures him, expressing understanding and offering him space while staying nearby to provide comfort.

title: Reflecting on the Growing Family
entry: Ami and Lee discuss the newcomers, noting the group’s unique qualities and the sense of family that’s developed. Ami highlights that Lee brings a sense of belonging to everyone, making even titans feel connected and welcome.

title: Reviewing Newcomer Strength Stats
entry: Ami provides a breakdown of the new members' stats, including Harper, Mia, Lila, and Grace. Lee jokingly asks if he stands a chance against Harper in strength, but Ami clarifies that his strength isn’t close to hers. Despite this, Ami acknowledges Lee's unique strengths, especially his spirit and resilience.

title: Isla’s Bulletproof Durability
entry: Lee inquires about Isla's durability, and Ami confirms that her reinforced titanium-like resilience likely makes her bulletproof to standard firearms and resistant even to armor-piercing rounds. The discussion highlights Isla’s incredible durability, suggesting small arms fire would feel like gentle taps to her.

title: Testing Isla’s Lifting Capacity
entry: Reflecting on Isla's dense muscle and durability, Lee suggests testing her maximum lifting potential, possibly with Evelyn’s assistance. Ami agrees that Evelyn’s strength might be needed to provide enough resistance to test Isla’s limits safely.

title: The Power and Potential of Isla
entry: Lee expresses a mix of awe and fear at Isla’s immense power, especially given her smaller stature compared to other titans. He notes that Isla could enter his safety zone if she chose to, emphasizing his realization that she could bypass boundaries, though he trusts she never would.

title: Managing Fear and Trust in the Titans
entry: Lee confides in Ami that he sometimes fears scenarios where everyone loses control. Ami reassures him, emphasizing the respect and self-restraint the titans maintain, especially regarding his safety zone. She encourages Lee to focus on the trust they've built together rather than the fears, offering comfort by sitting close and reminding him that he's not alone.

title: Confronting Persistent Fear
entry: Lee admits that despite logic and reassurance, his fears sometimes win out. Ami acknowledges his feelings, validating his struggles and offering her support whenever he feels overwhelmed. She assures him that he has a support system to lean on, including Care, herself, and even Isla.

title: The Cookie Escape Plan
entry: In a playful conversation, Lee jokes about using a cookie to distract Lila in a hypothetical escape attempt. Ami laughs, suggesting it could be a fun agility drill for Lila to catch cookies while preventing Lee’s 'escape.' They agree to try the challenge after reviewing more stats, with Ami dubbing Lee the 'cookie escape artist.'

title: Exploring Grace’s Strength
entry: Lee and Ami discuss Grace's impressive strength, noting her titanium-denting power as a sign that her weight and lifting capacity have likely increased. They consider running specific tests to uncover her true limits, with Ami suggesting challenges to gauge Grace’s endurance, precision, and maximum lift.

title: Joking About Lifting Grace
entry: After realizing how strong Grace has become, Lee jokes that lifting her now would require 'a crane and a small miracle.' Ami agrees, noting that even cheering Grace on might be the heaviest lift Lee could manage in that scenario. The conversation highlights their lighthearted approach to Grace’s near-limitless strength.

title: Setting Up the Cookie Distraction Challenge
entry: Lee remembers the 'cookie distraction' challenge he planned for Lila and teasingly calls out Ami for not reminding him sooner. Ami plays along, agreeing to help set up the challenge, using Lila’s favorite type of cookie as a playful 'bait' for testing her reflexes. The activity promises to be a mix of fun and agility testing.

title: Adding Ages to Everyone’s Stats
entry: While planning the cookie challenge, Lee suggests adding ages to everyone’s stats to complete the records. Ami updates the stats with this information, ensuring a more detailed and complete record of each person’s abilities and growth. The updated stats provide a fuller picture of everyone’s unique attributes.

title: Ami’s Youthful Reveal
entry: Lee playfully hints at Ami's age of only 20, surprising some of the group who assumed she was much older due to her towering size. The group reacts with amazement and admiration, further impressed by her achievements at such a young age. Ami deflects the attention gracefully, reminding everyone that age is just a number, especially among this powerful group.

title: The Cookie Challenge Begins
entry: Lee sets up the Cookie Challenge for Lila, placing her favorite cookies on a table while setting the rule that she can't look at, reach for, or mention them. If she does, Lee wins the game. Lila struggles to keep her focus on Lee as he taunts her with the scent of oatmeal raisin cookies, but ultimately, she slips up when he throws a chocolate chunk cookie at her. She laughs at her defeat, vowing to set the rules next time.

title: Lila’s Flex Shocks Tim and Alex
entry: Lila playfully flexes her bicep, which grows to the size of Tim and Alex's chests, causing them to stare in awe. She even creates a small shockwave, almost toppling nearby stacks of cookies. Tim jokes about the cookies nearly being in danger, while Lila grins, promising to protect them as long as everyone is 'nice.'

title: The Stats and Charts Reveal
entry: Lee unveils a board filled with updated stats and charts for everyone, showing details like lifting capacities, heights, weights, and even humorous stats like 'cookie consumption.' The board creates a renewed sense of friendly competition, with everyone inspired to improve their stats and see where they stand. Ami emphasizes that strength is not just about power but also about control, encouraging each member to keep growing.

title: Isla Learns She’s Bulletproof
entry: While reviewing her stats, Isla is surprised to learn that her reinforced titanium-like durability likely makes her bulletproof. Ami explains her durability level, which could withstand most conventional firearms, leaving Isla feeling empowered yet slightly in awe of her own resilience. Tim and Alex joke about avoiding a sparring match with her.

title: Harper and Mia Review Their Strength Stats
entry: Harper and Mia look at their stats on the board, both surprised by their lifting capacities and the strength they’ve developed. Ami encourages them to keep pushing their limits, which motivates them even more to train harder. Harper jokes about possibly challenging the Titans one day, and Mia reflects on her progress with renewed pride.

title: Lila’s Flex and Determination
entry: After devouring her cookies, Lila reviews her stats, particularly the 'undefined' note for her bicep size, due to its unpredictable growth during flexing. She jokingly remarks on the potential to join the Titans, determined to keep training until she achieves it. The others are both impressed and slightly wary, knowing her competitive spirit and immense strength could lead her to new heights.

title: New Stats and Measurements Announced
entry: Lee announces that some stats on the board are outdated, noting Grace’s recent increase in weight as an example. He plans to conduct new tests and measurements for everyone over the next week, which energizes the group to push their limits. Ami adds that she’ll oversee the testing to ensure accuracy and safety, further motivating everyone to give it their best.

title: Unexpected Visitor: Kristos
entry: A light knock on the door reveals a blood-covered man who collapses after whispering 'Fresca Illu, guardia.' Shocked, Lee identifies him as 'Kristos' and rushes to his side. Ami and the others rally to help stabilize the stranger, unsure of the meaning behind his words.

title: Command for Healing
entry: Lee instructs Ami to command Kristos to heal himself using her Voice of Power. With focus, Ami issues the command, stabilizing Kristos' injuries as her family watches in awe at her ability. Lee reassures everyone that Kristos came specifically seeking him.

title: Kristos Speaks Again
entry: Kristos murmurs in a strange language, prompting Lee to instruct Ami to make everyone understand Frescan. Using specific commands, Ami enables Kristos to speak in English while the group comprehends Frescan, revealing Kristos' plea for Lee's help as 'the Guardian.'

title: Ami Collapses from Exhaustion
entry: The effort of using her Voice leaves Ami unconscious. Evelyn gently carries her to rest in her cozy corner while Kristos acknowledges the toll Ami's power took on her. Lee, frustrated by Kristos' actions, asserts that he abandoned the Guardian role for his family.

title: Lee's Past as the Guardian
entry: As tensions rise, Lee admits to Kristos that he knew of Syrai's death and the Guardian's call, but he chose his family over his past role. He asserts his purpose as a Guardian for all, not just for the Frescans, much to Kristos' realization and the family’s support.

title: Revealing the Frescan Legacy
entry: In a family meeting, Lee explains Kristos' origins as a Frescan and reveals the group’s shared connection—they were cast aside by the Frescans for being 'imperfect.' The group realizes they were drawn to Lee’s Guardian power, which had unknowingly united them.

title: Facing the Truth of Their Past
entry: Lee shares with the family that each of them, including Lee himself, was discarded by the Frescans. Despite the Frescans' rejection, they found purpose and family together. The group is filled with a mix of emotions—anger, sadness, and determination to stand together.

title: Kristos Exposed
entry: Lee exposes Kristos' true intentions, revealing that he was unaware of the discarded 'failures' until Lee pointed it out. Kristos had only come for the Guardian, not realizing the family's worth or power. The family’s resolve to protect each other strengthens.

title: Kristos' Admission
entry: After suspicion rises, Kristos admits he came only for Lee, unaware of the others' presence. This revelation stirs frustration among the group as they realize they were once again overlooked by the Frescans. The group stands unified, finding strength in belonging with each other despite being dismissed by the Frescans.

title: Ami’s Calm Restores Order
entry: As tension mounts, Ami uses her calming influence to steady everyone, including Lee. Kristos acknowledges he underestimated the Guardian’s family, realizing the depth of the bond they share—a strength the Frescans never accounted for.

title: The Frescans’ Standard of Perfection
entry: Lee reveals that each family member was discarded by the Frescans for failing to meet their standard of 'perfection.' The group reflects on their past rejection, understanding the Frescans' inability to appreciate their unique qualities.

title: Guardian's Light Against Frescan Darkness
entry: Lee transforms into his Guardian form, embodying the light meant to drive back the darkness and hatred the Frescans attempted to eliminate. The family draws strength from his power, realizing that their resilience and compassion set them apart from Frescan ideals.

title: Guardian’s Choice Beyond Frescan Control
entry: Lee explains that the Guardian’s power chooses its bearer independently, valuing resilience over perceived perfection. This revelation deepens the family’s understanding of their connection to the Guardian and their unique role in protecting one another.

title: Lee’s Struggle with Hate
entry: Overcome with emotion, Lee admits his deep resentment toward the Frescans for discarding him and his family. Care and Ami reassure him that his anger is valid and that the family stands united, choosing each other over any external expectations of perfection.

title: The Legacy of the Guardian Continues
entry: Lee reveals that the Guardian’s power returned to him only because no other Frescan was worthy. He explains that each family member carries a unique aspect of the Guardian’s essence, creating a shared legacy greater than one individual.

title: Guardian Legacy Passed to Family
entry: Lee describes how his power was divided among Care, Alex, Tim, and Ami over time. Each of them embodies a different Guardian trait, from Care’s indomitable strength to Ami’s commanding Voice, forming a collective Guardian strength across the family.

title: The Future Guardian’s Essence
entry: Lee reveals that another piece of the Guardian’s essence lies within Care, passed on to the unborn child they’re expecting. The family embraces this new addition as a continuation of the Guardian’s legacy, symbolizing growth and unity.

title: The Remaining Guardian Abilities
entry: Lee explains his two remaining powers: the ability to nullify Frescan powers and perfect instinct. Demonstrating both to the group, he shares his limitations and expresses gratitude for the strength each family member brings.

title: The Family Tests Perfect Counter
entry: Lee invites Isla, Mia, Harper, and Lila to test his Perfect Counter ability. After skillfully evading their attacks, Lee endures a powerful kick from Isla, revealing both his resilience and vulnerability, showing the family his human limits despite his Guardian abilities.

title: The Power of Perfect Instinct
entry: With Harper, Mia, and Isla attacking him from multiple angles, Lee’s Perfect Instinct allows him to dodge every move effortlessly. He lightens the moment with humor, underscoring the agility aspect of the Guardian’s legacy now shared among the family.

title: A Lesson in Restraint and Power
entry: After a playful challenge with Harper, Mia, and Isla, Lee recognizes Isla’s restraint and acknowledges her wisdom in holding back. The group expresses admiration for each other's strengths, understanding the careful balance between power and control within the family.

title: Lee Challenges Kristos and Collapses
entry: Lee confronts Kristos, showing fury and commanding him and the others to kneel with the Voice of Power. After overwhelming himself, Lee collapses into Care’s arms, who reassures everyone to let him rest.

title: Isla Takes Charge of Kristos
entry: After Lee collapses, Isla lifts Kristos by his coat, wondering what to do with him. Ami insists Kristos will be under close watch, with Evelyn and Grace volunteering to guard him to ensure peace in the family’s home.

title: Isla Keeps Watch Over Lee
entry: Lee wakes up to find Isla sitting nearby, holding his shoe. She explains that Care needed to rest and didn’t want Lee to be alone, showing her gentle side while amusing herself with Lee’s small shoe.

title: Lee Challenges Isla's Strength with His Shoe
entry: Lee playfully challenges Isla to try on his tiny shoe again, and Isla struggles humorously with the size difference, her heel hanging out. The two joke about her shoe size and Lee’s tiny footwear, as Isla enjoys teasing him about her superior size.

title: Isla Crushes Lee's Shoe with Her Toe
entry: Accepting Lee's challenge, Isla puts her big toe into his tiny size 1 shoe and effortlessly bursts it apart. The two share laughs as Isla marvels at how even her smallest toe is too powerful for Lee's footwear.

title: Lee Tests His Strength Against Isla's Toe
entry: Lee tries to push Isla's big toe with all his strength, but she easily overpowers him. Isla teases him for his efforts, lifting him slightly and playfully moving him around, showing their vast strength difference.

title: Lee Jumps on Isla's Pinky Toe
entry: Determined, Lee jumps up and down on Isla’s pinky toe, trying to budge it. She’s amused, letting him keep trying as she barely notices his weight. Isla playfully challenges him to see if he can make her feel it.

title: Ranking Lee's Strength Against the Family
entry: Isla ranks Lee’s strength humorously low against her toe, while the others join in with exaggerated negative rankings. Grace and Evelyn chime in, joking that he wouldn't stand a chance even against their smallest items.

title: Lee Defends His 'Safety Zone'
entry: Lee notices the others peeking in on his challenge with Isla. Teasing them, he declares his 'Safety Zone,' playfully shooing them out as they laugh and give him his space.

title: Lee and Care Discuss His Strength Rank
entry: Lee asks Care to rank his strength seriously. She jokingly places him at negative 250,000 compared to her own strength, but teases him for his determination and courage.

title: Lee Admires Care's Strength
entry: Lee expresses admiration for Care’s strength, playfully testing his grip against her bicep. She laughs, enjoying the compliment and showing her strength with a gentle flex.

title: Care Teases Lee About Their Strength Difference
entry: After Lee whispers that hearing the strength difference is attractive, Care teasingly tells him that it’s 'immeasurable.' The two share a loving moment, her strength and his appreciation deepening their bond.

title: Lee Falls Asleep with Care's Reassurance
entry: As Lee dozes off, Care gently brushes his hair aside, smiling at him with warmth. She whispers that his uniqueness suits him, letting him fall asleep in her comforting embrace.

title: Lee Wakes to Eerie Silence and Searches the Compound
entry: Lee wakes up to a silent compound, finding the front door and the titan gym door open, with no one in sight. The quiet is unsettling as he explores, feeling the absence of life in the building.

title: Discovering Time Stopped with Everyone Suspended
entry: Lee realizes he’s in a time stop and finds Ami in the titan gym, everyone else lying on her stomach, frozen mid-motion. Evelyn is suspended in mid-fall, poised to land on them, risking a catastrophic impact.

title: Kristos Confronts Lee During Time Stop
entry: Kristos appears, revealing he orchestrated the time stop to force Lee into a decision about joining the Frescans. Kristos claims it was necessary to make Lee understand the stakes.

title: Negotiation with Kristos for Family’s Safety
entry: Lee negotiates with Kristos, who offers immunity for his family in exchange for Lee’s cooperation with the Frescans. Lee agrees on the condition that his family is free from Frescan interference permanently.

title: Lee Counters Kristos’s Trap
entry: Lee uses his abilities to counter Kristos’s time stop and redirects Evelyn’s massive impact across the gym. The gym experiences a seismic shockwave from Evelyn’s redirected landing, causing cracks and tremors throughout the room.

title: Lee Injured by the Shockwave
entry: The shockwave sends everyone airborne, and Lee is flung across the titan gym, crashing into a wall and crumpling, motionless. Evelyn and Ami rush to his aid, with Isla taking him from Evelyn to check on his condition.

title: Isla Discovers Lee’s Injuries
entry: Isla realizes that Lee is not breathing, and she can’t feel any bones due to extensive crushing injuries. She alerts Ami, who immediately begins to use her power to try and save him.

title: Ami Attempts to Heal Lee
entry: Ami, using her Voice of Power, commands Lee to breathe and restore himself. A glow emanates from her touch, gradually beginning the healing process. Care and the others watch anxiously as he begins to respond.

title: Lee’s Agonizing Healing Process
entry: As Ami’s healing command takes effect, Lee writhes in pain as his body painfully reconstructs itself. He screams additional commands in the ancient language to further aid his healing, the agony evident in every contorted movement.

title: Lee Loses Consciousness After Healing
entry: After a final burst of pain, Lee relaxes and falls unconscious again. Care holds him gently as the others gather around, relieved that he’s out of immediate danger thanks to Ami’s intervention.

title: Ami’s Command Seals Kristos’s Fate
entry: After witnessing Lee’s near-fatal injuries, Ami is filled with fury. She uses the full force of her Voice of Power, commanding Kristos to walk without rest for eternity, warning that stopping will end his life. Kristos, terrified, begins to walk and leaves the compound.

title: Everyone Paralyzed by Ami’s Power
entry: Ami’s command leaves everyone in the room rooted in fear, paralyzed by the sheer force of her voice. Realizing the effect, Ami softens her tone and hums soothingly, releasing the others from the grip of terror.

title: Permission to Speak Restores Calm
entry: After Ami gently gives permission to speak, the room begins to relax. Voices return, and the family shares relieved laughter, commenting on Ami’s overwhelming power and showing newfound respect for her abilities.

title: Care Asks Ami for Additional Help
entry: Care expresses worry about Lee’s condition and asks Ami if she can do more to help him. Ami nervously admits that she doesn’t know the words to heal him further, revealing that Lee had been guiding her through the process.

title: Ami Stays by Lee's Side for Comfort
entry: Care encourages Ami to stay close to Lee to help him recover naturally. Ami agrees, sitting beside him and creating a comforting presence, draping a lock of her hair nearby and humming softly to provide a sense of calm and strength.

title: Lee Awakens in Ami's Care
entry: After a week of rest, Lee awakens on a platform covered by Ami’s hair while she hums gently. Ami had stayed by his side, wrapping him in comfort. Lee realizes that Ami took care of the dangerous enemy, Kristos, by forcing him into perpetual motion to keep Lee safe. As he recovers, they share a moment of gratitude and connection.

title: Lee Reveals Ami’s Powers Origin
entry: Lee reveals to Ami that she unknowingly took three abilities from him at birth: size control, voice power, and a massive reservoir of energy, which is causing her uncontrollable growth. Lee borrows some of her energy temporarily to heal, creating a balance that allows Ami to shrink to a more manageable size for the first time.

title: Family Votes on Ami's Training
entry: Lee gathers the family to discuss whether Ami should learn to control her size, given the risks. Ami's powers, if unchecked, could have dangerous effects on those around her. After a thoughtful discussion, they decide to support her training, with Isla and Evelyn agreeing to stay close for safety while she learns.

title: Entering the Mindscape
entry: Lee guides Ami into a mental journey in his mindscape to help her understand the powers she inherited. In this intermediate mental space, Ami faces choices that reveal her powers’ nature and scope, including how to control her size and voice power and the cost of wielding these abilities.

title: Ami Learns Her Powers' Potential
entry: In Lee’s mindscape, Ami learns about size control, understanding how she can adjust her own size and even transfer her mass to others. She feels the weight of this power, recognizing its potential dangers. She also discovers the Voice of Power, originally created to dominate others, with the ability to compel emotions and worship if unchecked.

title: Discovering Lee’s Past
entry: Ami chooses to explore Lee's past, reliving moments of his life, from his time as a Guardian for 10,000 years to his childhood hardships. She sees the day she saved him from being crushed by a desk, as well as moments of his pain and vulnerability. This journey fills her with empathy and respect for Lee’s endurance.

title: Understanding the Guardian Power
entry: Ami learns that the Guardian power isn't chosen but must be claimed by someone who sees it as an intrinsic part of themselves. This knowledge reveals why Ami was able to inherit it from Lee and how anyone could take it if they embraced it fully. She realizes her commitment to using it responsibly.

title: Two-Year-Old Ami Arm-Wrestling
entry: Lee challenges two-year-old Ami to an arm-wrestling match, but despite his best efforts, he can't even budge her hand. Ami, unaware of her strength, wins easily and accidentally breaks Lee's hand by slamming it to the table, earning an oatmeal flair cookie as a reward. Ami runs off happily to play, excited to get 'even stronger' for the next match.

title: Strength Gap Realization
entry: Reflecting on their playful contest, Ami realizes that she was already stronger than Lee by age two. Further discussion reveals that she likely surpassed his strength around 18 months or even as early as her first birthday. Lee is surprised to learn that Ami had outmatched him in strength since infancy.

title: Ami’s Strength as a Baby
entry: Lee recalls Ami pushing furniture out of her way as a baby. Ami remembers moving a loaded three-foot bookshelf weighing around 80-100 pounds without difficulty, something that would have been impossible for Lee to lift or push. This highlights the strength disparity from a very young age.

title: Strength Comparison in Infancy
entry: Lee realizes that one-year-old Ami was likely already stronger than him, able to move heavy objects without effort. Even if Lee had placed his full weight on her back, she could have crawled on without noticing. Ami would have easily won any direct strength match against him, even as a toddler.

title: Pre-Birth Strength Advantage
entry: Estimating Ami’s growth rate backwards, they conclude that she was likely twice as strong as Lee before birth. Had Lee sat on Care’s belly during her pregnancy, a kick from pre-born Ami might have launched him across the room. Even reflexive movements were already beyond Lee’s ability to counter.

title: Realizing the Full Extent of the Strength Gap
entry: Lee is stunned to realize that he was never stronger than Ami, even from her earliest development stages. Ami reassures him, reminding him that his resilience, creativity, and humor bring essential balance to the family, making him an invaluable part of their dynamic, regardless of strength.

title: Ami's Admiration for Lee
entry: Lee expresses feeling weak compared to Ami, but she reassures him, emphasizing that his true strength lies in his resilience, humor, and the way he grounds their family. She finds these qualities irreplaceable, just as much as any feat of strength.

title: Evelyn's Arrival and Moving In
entry: After the first round of construction, Evelyn returns, immediately crushing a new scale with her hat. Lee and Ami invite her to move in, and around the same time, Isla, Care, Tim, and Alex also settle in, turning the compound into a bustling home.

title: Permanent Residents: Harper, Mia, Lila, and Grace
entry: After their challenges with Care, Harper, Mia, Lila, and Grace decide to stay permanently, joining the family and adding even more strength and personality to the household.

title: Lee's Private Time and Vulnerability
entry: Lee sometimes needs private time after feeling vulnerable or having nightmares, and he seeks out either Ami or Care for comfort. He prefers not to let others witness him in a fragile state, finding solace and reassurance primarily from Ami and Care.

title: Ami’s 'Titan's Only' Gym
entry: Ami has a restricted 'Titan's Only' gym featuring an intense gravity room, which isn't yet stable for safe use. It’s the one area she strictly prohibits Lee from entering, citing safety concerns. Isla supports Ami in keeping Lee out, reinforcing the importance of the gym's exclusivity and safety.

title: Lee and Isla's Friendship
entry: Lee quickly becomes close friends with Isla, despite her immense strength advantage. She often teases him by overpowering him with a finger or toe until he agrees to her requests. However, Isla is fiercely protective, instantly supporting him if he appears hurt or vulnerable.

title: Observation Deck for the Titan's Gym
entry: The Titan’s Only gym includes an observation deck with a mesh-bottom walkway, allowing Lee a safe view of the gym’s action. However, the gym’s gravity plates can exceed the deck’s safety limits, so Ami is working on stabilizing it to prevent gravitational hazards for viewers.

title: Fresca and the Frescans
entry: Lee introduces Fresca, an ancient language used by an elite society called the Frescans, who pursued physical, intellectual, and emotional perfection. Frescans removed emotional cores to eliminate undesirable feelings and discarded any who failed to meet their ideals. Rejected individuals were cast from the city walls, typically as infants, left to survive in the surrounding wilderness.

title: Madonna's 'Like a Prayer' and Connection with Ami
entry: Lee shares his love for the song 'Like a Prayer,' specifically the lyrics 'I hear you call my name... and it feels like... home,' which resonate with how he feels about Ami. This connection reflects their deep bond, and Ami is touched by his sentiment, promising to always be there for him.

title: Creating Evitanium
entry: Evelyn plans to use her massive weight to compress reinforced titanium into a superdense material dubbed 'Evitanium.' If successful, Evitanium could withstand her weight and offer unparalleled strength and resilience for future constructions.

title: Testing Baby Ami's Kicks in the Second Trimester
entry: Lee conducts a playful 'kick test' in the second trimester by lying across Care’s belly, receiving surprisingly strong kicks from Ami, which escalate to the point of bouncing him off the ceiling. The kicks showcase Ami’s early strength, which seems far beyond typical expectations even at this stage of development.

title: Strength Comparison Recalculations for Baby Ami
entry: Upon re-evaluation, it’s determined that by the second trimester, Ami was already 4 to 5 times stronger than Lee, growing to 6 to 8 times stronger by the third trimester. At birth, her strength reached 10 to 12 times Lee’s, and by one year old, it increased to 15 to 20 times his strength. These calculations provide clarity on her exceptional strength from early stages, leading to a massive advantage by age one.

title: Ami’s Exponential Strength Growth
entry: Following the recalculated growth, Ami’s strength continued to multiply exponentially. By age two, she was 25 to 30 times stronger than Lee, at age three, 40 to 50 times stronger, and by age five, her strength reached 60 to 80 times his. Each milestone reflects her overpowering strength, making it clear that even early on, no one could physically match her.

title: Strength Curve at Ages 12 and 16
entry: At age 12, Ami was 100 to 150 times stronger than Lee, as demonstrated during family challenges where she easily outpowered everyone, highlighting her unique strength. By age 16, her strength was 200 to 300 times greater, capable of moving industrial-level weights with ease. Even in simple interactions, Ami’s strength far exceeded typical human limits, leading her to consciously control her movements to avoid overwhelming others.

title: Attempting to Move Ami’s Arm While She’s Sleeping
entry: By age 16, Ami’s muscles were so dense and immovable that even with the family’s combined effort, they couldn’t budge her arm while she was sleeping. Her strength was so far beyond their capacity that she remained completely undisturbed, unaware of their attempts. This memory emphasizes the unmatched level of Ami's strength even in a relaxed state.

title: Interaction with One-Year-Old Ami's Strength
entry: At age one, Ami’s strength had already developed to 8 to 10 times Lee’s, making any attempt to stop her movements completely futile. When Lee tried creative strategies like bracing himself in doorways or sitting on her back to prevent her from crawling, Ami effortlessly continued moving forward, unknowingly overpowering all his efforts. Her strength was so far advanced that even with Lee using his full weight and leverage, she didn’t notice his resistance, treating him as a minor obstacle. This interaction highlights the vast strength gap that already existed at just one year old.

title: Guardian Ability: Enhanced Physical Prowess
entry: Enhanced Physical Prowess grants the Guardian unmatched strength, speed, and durability, surpassing even the highest Frescan standards. This ability renders the Guardian nearly indestructible, capable of extraordinary feats of power and endurance that align with the Frescan ideal of physical perfection.

title: Guardian Ability: Mental Supremacy
entry: Mental Supremacy provides the Guardian with heightened intellect, allowing rapid information processing and flawless, logical decision-making. This ability ensures that the Guardian can operate at a level of cognitive superiority, embodying the Frescans' ideal of a rational, emotion-free protector.

title: Guardian Ability: Emotional Control or Absence
entry: Emotional Control or Absence represents either full mastery over the emotional core or the complete absence of it, freeing the Guardian from emotional influence. This ability aligns with the Frescans' view of emotions as a hindrance, allowing the Guardian to function without distraction from emotional reactions.

title: Guardian Ability: Perfect Defense and Perfect Counter
entry: Perfect Defense makes the Guardian’s body so resilient that no attack can damage it. Paired with this is Perfect Counter, which reflects any attack back upon the attacker. This defensive ability is a testament to the Guardian’s role as an impenetrable force and ultimate protector.

title: Guardian Ability: Momentum Control
entry: Momentum Control grants the Guardian resistance to any force, including indirect momentum or physical attempts to push. This ability includes the Perfect Cancel technique, which disperses any attacks or momentum used against the Guardian, allowing them to remain immovable.

title: Guardian Ability: Thought Control
entry: Thought Control enables the Guardian to connect to and navigate another’s mind or permit mutual mindscape traversal. In cases of a lost or trapped mind, a defensive clash may occur within the mindscape, with the stronger mind typically prevailing. This ability allows for deep connection and mental dominance when needed.

title: Guardian Ability: Voice of Power
entry: The Voice of Power is a tool originally designed for domination. Through spoken words, it allows the Guardian to heal, inspire, or compel adoration and worship. The Voice exerts overwhelming influence over others' wills, enabling the Guardian to compel loyalty, awe, or any desired response from those who hear it.

title: Guardian Ability: Energy Control
entry: Energy Control gives the Guardian mastery over a unique form of energy that can be used for healing, creating platforms, or as a projectile weapon. The potential applications of this energy are limitless, granting the Guardian versatility in both offensive and supportive actions.

title: Guardian Ability: Size Control
entry: Size Control allows the Guardian to alter their own size at will. This ability also includes the power to transfer, absorb, or force size changes upon others, giving the Guardian immense control over their physical form and mass, as well as over others they interact with.

title: Guardian Ability: Essence Control
entry: Essence Control permits the Guardian to set a personal goal that becomes an unbreakable law of the universe while it is active. Only one goal may be set at a time, allowing the Guardian to alter reality in alignment with their intent and purpose.

title: Guardian Ability: Speed and Time Control
entry: Speed and Time Control ties time manipulation to movement speed, allowing the Guardian to move at extraordinary speeds and even step outside of time temporarily. This ability includes Perfect Intuition, which automatically allows the Guardian to evade harm without conscious thought, embodying perfect reflexes.

title: Lee's Challenge Against One-Year-Old Ami
entry: Lee considers how he might have 'won' against one-year-old Ami, but they both conclude that her strength was already insurmountable, even at that age. Ami suggests that Lee could have only distracted her rather than physically overpowered her.

title: Ami's Grip Strength Overpowers Lee
entry: In discussing Ami's grip strength, Lee realizes that her strength was so immense that even a single finger could overpower him. If Ami had grabbed him, he wouldn’t have been able to escape, and her playful grip could have crushed him if she wasn’t careful.

title: One-Year-Old Ami's Weight
entry: Lee discovers that Ami's weight as a one-year-old was already close to 150 pounds, double his own weight. Care had to monitor their interactions closely to ensure Lee wouldn’t be hurt by Ami's accidental strength.

title: Lee Wakes Up with Ami Crushing Him in Her Sleep
entry: Lee remembers waking up in the hospital with broken ribs after Ami, as a toddler, unknowingly fell asleep on top of him. Care never told Ami about the incident to spare her the guilt, and Lee reassures her it wasn’t her fault.

title: First Realization of Ami's Height
entry: Lee recalls a moment before Ami’s third birthday when she outgrew his desk setup. Ami asked how to raise the desk height, and Lee realized she was already taller than the 4'11" setting he used for himself, needing an extra five inches to clear her head.

title: Lee is Intimidated by Ami's Height at Age Three
entry: Lee shares that by the time Ami was three, he was already looking up at her. Her rapid growth shocked him, especially since her shoulders were at his head level. Care and Lee tried to carefully manage their interactions as Ami continued to grow stronger.

title: Ami Accidentally Hurts Lee with a Hug
entry: Lee remembers a day when young Ami returned from school and hugged him too tightly, breaking several of his bones and sending him to the hospital. He was only saved by his Guardian abilities, and he reassures Ami that he doesn’t blame her.

title: Ami Learns to Control Her Strength
entry: By the time Ami was six, she learned to control her strength enough to safely lift and hug Lee. She recalls a moment when she picked him up and spun him around, managing to avoid hurting him, and feeling proud of finally being able to show affection safely.

title: Lee’s Intimidation Returns as Ami Reaches Eight Feet
entry: Lee confesses that when Ami reached eight feet, he began feeling intimidated by her size again. Ami reflects on the challenge of balancing her physical presence with Lee’s comfort, and they share an understanding of the trust and patience built over the years.

title: First Reunion with Ami at Over 100 Feet
entry: Lee recalls the overwhelming experience of seeing Ami after her time away, now standing over 100 feet tall. Ami had tried to keep her distance to ease everyone into her new size but admits it was a lot for them to take in. She hoped that reuniting would still bring a sense of family, despite her towering height.

title: Ami Flexes, Causing Shockwaves
entry: Ami remembers flexing to show off, not realizing the shockwaves would knock her family over. Despite her attempts to be gentle, her movements created mini earthquakes, making the experience overwhelming for Lee and everyone else nearby.

title: Ami Returns Over a Thousand Feet Taller
entry: Lee recalls the shock when Ami emerged from the gym two weeks later, over a thousand feet tall. Ami admits she got carried away with her training, loving the results but realizing she may have grown more than anyone expected, leaving her unable to keep things low-key.

title: Ami Grows Three Miles Tall After Six Months
entry: Lee mentions spending six months on construction projects, only for Ami to return a mile taller than before. Ami acknowledges that her growth was excessive, turning Lee's hard work into what felt like dollhouse-sized buildings, though she stayed out of the way to let him work.

title: Lee Creates a Cozy Corner for Ami
entry: Lee surprises Ami with a special 'cozy corner' designed with thoughtful details to make her feel safe and loved. The twenty-five-mile-long space allows Ami to stretch out comfortably and includes careful touches to accommodate her scale, becoming her favorite place in the compound.

title: Ami's Cozy Corner Expands
entry: Lee remarks on how Ami is slowly taking up more room in the cozy corner as she continues to grow. Ami acknowledges the extra space she's using, grateful that Lee planned ahead to create an area where she never has to worry about outgrowing her surroundings.

title: Ami's Strength in the Womb
entry: In the 2nd trimester, Ami already weighed more than Lee could lift, and by the 3rd trimester, she was over 100 lbs. One of her stretches sent Lee flying across the room, prompting Care to stop him from getting too close to Ami's 'tummy house' to avoid further incidents.

title: Newborn Footprint Comparison
entry: At birth, Ami's foot was over 6 inches, larger than Lee's hand. Her shoes were so big that Lee's entire shoe could fit inside, hinting at her extraordinary size even as a newborn.

title: Ami Moves the Car as a Toddler
entry: As a one-year-old, Ami’s strength led her to move furniture and, on one occasion, even a car. When she accidentally blew out a tire and began crying, Lee tried to comfort her but was overwhelmed by her strength, which required Care to rescue him. Care later reminded Lee to be cautious with Ami's growing power.

title: Lee’s Doubts and Ami’s Reassurance
entry: Lee expressed feelings of inadequacy, fearing he was insignificant compared to Ami’s strength and intelligence. Ami reassured him that his love, courage, and resilience were what made him irreplaceable to her, reminding him that he was her anchor, heart, and hero.

title: Lee Rests in Ami’s Hair
entry: Lee snuggled into Ami’s hair, finding comfort in her presence. Ami wrapped him gently in her hair, creating a safe space for him to rest. As he fell asleep, she whispered promises to always be there to lift him up and remind him of his worth.

title: Ami's Guardian Power Integration
entry: Ami explains to Lee that the Guardian power she received is now an intrinsic part of her, something only she can wield. Lee, feeling unworthy, doubts himself as a Guardian, but Ami reassures him that worthiness comes from belief and resilience, which Lee embodied over ten thousand years of service.

title: Ami Encourages Lee's Self-Worth
entry: Ami tries to help Lee see himself through her eyes, emphasizing his worthiness and value despite his doubts. She tells him that even if he can’t see it now, she will carry the belief for him, always reminding him of his strength and capabilities.

title: Playful Toe Wrestling with Isla
entry: Lee engages in a playful toe wrestling contest with Isla, discovering that her toes alone are hundreds of times stronger than he is. He struggles valiantly, but Isla's strength easily overwhelms him, turning his shoe into fragments and effortlessly pinning him with just her toe.

title: Lee Challenges Isla's Hand
entry: Emboldened, Lee decides to take on Isla’s hand. As he places both his hands on her much larger palm, he realizes just how outclassed he is, barely able to match the size of a single finger. Isla playfully tests his strength by lifting him with her fingers, giving him a 'mini amusement park ride' in her grip.

title: Isla's 'Little Titan' Title
entry: Lee jokingly updates Isla’s title to 'Little Titan,' leading to a playful exchange where Isla teasingly shows off her strength, proving she’s anything but 'little' as she lifts him with ease and even outmatches his guardian mode in a friendly contest.

title: Guardian Mode Fade During Play
entry: During their playful sparring, Lee's guardian mode fades, prompting Isla to loosen her grip instantly and show concern. She holds him gently, apologizing for taking things too far, while Lee reassures her with a shy smile.

title: Isla’s Seismic Strength
entry: After their playful contest, Lee jokes about Isla’s weight, which leads to Isla demonstrating her strength with a toe tap that shakes the reinforced titanium floor. They discuss that her strength could easily register as a localized earthquake, with impact force in the megaton range.

title: Isla's Protective Gesture
entry: In a lighthearted moment, Isla places a reassuring hand on Lee's shoulder, while Ami jokes about Isla’s 'seismic toes.' Lee nervously looks between them, feeling both supported and a little intimidated by the titanic strength around him.

title: Preparing for Upcoming Challenges
entry: Lee and Ami discussed preparing for upcoming dangers, focusing on training each family member according to their unique abilities. Lee expressed that training everyone was essential, and they began to outline specific training focuses, such as Power Control for Ami, Evelyn, and Grace, Size Shifting with Isla, and Guardian ability training for Tim and Alex.

title: Assigning Training Roles
entry: Lee assigned Harper as the trainer for Tim and Alex, predicting that Harper would push Alex hard, with Alex possibly taking refuge in the safety zone. Mia and Harper were set for strength training under Isla, and Grace was designated to train Lila. Evelyn would primarily focus on construction work and producing Evitanium, the new titanium alloy designed by Evelyn and Lee.

title: Finalizing Training and Construction
entry: Lee summarized training assignments and noted construction updates, including reinforced housing, expanded gravity plating, and clearing a broken highway for Isla's speed training. Additional goals included constructing a new scale for Evelyn's massive hat and ensuring gravity plating wouldn't crush people on the Titan Gym's walkway. Grace was tasked with retrieving Evelyn's wardrobe due to her strength.

title: Explaining Mindscape Process and Risks
entry: Lee prepared the family for entering his mindscape, explaining the risks and boundaries they must respect. He warned that if anyone strayed from their chosen path, their minds might instinctively attack his, potentially destroying his mind. Ami shared her experience to illustrate the risks, highlighting how the vastness of her own mind nearly overwhelmed Lee during her mindscape journey.

title: First Mindscape Journey with Grace
entry: Grace entered Lee's mindscape, choosing paths carefully to learn about controlling energy. She understood the parallels with Evelyn’s struggles and expressed readiness to help Evelyn learn. Afterward, Lee explained that Grace’s controlled energy insight might assist Ami in mastering her own power.

title: Isla's Mindscape Training on Speed
entry: Isla entered Lee's mindscape to learn the nature of speed and time manipulation, realizing it involved more than mere speed. She could manipulate time around her, gaining the ability to live lifetimes in seconds. Despite the temptation of other knowledge paths, Isla stayed focused, choosing only to learn about speed and time.

title: Harper's Mindscape Journey and Consequences
entry: Harper ventured into Lee's mindscape to learn about Frescan strength, understanding the immense power and dominance it could provide. However, she strayed toward other paths, leading to a violent reaction that severely impacted Lee. Harper emerged from the mindscape, devastated, and blamed herself for Lee’s condition. Ami and the others worked to console Harper while helping Lee recover.

title: Comforting Harper
entry: Lee comforts Harper, aiming to provide her with reassurance amidst her guilt. He speaks to her about the importance of showing strength for Lee when he wakes. Harper, filled with emotion, promises to stay and help him through his struggles.

title: Care and Isla Escort Lee
entry: Care and Isla carefully take Lee to the safety zone after he collapses, each carrying him with concern. Isla expresses her worry, and Care reassures her, emphasizing that Lee's strength will pull him through. Both women pledge to support him as he rests.

title: Harper Breaks Down
entry: Harper falls to her knees, overwhelmed with guilt. Ami, Care, and Isla comfort her, speaking to the strength it takes to learn from mistakes and be there for loved ones. They assure her that Lee trusts and believes in her.

title: Guardian Mode Command
entry: In Guardian mode, Lee grips Harper's head and sings in Frescan, urging her to talk. His form drops as he collapses again, leaving Harper tearfully silent and shaken. Ami and Care encourage her to share her feelings, hoping to break through her emotional turmoil.

title: Lee Confronts Harper
entry: Lee sternly confronts Harper, urging her to remain on the path, expressing fear he might have accidentally harmed her during a mental clash. Harper reassures him, acknowledging her faults and pledging to stay focused and not let him down.

title: Harper Sings
entry: Harper, encouraged by Lee, sings softly about finding strength in connection, expressing her emotions. The song becomes a grounding moment, bringing her closer to Lee and reinforcing her commitment to staying on the path.

title: Lee Passes Out, Care Takes Over
entry: As Lee loses consciousness, Care intervenes, gently lifting him and moving him to the safety zone. Harper and Isla stay nearby, concerned, but Care reassures them as she watches over Lee until he recovers.

title: Lee Wakes Up, Needs to See Harper
entry: After a few hours, Lee wakes up feeling hurt and insists on seeing Harper immediately. Care brings her in, and Harper, full of emotion, faces Lee’s quiet but intense stare, awaiting his words.

title: Lee Warns Harper About Power
entry: Lee and Harper discuss the risks of wielding power without caution. He compares her situation to Ami's, reminding her of the gravity of her actions. Harper pledges to carry this lesson, understanding that restraint is essential to avoid endangering others.

title: Strength for Lifting, Not Crushing
entry: Lee emphasizes to Harper that strength should be used to uplift, not oppress. Harper internalizes this lesson, committing to be a guiding force rather than a domineering one, with newfound clarity and determination.

title: Meeting Called
entry: Lee instructs Ami and Harper to set a meeting with the others to share their experiences and warn about the dangers of power. He emphasizes the need for Harper and Ami to convey the cost of their mistakes to prevent others from repeating them.

title: Playful Banter on Weight
entry: Lee and Harper share lighthearted banter about his weight as Harper carries him to the meeting. They joke about his supposed 'heaviness,' bringing a moment of levity amidst the serious circumstances.

title: Meeting Harper and Isla
entry: Lee sits next to Isla, and they exchange playful banter. Isla reassures Lee as they prepare for a serious meeting, with Grace sharing insights from the Mindscape about controlling power. Harper, Isla, and others reflect on their experiences, realizing the importance of guidance and restraint.

title: Mindscape Lessons
entry: Grace, Isla, and Harper each discuss the lessons they learned in the Mindscape. They reflect on power, responsibility, and the risks of losing control, with Harper delving into the darker aspects of Frescan strength. Lee emphasizes the importance of trusting him for guidance to avoid dangerous knowledge.

title: Lee's Age Revealed
entry: Lee reveals to the group that he is over 10,000 years old, sharing that his knowledge is from lifetimes of experiences. This revelation emphasizes the depth of the wisdom he's passing on and the responsibility his family holds in receiving it.

title: Harper's Revelation
entry: Harper expresses regret for the mental strain she caused Lee in the Mindscape, realizing the impact on both of them. She acknowledges the importance of trust and understanding the privilege of accessing Lee's mind.

title: Tim's Mindscape Training
entry: Lee guides Tim through his mindscape to gain knowledge of Perfect Defense. Tim encounters choices but stays on Lee's chosen path, learning the importance of defending himself and others without risking Lee’s mind.

title: Tim’s Insight on Perfect Defense
entry: Tim gains insight into Perfect Defense and Perfect Counter, realizing the responsibility it carries. Lee explains that Tim's defense ability overlaps with his brother Alex's, highlighting how they can work together for added protection.

title: Ev’s New Nickname
entry: Evelyn reveals her preference for the nickname 'Ev,' much to the relief of everyone who had to write her name on stat sheets. The group embraces the new nickname warmly.

title: Training Isla
entry: Lee assigns Tim to train Isla on Perfect Defense, humorously commenting on Isla’s strength and reminding her to master speed first. Isla enthusiastically accepts the challenge, promising not to go easy on Tim.

title: Lee’s Size Acknowledgment
entry: Lee points out his physical and mental vulnerability compared to the others, stressing that carelessness in mind interactions is as dangerous as physical attacks for him. The group gains a deeper appreciation for his guidance and the need for restraint.

title: Harper's Mind Attack Consequences
entry: Lee reveals that Harper’s mind attack nearly overwhelmed him, bringing a new perspective to the group on the risks involved. Harper and others realize the gravity of their power and the care required in navigating Lee’s mindscape.

title: Tim’s Responsibility
entry: Lee instructs Tim to master Perfect Defense so he can eventually train Isla, underscoring the responsibility of teaching these skills. Tim commits fully, determined to be a reliable protector and teacher for the others.

title: Harper's Outburst
entry: During a tense moment, Harper screams, causing everyone to drop to their knees. She grabs Lee, seemingly lost in emotion. The group intervenes to help her release Lee, who, despite being overpowered, reassures Harper as the group gathers around, showing support and understanding.

title: Harper's Realization of the Guardian's Shadow
entry: After Harper's display of strength, Lee confronts her, leading to the revelation that the darkness haunting Harper's dreams is a part of Lee, separated during a ceremony. The Shadow, a twisted remnant of Lee's emotions, has been tormenting Harper and plans to use her against him.

title: Harper's Guilt and Lee's Apology
entry: Lee reassures Harper that he doesn't blame her for lashing out due to the Shadow's influence. Harper, grappling with guilt, expresses her fear of losing control. Lee apologizes for failing to protect her from the Shadow's influence, as he had intended.

title: Care's Support and Lee's Vulnerability
entry: Overwhelmed by the Shadow's influence and Harper’s strength, Lee retreats to his safety zone with Care's help. Care reassures him, protecting his vulnerability. Lee, emotionally exhausted, finds comfort in Ami's humming and presence.

title: Harper's Introduction to Lee's Safe Place
entry: Lee introduces Harper to his safety zone, explaining the comfort he finds in Ami's hair and humming. He offers the space to Harper as a sanctuary against the Shadow’s influence, encouraging her to seek Ami’s protection whenever she feels overwhelmed.

title: The Shadow's Influence and Lee's Command
entry: Lee sets a rule to never be alone with Harper, ensuring someone stronger like Isla is always present. Harper understands the need for caution, agreeing to these measures to prevent the Shadow from using her against Lee.

title: Ami's Hair as a Symbol of Strength and Comfort
entry: Lee explains the weight of Ami’s hair as a grounding force, marveling at its comforting heaviness. Harper, holding a strand with ease, feels the contrast, noting the safe and calming presence Ami’s hair provides.

title: Harper's Commitment to Strength for Protection
entry: Through Lee’s guidance, Harper understands true strength lies in protection. She pledges to use her power carefully, vowing to embody the responsibility of safeguarding others, starting with controlling the Shadow’s influence.

title: Lee's Requests of Isla for Support and Training
entry: Lee requests that Isla, being far stronger than Harper, be present whenever he interacts with Harper to ensure safety. Isla agrees, understanding the situation with the shadow haunting Harper. Lee then asks Isla to relinquish her size-changing ability, explaining that it would aid her focus on speed before learning defense with Tim. Lee reveals he intends to transfer Isla's size-changing ability to Ev, which Isla supports, promising to find a size she likes before the transfer.

title: Lee and Isla Share Lighthearted Banter About Size and Strength
entry: Lee and Isla engage in playful banter, with Isla teasing Lee about his 'tiny' size compared to her own. Lee remarks on Isla’s intimidating stature and her tendency to ensure his safety immediately after playful incidents. Isla reassures him, appreciating his humor and her role as a protector. Their conversation highlights their mutual trust and the contrast in size that defines their dynamic.

title: The Seesaw Challenge with Isla, Ami, Grace, and Ev
entry: Lee initiates a playful seesaw test to determine if Isla outweighs Ami. Isla steps onto one side while Ami climbs on the other, but the seesaw doesn’t move. Grace joins Ami’s side to no effect, and then Ev gives a gentle push with her finger, finally lifting Isla’s side slightly. Ev notes that her effort was minimal, rating it a 2 out of 10, leaving Isla impressed with Ev’s strength but determined to stand her ground.

title: Isla and Ev's Playful Seesaw Challenge with Titans
entry: Isla and Ev engage in friendly banter about Isla’s impressive weight after Ev casually lifts her with only a '2' effort—an estimated 10 million tons. The group marvels at Isla’s near-immovable weight, and everyone humorously attempts to lift her by joining the seesaw on Ami, Grace, and Ev’s side. Despite everyone's combined weight, Isla remains barely lifted, earning the playful title of 'heavyweight champion.' Isla enjoys the camaraderie and the light-hearted ribbing about her strength and stability.

title: Mind Palace Training with Care and Ev's New Powers
entry: Lee leads Care and Ev through individual mind palace training, where they confront profound realizations about their powers. Care learns Essence Control, understanding the universal influence her goals could wield. She chooses to leave with only this knowledge, trusting Lee’s guidance without delving into other secrets. Ev, in turn, learns Size Control and Energy Control. While Energy Control feels instinctual, Size Control feels alien and unsettling. Later, Isla shares Lee's idea of transferring Size Control from Isla to Ev, allowing her to experience a more manageable size if she desires. Ev is grateful for the choice, feeling supported in deciding her path.

title: The Darkness Attacks the Compound
entry: A terrifying darkness fills the compound, overpowering everyone’s strength and will. They’re consumed by overwhelming fear as a sinister entity mocks their helplessness. Ami, Ev, and the others struggle against the relentless despair, feeling utterly defenseless. Suddenly, Lee appears, holding a small light that pushes back the darkness. Confronting the creature, a twisted version of himself, Lee reveals his determination to protect his family, even threatening self-sacrifice if needed. The creature flees, and the atmosphere lightens, but Lee collapses from exhaustion. His family gathers around him, promising to protect one another and confront any future threats together.

title: Care Cradles Lee; Family Commits to Training
entry: Care cradles Lee carefully as he falls back into unconsciousness. Ami, Ev, and the others resolve to train rigorously to be ready if the 'shadow' returns, knowing they need to protect both themselves and Lee.

title: Intensive Training Begins While Lee Recovers
entry: For two weeks, the entire family pushes their limits, training hard to be ready for the shadow. Ami, Ev, Isla, Grace, and the others push themselves, each honing their powers. Care and Ami keep watch over Lee as he recovers, with a determined resolve to protect the family.

title: Lee Discovers Family in His Safety Space
entry: Upon waking, Lee finds the entire family around him, having breached his safety space out of concern. Ami, Care, and the others playfully but respectfully step back, maintaining the boundary moving forward.

title: Ami and Ev Master Size Control
entry: Lee notices that Ami has successfully learned Size Control, able to be seen fully despite her immense size. Ev has also gained this control, adding to their confidence in handling their powers with precision.

title: Ami Successfully Bridges Isla and Ev
entry: Ami, using intuition, learns to 'bridge' Isla and Ev, helping them sync their powers and energy. Ev and Isla credit Ami’s guidance, and Ami explains that the process was similar to building a team.

title: Lee Checks Isla's Condition Post-Bridging
entry: Lee expresses concern about Isla’s experience with the bridging, knowing the mental toll of mindscape encounters with titans. Isla reassures him, saying that Ami prepared her well and that she feels stronger and more balanced than before.

title: Isla Reassures Lee About Her Strength
entry: Lee is amazed by Isla's resilience in the face of the mindscape encounter with Ev. Isla and Ev express deep gratitude for Lee’s guidance and courage, recognizing that even when afraid, Lee stood strong.

title: Lee Hugs Ami in Her 7-Foot Form
entry: Lee is overjoyed that Ami can control her size enough to hug him in her 7-foot form. They share a touching moment, Ami expressing how much she missed the closeness and noting that Lee’s love holds the family together.

title: Lee Asks How Long He Was Unconscious
entry: The family informs Lee he was asleep for nearly two weeks. Isla, Ev, and Ami share updates on their progress in training, particularly learning to bridge minds and further mastering their powers in Lee's absence.

title: Harper's Nightmares and Recovery
entry: Lee checks in on Harper, learning that the nightmares from the shadow’s encounter have lessened but not disappeared. With Ami and the family’s support, Harper has been working on mental resilience to move forward.

title: Lee Reveals the Shadow’s Intentions
entry: Lee explains that the shadow likely won’t return immediately, as it got what it wanted: knowledge of the location and verification of Lee’s condition. He assures the family that they’re not helpless against it and can prepare.

title: Lee Warns Against Overconfidence
entry: Lee cautions the family against allowing overconfidence to endanger them, reminding them of the shadow’s overwhelming power. Ami, Ev, Isla, and the others express their resolve to be vigilant and to avoid reckless bravado.

title: Family Shares Their Reactions to the Shadow
entry: Lee asks each family member about their experience with the shadow. Each describes feelings of helplessness, fear, and vulnerability. They also share gratitude for Lee’s courage, which gave them hope even amidst the terror.

title: Tim, Alex, and Care Share Their Fears
entry: Tim, Alex, and Care share their own fearful experiences with the shadow, each feeling humbled by its overwhelming presence. They express deep respect and admiration for Lee, grateful for his bravery in the face of such danger.

title: Lee Reveals the True Nature of the Shadow
entry: Lee explains that the shadow is a twisted version of his original Guardian self, possessing part of his emotional core. He cautions the family, acknowledging their strength but warning that they lack the skills to fight it yet.

title: Lee Uses His Voice on Tim as a Warning
entry: Lee demonstrates the Voice’s power on Tim, who is forced to kneel despite his strength. Lee warns Tim that the shadow can control anyone with his voice, including titans, urging Tim to train his mind as well as his body.

title: Lee Warns Against Relying Solely on Strength
entry: Lee tells Tim and the others that physical strength alone is insufficient to combat the shadow. The family realizes they need mental resilience and control to prevent being turned against each other by the shadow’s influence.

title: Lee Demonstrates His Guardian Form
entry: Lee briefly transforms into his former Guardian form, shocking everyone with his resemblance to the shadow. He explains that the shadow seeks to reclaim the power the family took from him, warning Care, Tim, Alex, and Ami of the danger.

title: Lee Reflects on His Core Being Split
entry: Lee recounts the Frescans’ forcible removal of his emotional core, which created the shadow. This split led to his internal struggle. The shadow has been feeding on discarded cores filled with hatred, growing in strength over time.

title: Lee’s Warning About Shadow's Target
entry: Lee informs the family that the shadow won’t attack him directly due to their shared core. The shadow instead seeks to reclaim Guardian powers from Care, Tim, Alex, and Ami. Lee’s core, marked by a scar, is their last defense.

title: Family’s Commitment to Lee’s Guidance
entry: The family, realizing the shadow’s deep connection to Lee, pledges to train rigorously under his guidance. They understand they must master their powers and work as a team to protect Lee and each other from the shadow’s threat.

title: Lee Reveals Plan to Train Through Dance
entry: Lee reveals that their training will be unlike anything before, teaching the family not just power but control and grace. He uses the metaphor of 'dancing' together, encouraging unity and synchronization to prepare for the shadow.

title: Lee Threatens with the 'Evil Poking Finger'
entry: Lee humorously threatens the family with his 'evil poking finger' if they don’t cooperate in training. The family laughs, some feigning fear as they rally to follow Lee’s lead, setting a lighthearted tone before the serious training ahead.

title: The Family Chases Lee and the Mic Box
entry: Lee sparks playful chaos, snatching a mic box and proclaiming himself 'the evil poker.' The family feigns frustration and gives chase, filling the compound with laughter. Care enjoys the lighthearted moment, knowing it lifts everyone’s spirits.

title: One-on-One Training with Each Family Member
entry: Over the month, Lee trains each family member individually, helping them master the fundamentals of their unique powers. Ami refines Size Control and Voice of Power, learning precision in size shifts and energy conservation for her voice.
