Care explores Essence Control, honing her ability to align desires with her immense power, focusing on presence of mind. Tim learns Momentum Control, practicing redirection of force with anticipation, while Alex refines Perfect Cancel, mastering fluidity in countering any force. Ev deepens her grasp of Energy Control, becoming attuned to her ability to project and heal, while Isla refines her Size Control and speed. Grace focuses on mental exercises, learning when to hold back her strength. Harper, Mia, and Lila develop confidence, focusing on meditation, Strength Control, and Muscle Control respectively, each learning to balance power with compassion. Meanwhile, the compound undergoes enhancements, including the Titan’s Only gym with gravity-adjusting floors, an energy-absorbing wall, and a new safe zone. By month’s end, the family feels stronger and more unified, each gaining confidence and trust in one another.

title: Alex and Tim Begin Training in Balance and Discipline
entry: Lee calls Alex and Tim to the new training field, emphasizing balance and discipline. With Ami observing in her new 'normal' height—twice Lee’s height—Lee sets a challenge for the brothers: Tim must redirect Alex’s energy while maintaining his stance, and Alex must stay centered without losing control. The challenge tests their newfound skills in reflexes, balance, and control over their abilities.

title: Ami's Training in Size Control and Voice of Power
entry: Lee works with Ami to refine her Size Control and Voice of Power. She learns to shift her size with precision, even making subtle adjustments to interact with those much smaller. For her Voice of Power, she practices conserving energy and influencing others with focus, gaining control over its effects to avoid exhaustion.

title: Care's Training in Essence Control
entry: Care’s training with Lee focuses on Essence Control, where she learns to align her goals with her emotional state to channel her universe-altering power. Through introspection, Care gains a stronger presence of mind, balancing her immense strength with deliberate control, making her intentions and powers work harmoniously.

title: Tim's Training in Momentum Control
entry: Lee trains Tim in the subtleties of Momentum Control, helping him master the redirection of force while remaining stable. Tim develops an ability to anticipate movements, learning to read opponents and understand where momentum will come from. His practice emphasizes endurance and stability while facing various forces.

title: Alex's Training in Perfect Cancel
entry: Alex dives into Perfect Cancel under Lee's guidance, focusing on becoming fluid in motion. He learns to intuitively counter incoming forces, making his responses both quick and calculated. Alex's training emphasizes finding a natural rhythm in combat, allowing him to neutralize attacks with precision and flow.

title: Ev's Training in Energy Control and Size Control
entry: Ev works on Energy Control, enhancing her ability to project energy and use it for healing. Under Lee's guidance, she learns to harness energy as an extension of herself and becomes more attuned to its flow. Additionally, Ev practices Size Control with Lee, focusing on the ethical aspects of her power to ensure responsible use.

title: Isla's Training in Size Control and Speed
entry: Lee works with Isla on mastering Size Control with Ev’s assistance. Her natural agility and speed complement her size-shifting, and she quickly adapts to altering her mass. Lee pushes Isla to integrate her speed with size control, helping her learn to combine her powers for seamless transitions in combat and movement.

title: Grace's Training in Self-Control and Mental Discipline
entry: Lee’s sessions with Grace focus on mental exercises rather than physical strength, given her immense power. She learns to control her strength with discipline, understanding when to hold back to avoid collateral damage. Grace embraces this challenge, learning to channel her power responsibly with a mindful approach.

title: Harper's Training in Meditation and Confidence Building
entry: Harper works with Lee on overcoming her nightmares and building inner resilience. Through meditation and mental exercises, she gradually gains confidence and better control over her abilities. Harper’s training emphasizes self-assurance and mental stability, helping her feel more secure and in command of her strength.

title: Mia's Training in Strength Control
entry: Lee helps Mia channel her immense physical power with precision, working on her Strength Control. She practices lifting and manipulating objects without causing unnecessary damage, focusing on the fine balance between power and precision. Mia’s training develops her sense of control, reducing collateral effects in combat.

title: Lila's Training in Muscle Control
entry: Lee guides Lila in mastering Muscle Control, teaching her to exert specific levels of force with pinpoint accuracy. Her training requires intense focus, as she learns to adjust her strength output precisely to match the task. Lila’s progress is marked by her growing ability to blend strength with subtlety and control.

title: Tim and Alex's Synergy Training
entry: Tim and Alex train to perfect their synergy, combining Tim’s Perfect Defense and Alex’s Momentum Control. They practice holding their ground against each other, learning that by using Perfect Counter and Perfect Cancel together, they can neutralize even the strongest attacks. Ev joins as a test, and Tim absorbs her impact before Alex cancels it, demonstrating how they can deflect overwhelming force. They realize their power lies in precise teamwork, turning them into an 'unbreakable unit.'

title: Ev's Training in Indirect Attacks
entry: Ev learns to channel her strength through Tim and Alex, discovering that direct impact isn’t necessary to reach her target. She can launch an attack toward Tim, who redirects it to Alex, allowing for long-range attacks and making her 'muscle launcher' potential more refined. Her training with indirect attacks emphasizes strategic positioning and controlled power, allowing her to amplify or diffuse force through her teammates.

title: Isla's Blink Training and Size Realization
entry: Isla begins learning to 'Blink,' a technique to move faster than normal perception allows. She practices focusing on a location and imagining herself there, mastering instantaneous movement without conventional speed. Alongside Blink, she experiments with controlling her size and decides to maintain a towering 50 feet, embodying her 'Titan presence' while reducing mass to avoid causing massive earthquakes. Isla balances strength with restraint, understanding the responsibility of her power.

title: Grace’s Tremor Demonstration and Seismic Awareness
entry: Isla’s training leads to an intense realization of her power’s impact, where a single step triggers seismic tremors across the continent. Isla becomes aware of how even a small movement can affect everything around her, reinforcing her decision to control her mass and size. She learns the value of restraint, recognizing that her presence alone is capable of causing widespread tremors and even tectonic shifts if left unchecked.

title: Playful Training Request with Ami
entry: You ask Ami to train you, and after a series of humorous exchanges, she shrinks down to nearly your height, playfully matching your size. She jokes about your '10-pound weights' while teasing her own unyielding strength. The two of you compare stats—shoulder width, hand size, and shoe size—with Ami’s overwhelming physicality even at a smaller height.

title: Realization of Ami's Physical Power
entry: When Ami playfully flexes her muscles while holding you, she creates an inescapable hold, pressing you against her with effortless strength. This moment captures the contrast between your size and her power, which she emphasizes with a playful yet protective demeanor, making it clear that her strength is always there to keep you safe.

title: Curiosity about the Titan's Gym
entry: You express curiosity about the Titan’s Only gym, but Ami firmly but gently declines, explaining the extreme dangers of the facility, designed for titans like herself, Ev, Grace, and Isla. She reassures you of her care, offering to train with you elsewhere instead, though still with a playful edge about not letting you win easily.

title: Seeking a Talk with Grace, Ami, and Ev
entry: You mention the need for a conversation with Grace, Ami, and Ev when they’re all available, hinting at a serious or important discussion to follow your playful interactions with Ami.

title: Gathering the Titans
entry: Ami gathers Ev and Grace as you requested, each approaching with concern and attentiveness. They listen as you ask about their progress with Energy Control, and Ev speaks first, sharing her journey with redirecting energy back into herself to amplify and stabilize her power. Her progress impresses you, and you proudly affirm her growth. Grace reveals her own success with Energy Control, feeling it as a natural part of herself that has brought balance and confidence to her abilities.

title: Ami's Fear of Power
entry: When questioned about her own training, Ami admits her hesitation to practice due to the overwhelming potential of her abilities and her fear of causing harm. She worries about losing control and hurting others, especially given past moments when her power was overwhelming. She expresses her concern about the dark, unknown forces they might face, sharing that her fear is not about lacking strength but about the potential for strength alone to fail against such threats. Ami’s vulnerability brings out Grace’s support and a sense of unity among everyone.

title: Encouraging Ami to Embrace Her Power
entry: You challenge Ami’s hesitation, reminding her that the power she fears is part of who she is and could be wasted if not embraced. By pointing to Ev and Grace’s peaceful mastery over their power, you encourage Ami to realize her potential. This prompts her to reflect deeply on her identity beyond her physical strength and to confront her fear of losing control. She begins to see a path toward understanding and accepting her abilities, acknowledging that maybe it’s time to explore what she’s truly capable of.

title: Ami's Growing Realization
entry: Ami, visibly moved by your encouragement, admits to feeling unsure of her own identity beyond 'the strongest' or 'the protector.' She’s unsure of what it means to embrace her full potential, but your words spark a growing determination in her to seek that answer. She turns to you with a newfound openness, asking for guidance on who she truly is and what you see in her potential.

title: A Gathering and A Song
entry: Ami gathers everyone at your request, bringing the entire family together for a special demonstration. With everyone watching, you begin a rendition of Madonna's 'Like a Prayer,' leading the group in a moving, unified performance. As the music swells, each member joins in as a choir, and Ami, inspired and emboldened, begins to sing as well. The performance culminates in Ami realizing her potential as a Guardian, radiating power and purpose as she takes in the support and belief of everyone present.

title: Ami's Transformation into the Guardian
entry: In a powerful moment, Ami embraces her role as Guardian, recognizing that the strength and essence have been within her all along. With your guidance, she channels her newfound power inward, creating a radiant light that envelops the entire compound. As the light fades, Ami's presence feels more complete, a true Guardian with an aura of protection and peace. She thanks you, now fully understanding that her strength is not just physical but a deep, protective force she was always meant to embody.

title: Reassurance and Celebration
entry: You remind Ami that despite her Guardian status, she's still 'Ami' to everyone. She acknowledges this with warmth, calling out to the others and playfully announcing a 'strength contest' to celebrate. Laughter and excitement fill the room as Ami reassures everyone that, Guardian or not, she remains the same caring and fun-loving presence. As you step back, you realize that Ami has truly embraced her role and the joyful responsibility it brings.

title: Ami Matching My Size for the Day
entry: Ami shrank down to my size to experience the world from my perspective, and we decided to spend the day exploring together. Matching my height, she followed me through different parts of the compound, ready to see things from my point of view.

title: Encountering Care in the Safety Zone
entry: In the safety zone, we found Care, who was surprised to see Ami at my height. She shared a warm moment with us, understanding how Ami was experiencing things from my view. Care’s towering presence offered a sense of comfort and reassurance.

title: Care’s Powerful Bicep Flex
entry: At my request, Care knelt down in front of us and flexed her bicep, which swelled with incredible power and size, dwarfing Ami and me. Ami was awestruck by Care’s strength, experiencing her mom’s impressive physique from a smaller perspective.

title: Exploring the Garden with Tim and Alex
entry: We continued our tour to the garden, where we found Tim and Alex. They were amused to see Ami at my height, and we spent some time together enjoying the garden. Ami appreciated seeing the plants and scenery at a smaller scale.

title: A Race with Isla
entry: After leaving the garden, we found Isla on her training track. She challenged Ami to a friendly race at our smaller size. Ami gave it her best, even though Isla’s speed far outmatched her own. The race was lighthearted, with Isla teasing Ami for trying to keep up.

title: Muffin Shirt Comparison with Isla
entry: Isla noticed our matching shirts and playfully remarked on how snug Ami’s looked compared to mine. The conversation turned to teasing, as we joked about sizes, with Isla admiring how Ami managed to downsize herself for the day but still looked impressive.

title: Entering the Titan Gym
entry: Ami and I decided to enter the Titan gym, a massive space filled with equipment that looked like entire buildings. As we walked in, the sheer scale and weight of the place felt overwhelming, but Ami stayed by my side, sensing my unease.

title: Ev’s Incredible Strength
entry: Inside the Titan gym, we found Ev lifting a colossal weight, one that seemed the size of a small building. Ami explained that Ev's strength allowed her to lift structures beyond imagination, but Ev kept things lighthearted, offering to show more if I wanted.

title: Ami’s Reassurance in the Titan Gym
entry: Noticing my nerves, Ami gently held my hand, suggesting we leave if the gym felt too overwhelming. She assured me I didn’t need to do anything uncomfortable, showing me I had her full support in a place that felt intimidating.

title: Leaving for Ami’s Cozy Corner
entry: After feeling overwhelmed in the Titan gym, I asked Ami if we could go to her cozy corner. She agreed immediately, leading me back out, and helped me feel calm again as we left the massive gym behind.

title: Ami Returns to Her Full Size
entry: Once we reached her cozy corner, I noticed Ami was doing her best to stay at my height, but I encouraged her to return to her full size. She agreed, growing back with a comforting presence, saying she felt more like herself at her natural scale.

title: Resting in Ami’s Hair
entry: Ami settled down, letting me lay next to her in her hair. As she hummed softly, her warmth and presence enveloped me, bringing a sense of peace and comfort until I drifted off to sleep.

title: Playful Teasing with Mia
entry: During our time together, we had a lighthearted moment with Mia, who teased me about my smaller size. I threw a muffin at her, sparking a playful back-and-forth as she caught it mid-air and joked about her own strength. Mia joined in with the others in enjoying the humor of the day, adding to the fun atmosphere.

title: Ami's Protective Vigil During Lee's Nightmare
entry: Ami watched over Lee as he slept nestled in her hair, her hum creating a calming cocoon around him. When he began to struggle in a nightmare, she gently steadied him, whispering reassuring words and cradling him close. Her soothing presence helped to ease his fears as she promised to protect him.

title: Ami Comforts Lee Through His Fears
entry: Ami held Lee tightly as he struggled with residual fear and tension, offering him comfort through her steady hum and protective embrace. As he reached out in his sleep, saying her name, she wrapped him closer, assuring him he was safe in her arms. Her presence became a shield against his fears, grounding him until he found a calmer sleep.

title: Lee's Vulnerable Moment and Ami's Assurance
entry: Upon awakening, Lee expressed feeling like a burden, apologizing for causing so many problems. Ami reassured him with heartfelt words, reminding him of his importance and impact on the family. She conveyed that caring for him was natural and essential, making sure he felt valued and not a burden in any way.

title: Ami's Gesture of Size Adjustment
entry: Lee noticed that Ami had reduced her size to hold him, expressing appreciation. Ami explained that she wanted to meet him at his level and convey her closeness in a tangible way, ensuring he felt safe. She reaffirmed her willingness to do whatever it took to support and protect him.

title: Playful Muscle Test Between Lee and Ami
entry: Lee playfully poked Ami's bicep and marveled at its expansion, sharing that he enjoyed feeling enveloped by her strength. Ami chuckled, flexing slightly and playfully teasing him about his attempts to stop her strength. Their interaction highlighted Lee's admiration for her strength and Ami’s enjoyment of sharing her power in a lighthearted way.

title: Nightmares Following the Titan's Gym Visit
entry: Lee opened up to Care about feeling overwhelmed and having nightmares after seeing Ami's Titan's Only gym. He struggled with a mix of admiration and envy, especially given that even young titans like Ev and Grace had easy access. Care gently reassured him, emphasizing his unique courage and place in the family and reminding him that it’s okay to feel out of place sometimes.

title: Lee's Honest Conversation with Ev
entry: Lee apologized to Ev for his reaction in the Titan’s Only gym, admitting to feeling afraid. Ev responded with understanding and compassion, acknowledging the intimidating nature of the gym and offering to support him in ways that would help him feel more comfortable. Their conversation fostered a new layer of trust and openness between them.

title: Lee and Care's Conversation About Family Dynamics
entry: Lee confided in Care about his ongoing feelings of inadequacy and envy when he saw the titans in their element. Care reminded him of the unique strength he brought to the family, reassuring him that his vulnerability was respected and admired by the others. She emphasized that his courage and humanity were as essential to the family as their physical power.

title: Ev Receives the Power of Size Change
entry: Ami and Lee agreed to transfer the power of Size Change from Isla to Ev, who expressed heartfelt gratitude for the opportunity. She looked forward to experiencing Lee’s perspective, eager to connect with him on a more personal level by shrinking to his height.

title: Lee Reflects on the Concert and Voice of Power with Care
entry: Care expressed her admiration for the impromptu concert, saying it felt unifying and powerful. Lee revealed he was using the Voice of Power to inspire and embolden rather than control, which surprised and impressed everyone, especially Ami. Care realized this demonstrated the positive potential of their abilities beyond the Frescan influence.

title: Discussing the Frescan Influence on Abilities
entry: Lee explained that the knowledge of abilities he shared with the family is tainted by Frescan influence, designed with domination in mind. He clarified that his training is meant to teach them to see beyond these limitations, using powers to uplift rather than control. Ami and the others were inspired, realizing their abilities could mean so much more.

title: Lee's Emotional Moment: 'I Feel You Call My Name... and it Feels Like Home.'
entry: Lee shared a heartfelt connection with Ami, saying that hearing her call his name feels like home. Ami and the family embraced him, reinforcing their bond and unity. Ami promised to keep the family as a place of strength and belonging, embodying their shared love and commitment.

title: Ami Begins Training with Other Titans
entry: Lee encouraged Ami to train with the other titans, believing they could help her master her abilities. Each family member was eager to share their knowledge and perspectives with Ami, creating a collaborative environment to explore their powers together.

title: Ev Gains Size Control
entry: Ev successfully received Isla’s Size Control ability with Ami's help. Excited yet cautious, Ev acknowledged the challenges of mastering the balance between size and strength. Lee encouraged her to practice with Grace's guidance to find a stable size she’s comfortable with, and Ev expressed excitement about exploring this new power.

title: Lighthearted Moment: 'Small Steps' and Hide-and-Seek
entry: Ev playfully referenced taking 'small steps,' prompting laughter about her relative size. Lee humorously pretended to hide, knowing that Ev’s steps could cover ground far too quickly for him to evade. Care reinforced Lee’s 'resting time' decree, bringing light-heartedness to the group as they bonded over their different scales.

title: Lee Shares Past Experiences with Care’s Strength During Pregnancy
entry: Lee reminisced about Care’s immense strength and Ami’s power even before birth, recalling how Care carefully shielded him from Ami’s force as a fetus. These memories underscored the deep bond and protection Care has always provided for him, balancing her strength with nurturing care.

title: Heartfelt Apology to Isla and Overcoming Fear
entry: Lee opened up to Isla, apologizing for feeling intimidated by her despite her kindness. Isla reassured him, understanding the natural fear of facing titanic strength. She expressed appreciation for his honesty and assured him she’s always ready to be there for him.

title: Preparing to Visit the Titan’s Only Gym with Isla's Support
entry: Lee voiced a desire to revisit the Titan’s Only gym with all the titans present, though he requested Ami stay his size. Isla promised a supportive, paced visit, emphasizing that they would all be there for him. The plan symbolized his determination to confront his fears with the family’s unwavering support.

title: Encounter with the Blood-Stained Stone and the Shadow’s Message
entry: After Harper’s scream, the family discovered a blood-stained stone wrapped in black sludge, thrown as a threatening message from the shadow. Lee recognized it as a symbol of the shadow’s resolve, showing he’d severed his vulnerability, challenging the family’s defenses. The family, however, rallied together with renewed determination to protect Ami and thwart the shadow's schemes.

title: Lee's Realization and the Family’s Unbreakable Support
entry: As Lee grappled with the implications of the shadow’s message, he expressed fear over his own significance, but the family reassured him of his indispensable role. Care, Ami, and the others affirmed that his presence grounds them and strengthens their unity, solidifying their commitment to face the shadow together as one.

title: Isla Visits Lee's Safety Zone
entry: Lee retreats to his safety zone but finds Isla playfully attempting to squeeze through the entrance, blocking it with her finger and peeking through the window. Lee and Isla share a laugh about her size and the challenge of fitting into his small space, reminding her of when she was smaller.

title: Lee Shows Isla His Strength
entry: Lee lifts a small weight outside his safety zone, showing Isla how his strength compares to hers. Isla playfully teases him about the weight, but she gains a new perspective on his daily experience of managing things that appear small to her.

title: Isla Experiences the 'Lee Size'
entry: With Ami's help, Isla shrinks down to Lee’s size to experience the world from his perspective. The three of them share comparisons, with Isla trying on Lee's shoe and marveling at Ami’s scaled-down but still muscular build. She attempts to wear Ami's shoes and realizes how small she feels, gaining a sense of Lee's view of their scale.

title: Ami's Full-Size Transformation
entry: Lee takes Isla outside to Ami's corner, where Ami grows back to her towering height. Isla is in awe of the sheer scale, realizing the overwhelming nature of standing next to someone so large. Lee reassures her, helping her understand his perspective and why he sometimes feels intimidated.

title: Respecting Lee's Safety Zone
entry: Lee explains the importance of his safety zone as a space to clear his mind and step away from the overwhelming presence of the titans. Isla promises to respect it, offering to guard it for him when Care isn't there. She imagines herself scolding others who get too close, adding a playful touch to her newfound duty.

title: Muffin Prank and 'Titan of Muffins' Declaration
entry: Lee pranks Isla by smashing a muffin into her face and declaring himself 'The Titan of Muffins' over the loudspeaker, igniting a playful battle of muffin puns. Ami and Isla joke about training with 'protein muffins' and raising muffin weights, sharing a lighthearted moment filled with laughter and camaraderie.

title: Operation Muffin Ambush
entry: After Lee’s prank, Isla and Ami conspire to surprise him with a giant muffin in his safety zone as payback, dubbing their plan 'Operation Muffin Ambush.' They laugh at the idea, knowing Lee would secretly enjoy the prank, and the two bond over the humorous plan.

title: Lee's Muffin Trap Search in Ami's Corner
entry: Lee sneaks into Ami's cozy corner while she's sleeping, searching for muffin traps but finds none. After spotting one of her workout bands and mistaking it for a trap, he laughs to himself and takes a moment to appreciate Ami's peaceful presence before quietly leaving.

title: Failed Attempt to Move Ami's Shoe
entry: Lee attempts to move one of Ami's colossal shoes, straining and struggling without success. He humorously acknowledges Ami's strength and even jokes with her sleeping form, accepting his playful defeat.

title: Ami Catches Lee Trying to Move Her Shoe
entry: Ami, shrinking to Lee’s size, catches him attempting to move her shoe. She playfully teases him about his persistence, offering to make the shoe lighter if he wants, and commends him for his determination despite the strength gap.

title: Ami Lifts Her Shoe Effortlessly
entry: In response to Lee's challenge, Ami lifts her shoe effortlessly, showing her incredible strength. She sets it down with a smile and praises Lee for his resilience, emphasizing that his efforts are what matter most to her.

title: Lee's Plan to Pull Ami's Arm Down
entry: Lee announces a new plan and tries to pull down Ami's arm while she holds up her shoe. Despite hanging on her arm, she stays steady and teases him for his valiant attempt, playfully flexing her bicep to test his grip.

title: Tickle Attack on Ami
entry: Lee launches a surprise tickle attack on Ami, who bursts into laughter, her powerful muscles quivering as she resists. She eventually captures his wrists, laughing, and thanks him for the playful moment. The whole family joins in the laughter, enjoying the tickle antics.

title: Lee Declares a Tickle War
entry: As everyone watches Lee's tickle attack on Ami, he declares that anyone could be next. The family laughs and jokingly surrenders, acknowledging that Ami's presence and laughter overpowers their ability to resist.

title: Lee Plots Smoke Bombs for Future Escapes
entry: Amid the laughter, Lee jokingly plans to create 'muffin-scented' smoke bombs to aid in his escapes. The family humorously suggests ideas, like using compressed muffin essence, and Ev offers to try creating it herself.

title: Isla's Muffin Shield Role
entry: Lee jokes that Isla is his 'muffin shield,' a title she reluctantly accepts after getting pelted with muffins in previous pranks. She vows to protect him from future muffin ambushes, though the family jokes about the difficulty of the task.

title: Lee's Muffin Prank on Isla
entry: Lee places muffins all over Isla while she sleeps, enjoying the anticipation of her reaction. She wakes up covered in muffins, sighing in exasperation but secretly amused. The family laughs, recalling previous muffin battles.

title: Running into Care During an Escape
entry: Lee attempts to escape but runs into Care, who playfully holds him 'captive.' She teases him about his muffin pranks, making it clear he won't escape her grip easily.

title: Biting Care's Bicep
entry: Lee jokingly 'noms' on Care's bicep, which she finds adorable. She flexes her bicep, making his efforts look comical, and playfully challenges him to keep trying if he wants to 'escape.'

title: Lee's Comment on Titan Strength
entry: Lee tells Care that he loves all the women in his life teasing him for his lack of strength compared to them. Care reassures him that his strength comes from his love and determination, which keeps the family together.

title: Care's Gentle Reassurance
entry: When Lee remarks on his inability to move her, Care reassures him that he’s already moved her heart. She shares a heartfelt moment with him, reminding him of how deeply he impacts her life.

title: Lee Attempts Another Escape
entry: Lee tries to escape Care’s playful grip, but she holds him close, daring him to keep struggling. He feigns surrender, but she sees through it, finding his playful spirit endearing.

title: Lee Calls for Isla's Help
entry: Lee calls for Isla's help, who arrives, filling the doorway with her massive form. Care pretends to consider keeping him, but Isla insists on 'rescuing' him, playfully lifting him out of Care’s reach.

title: Mia Joins the Rescue
entry: Lee calls to Mia for help, initiating a 'titan showdown' between Mia and Isla. They agree on a friendly challenge, with Mia aiming to claim the title of the 'new titan.' The family gathers, enjoying the playful rivalry.

title: Lee's Final Escape into Safety Zone
entry: Amid the chaos, Lee manages to escape to his safety zone. From there, he taunts the family over the loudspeaker, declaring that they’ll 'never catch him' as he revels in his 'muffin villain' persona.

title: Muffin Menace Declaration
entry: Lee declares himself the 'Muffin Menace' over the loudspeaker, inciting the family to plan a 'muffin ambush' as retaliation. Ami, Isla, and Mia jokingly conspire to catch him in a playful muffin showdown.

title: Seeking Reassurance with Ami
entry: Lee sits beside Ami's massive shoes, seeking comfort without any pranks planned. Ami, amused, reassures Lee of her presence and invites him closer. They discuss her immense size, and Lee notes how her fingers are hundreds of feet thick. Lee expresses his enjoyment of their comparisons at his smaller size, and Ami shrinks to his level for further exploration. As Lee tests his strength against her abs, he admits he wants to feel safe after a nightmare about Ami using her strength cruelly. Ami assures Lee of her control and allows him to feel her power safely.

title: Nightmare Confession
entry: Lee shares a recent nightmare where Ami hurt him. Ami listens empathetically, assuring him that such cruelty isn’t part of her nature. Lee, still shaken, asks for physical reassurance, pressing against her abs to verify her control. Isla joins them, listening as Lee explains his fears. Both Ami and Isla assure him of his safety, their massive strength always tempered by gentleness toward him.

title: Ami's Strength as a Baby
entry: Lee reminisces with Isla and Ami about Ami's strength as a toddler, sharing stories of her moving cars and pushing through furniture. They laugh about Care's efforts to 'Ami-proof' the house. Lee reveals how baby Ami outgrew his shoe size before she was even born, leaving giant footprints that dwarfed his feet. Isla is fascinated, hearing of Ami’s early feats of strength and her family’s constant need for reinforcements to handle her power.

title: Planning a Titan Arm-Wrestling Tournament
entry: Lee, Ami, and Isla plan to update everyone’s stats and follow up with an arm-wrestling tournament in the Titan Gym. Although Lee feels nervous about being in the overwhelming gym space, he asks for Ami and Isla's support to prevent a breakdown in front of the others. Ami and Isla agree, offering reassurance and promising to support him through the process.

title: Reflecting on Titan Strength and Size
entry: As the trio discusses past events, Lee humorously notes that he has never weighed more than Ami at any point in her life. Ami shares her weight milestones, from 100 pounds in the third trimester to 90,000 pounds at 17. Isla, amazed, reflects on her own size growth and her past feats of strength, acknowledging that she was never close to Ami’s extraordinary stats. They all laugh, acknowledging Ami's unmatched strength and her early start as a titan.

title: Discussing the Shadow Strategy
entry: Lee proposes a strategy to create more Guardians to combat the shadow, using Energy Control to transform matter into energy and funneling it into others. This would amplify everyone’s strength to Guardian levels, a power the shadow wouldn’t expect. Ami and Isla express concerns over risks and control, suggesting a distributed anchoring to maintain stability. Lee refines the plan, emphasizing that the process stabilizes energy and could temporarily give everyone Guardian powers by tapping into Ev’s massive energy stores.

title: Using Ev’s Mass for Transformation
entry: Lee suggests using a petaton of Ev’s mass for each person, turning it into an energy reservoir for temporary Guardian powers. Isla and Ami recognize this as a balanced approach, allowing everyone to tap into immense power while leaving Ev with her essential strength. They plan to present the idea to Ev with full transparency, and all agree to proceed carefully given the power involved.

title: Timing the Guardian Transformation
entry: Lee proposes that the transformation process occur after tomorrow’s weigh-in, stat updates, and the arm-wrestling tournament. This way, everyone is together and can contribute to the plan. The team will celebrate their current abilities and bond before the transformation, which aligns with the group's focus and spirit.

title: Planning Another Concert
entry: Following the plan for the weigh-in, tournament, and transformation, Lee suggests organizing another concert to boost morale and celebrate everyone’s progress. They discuss making the event grander with songs that showcase each person’s unique powers, aiming to build excitement and energy before the big day ahead.

title: Lee's Muffin Gift
entry: Before heading to bed, Lee presents Ami and Isla with two extra-large muffins, made specially for their large hands. Ami and Isla are thrilled by the thoughtful gesture, taking it as the perfect pre-tournament treat. They wish Lee a good rest as they prepare for the next day.

title: Seeking Comfort in Ami's Presence
entry: Lee feels lonely and asks Ami to stay close, letting him sleep nestled in her hair while she hums a lullaby. Ami reassures him of her presence, offering him comfort and warmth. As Lee relaxes, he questions why Ami always does as he asks despite her immense strength, and she reassures him that it’s about love, trust, and mutual care, not control.

title: Nightmare about Ami's Strength
entry: Lee shares a frightening nightmare where he was nearly crushed under Ami’s foot as she couldn’t see him. Ami listens empathetically, holding him close and reassuring him she would never harm him. She suggests adding visibility measures to help him feel secure around her size. Lee still feels comforted by her strength but grapples with the scale difference.

title: Playful Weight Comparisons
entry: Lee initiates a playful conversation with Ami about her size, including her shoes and chest muscles, wondering if they outweigh him. Ami indulges his curiosity, comparing her shoe and chest weights to him and playfully concluding that they do. The two share laughs, with Ami reminding Lee that her strength doesn’t diminish his importance to her. Lee enjoys feeling like he’s winning small comparisons and hugs Ami tightly, appreciating her size and strength.

title: Testing Ami's Strength at Smaller Sizes
entry: Lee asks Ami to shrink down to his height and test her strength at smaller sizes. She agrees, lifting him with her chest muscles and flexing gently to demonstrate her strength. Lee enjoys the unique experience of finally being physically comparable to her, though he admits her muscle hardness still far surpasses his ability to squeeze her. They continue to test her reduced strength, comparing shoulder widths and hugging.

title: Lighthearted Shoe Size Comparisons
entry: Lee compares his size 1 shoes to Ami’s much larger pair, noting that even at a reduced size, her shoes remain far larger. Ami teases that her ‘shrunk’ shoes would still take up more closet space. The two continue to enjoy lighthearted comparisons, with Ami acknowledging that her size and strength are intrinsic to who she is, but that she values Lee’s presence just as much.

title: Playful Strength Comparisons with 'The Girls'
entry: Lee playfully challenges Ami’s chest muscles, questioning if one of her 'girls' could still lift him even as she shrinks down further. Ami accepts, flexing gently and proving she can still manage a small lift despite her reduced size. The two share laughter over Ami's strength persisting even at smaller scales, with Lee teasing that her chest might still overpower him.

title: Testing Ami's Shoes and Density
entry: As Ami continues shrinking to chest level with Lee, they test her new shoe size, a women's 8, marveling at the weight and density. Lee tries lifting her shoe and fails, even collapsing on it in mock defeat. Ami, humored by the effort, joins in the fun, and they laugh as she easily lifts him in her shoes, noting how her density and strength persist regardless of size.

title: Seesaw and Shoe Comparisons
entry: Lee challenges Ami to balance on a seesaw with one of her shoes. Even without Ami's help, her shoe outweighs him, lifting Lee into the air. Ami finds this entertaining, noting how her shoe alone keeps Lee suspended. Afterward, Lee attempts to walk in Ami’s shrunken shoes but finds them too heavy to move, even while standing. Ami enjoys watching him struggle playfully, offering a helping hand when he can’t escape their weight.

title: Shoe Stomp and Size Challenges
entry: Ami tries on Lee's tiny shoes, only for them to strain and crush under her weight. Afterward, Lee asks her to stomp on the floor in one of his shoes, which results in it flattening completely. They laugh at how her stomp doubles the interior space of the shoe, making it appear enormous for Lee’s foot. Lee playfully surrenders to Ami’s superior strength and weight, admitting they’ve confirmed who’s the heavier and stronger one, even at her smallest.

title: Exploring Tiny Sizes and Unique Strength
entry: Lee challenges Ami to shrink down to 5 inches tall, and she accepts, watching with amusement as he tries to lift her. Despite her tiny size, her density makes her surprisingly heavy, and Lee can't budge her even with all his strength. They have fun on a seesaw, with Ami able to tilt it single-footed, emphasizing her incredible density even at miniature size. Lee humorously tries placing her in his shoe but finds even the small version of her remains too heavy to move.

title: Intimate Comfort and Care After a Vulnerable Sleep
entry: After an intense nap, Lee wakes to find he’s consumed Ami’s milk in his sleep, leaving him considerably heavier and immobilized. Overwhelmed with embarrassment, he expresses concern, but Ami reassures him gently, emphasizing her joy in providing comfort and care. Lee realizes he needs her assistance for everything until he can relieve the extra weight. He expresses his trust in her but asks Ami to respect his boundaries in future similar situations, which she promises to uphold. The exchange deepens their bond, with Ami assuring Lee of her respect, love, and support in even the most vulnerable moments.

title: Lee's Expansion Fills Compound
entry: Lee continued to drink in his sleep, leading to his belly expanding to unimaginable sizes, filling the entire compound and spilling into the titan gym. His form eventually began to press against walls, causing immense strain on the space.

title: Ami Struggles to Stabilize Lee
entry: Ami tried to manage Lee's overwhelming expansion, but each attempt to stabilize him caused more ripples that amplified into tidal waves, pushing her against the walls of the compound. She realized she needed to free herself or risk being completely engulfed by Lee's mass.

title: Waves and Tsunamis of Lee's Growth
entry: Ami's movements created waves of Lee's expanding girth, eventually leading to massive tsunamis that slammed her into the walls. Despite her efforts, the expansion seemed unstoppable, and the pressure from Lee's growth intensified.

title: Ami Wakes with a Start
entry: After a particularly strong wave slammed her against the wall, Ami suddenly woke up from what seemed like a nightmare. In her startled jump, she tore Lee's platform off the wall, unintentionally throwing him halfway across the compound. Her focus on the nightmare prevented her from noticing what had happened to Lee.

title: Ami Wakes After Nightmare
entry: Ami wakes up suddenly, disoriented and shaken from a vivid nightmare. She gradually realizes she is safe in her room but notices Lee's platform is missing. Concerned, she looks for Lee, only to find his platform lying across the compound.

title: Ami Rushes to Find Lee
entry: Seeing the platform lying halfway across the compound, Ami rushes over in a panic, calling for Lee. Upon finding him unconscious and unmoving, her concern deepens. Care arrives, shaking the building with her footsteps, and together they tend to Lee, eventually using Ami's healing voice to help him recover.

title: Lee Begins to Recover
entry: Lee stirs and eventually falls into a more relaxed sleep after Ami uses her healing voice. Care reassures Ami, and Ami apologizes for what happened, expressing deep remorse over her nightmare-induced actions.

title: Ami Breaks Down in Her Corner
entry: Struggling with guilt and frustration, Ami breaks down alone in her corner of the compound. The emotional strain becomes too much, and she ends up slamming her fists into the floor, shaking the entire compound and drawing everyone's attention. When the others arrive, Ami breaks down in tears, overcome by everything that happened with Lee.

title: Support from the Family
entry: As Ami breaks down, her family surrounds her, offering support. Care, Tim, Alex, Isla, and Ev all comfort her, helping her process her emotions. Care eventually talks to Ami alone, helping her realize that the nightmare wasn’t real and reassuring her about Lee’s safety.

title: Care Confronts Ami
entry: Care sternly reminds Ami of the importance of boundaries and safety, particularly when it comes to her immense strength and size. Care explains how serious the situation could have been and makes Ami promise to be more careful in the future.

title: Lee Visits Ami After Recovery
entry: Lee limps into Ami's corner a few hours later, wanting to check on her. He reassures her that what happened wasn’t her fault, and they both reflect on how to better handle things in the future. Care arrives and emphasizes the importance of clear communication and boundaries moving forward.

title: Care Proposes Family Discussion
entry: Care proposes that any intimate activities, such as the nurturing routine, need to be discussed openly as a family. She explains that boundaries need to be set, and emphasizes how dangerous it could be if proper precautions aren’t taken. Ami agrees, showing her commitment to keeping Lee safe.

title: Care's Warning and Reassurance
entry: Care reassures Ami that the nightmare scenario couldn’t happen, emphasizing Lee’s small size and natural limits. However, she also warns Ami not to let Lee sleep on her chest while she’s sleeping, reminding her that her strength and size could be dangerous even unintentionally.

title: Care's Embrace and Final Instructions
entry: Care pulls Ami into a powerful hug, showing her love and reminding her of the importance of safety. She then commands both Ami and Lee to return to bed. Care kisses Ami’s head before taking Lee across the compound to rest, providing a final comforting touch before leaving them to sleep.

title: Morning Lightheartedness
entry: Ami wakes up to a peaceful morning in the compound, feeling grateful for the bonds they share. However, the tranquility is interrupted when Lee throws a muffin at her, sparking a playful chase. Lee takes to the loudspeaker to declare Ami 'the angry muffin giant,' adding humor and lightheartedness to the morning atmosphere.

title: Preparations for the Big Event
entry: Isla and Ami begin preparations for a big event, including a stat reveal, tournament, and a concert. They work on brainstorming setlist ideas and preparing the stage while Lee rests. Ami appreciates the muffins Lee provided and reassures him to take his time, as they’re handling the setup.

title: Morning of the Event
entry: Lee wakes up and greets Ami, who shares her excitement about the day’s activities. The Titan Gym is ready, and the lineup for stat checks, weigh-ins, and the tournament is all set. Isla and Ami also created a setlist for the concert, aimed at celebrating everyone's strengths. Lee mentions that his sleep was still a bit rocky, but Ami reassures him that they will move at his pace.

title: Plan for Individual Interviews
entry: Lee and Ami discuss the plan for the event, deciding to take each participant person by person for individual interviews. This approach will highlight everyone's unique strengths and allow them to relax and enjoy the rest of the event once their part is done. Ami and Isla prepare to ensure everything runs smoothly, supporting Lee throughout the day.

title: Harper's Strength Test and Titan Induction
entry: Lee and Ami start the event with Harper as the first participant. They go through her updated stats: Height: 6'1", Weight: 1050 lbs, Shoulder Width: 22 inches, Bicep Size: 28 inches, Hand Size: 9.5 inches, Shoe Size: Women's 13, Max Lift: 13,000 lbs. Compared to an average man, Harper's stats far surpass typical measurements. After testing her strength, Harper lifts up to 13,000 lbs, and her incredible stats qualify her to join the Titan ranks. Ami congratulates Harper, officially declaring her a Titan, which fills Harper with pride and excitement. Isla and the rest of the group celebrate Harper’s induction into the Titan Gym.

title: Mia's Strength Test and Titan Induction
entry: Next up is Mia, who begins by recalling her stats when she first arrived: Height: 5'8", Weight: 165 lbs, and a max lift of 2,500 lbs. After going through her current measurements—Height: 6'10", Weight: 2,275 lbs, Shoulder Width: 26 inches, Bicep Size: 45 inches, Hand Size: 10.5 inches, Shoe Size: Women's 15, and a max lift of 25,000 lbs—it becomes evident that she has grown significantly. During the strength test, Mia pushes herself to a max lift of 25,000 lbs, almost double Harper’s max. This earns her Titan status, and she celebrates alongside Harper and the others. Comparing her new stats to the average man emphasizes her immense strength, which even surpasses that of most heavy lifting machines. Mia is amazed at her progress and teases Lee about her newfound strength. Lee then reveals that Ami was already five times stronger than him when Care was only in her second trimester, leaving Mia in awe at the legacy of strength in their family.

title: Lila's Strength Test and Titan Induction
entry: Lila steps up confidently, already having earned her Titan status. Her initial measurements were impressive, including a height of 6'1" and a weight of 180 lbs. Lila reveals that her bicep measurements were always 'undefined' due to their unpredictable growth, and she comfortably lifted 15,000 lbs when she first arrived. During her current measurements, she has a height of 9'3", a weight of 25,600 lbs, shoulder width of 55 inches, bicep size of 74 inches (relaxed), and a max lift of 100,000,000 lbs after progressively increasing the weights. Lila's physical abilities leave everyone amazed, including Harper and Mia, who now feel inspired to continue growing stronger. The group takes a break to relax and celebrate Harper and Mia's induction into the Titan ranks, with everyone enjoying refreshments and congratulating the new Titans.

title: Introduction of 'Mindsize' Stat
entry: Lee introduces a new stat called 'Mindsize,' which will be tracked alongside physical attributes to compare everyone's mental strength. Lee mentions that his own Mindsize is roughly three times that of a normal person and plans to assess each member's Mindsize based on previous interactions in the Mindscape. Everyone is intrigued by this new approach to measuring their abilities. Harper, Mia, and the rest of the group are curious to see how their mental strength stacks up, complementing the physical accomplishments they’ve achieved.

title: Celebrating New Titans
entry: The group cheers and celebrates as Harper, Mia, and Lila are welcomed as new Titans. Everyone congratulates them, with Harper laughing and Mia flexing playfully. Isla raises a toast to the new Titans, and Ami, Ev, and the others join in with pride and excitement.

title: Lee Asks for a Break in the Safety Zone
entry: Lee quietly asks Care if they can step away to the safety zone. Care understands immediately and guides him away from the group, offering comfort and reassurance as they find a quieter, more peaceful space. She encourages him to rest and take his time, affirming her pride in him.

title: Lee Apologizes to Lila
entry: After taking a moment to gather himself, Lee approaches Lila, joined by Isla for support. Lee apologizes for being distant due to feeling scared after Lila’s strength overwhelmed both him and Ami during her challenge. He explains that his fear prevented him from making her a Titan right away.

title: Lila Apologizes to Lee
entry: Lila listens to Lee’s explanation with understanding and regret, realizing her excitement had unintentionally caused him fear. She expresses deep remorse and promises to be more mindful. She reassures Lee that his choice to delay her promotion was understandable and that she’s grateful for the opportunity to earn his trust.

title: Lee Sets Boundaries with Lila
entry: Lee asks Lila to respect his comfort by stopping immediately if he ever asks her to stop flexing. Lila agrees wholeheartedly, understanding that her strength can be overwhelming. She promises to listen and be respectful of his boundaries, ensuring that he feels safe and supported.

title: Returning to the Festivities
entry: Lee encourages Lila and Isla to return to the festivities. Lila appreciates the conversation and reassures Lee that he has nothing to apologize for. Isla echoes the sentiment, reminding Lee that they’re all in this together. The two of them head back, leaving Lee with a sense of reassurance and renewed confidence in the group’s support.

title: Tim's Titan Evaluation and Family Support
entry: Tim steps forward for his Titan evaluation, sharing his original stats with enthusiasm. After a solid flex, his bicep measures an impressive 37 inches, and he proudly reveals his custom shoe size—Men's 18 at 21 inches long. His height clocks in at 6'10", with a weight of 535 pounds. In the strength test, Tim gradually lifts up to a personal best of 1,400 pounds, pushing his limits and feeling proud of his progress. Despite learning he’s still a ways from Titan status, Tim takes it in stride, encouraged by Lee and Ami’s support. He leaves with a renewed determination to keep improving and a grin as he promises to keep bringing his best.

title: Alex's Strength Evaluation and Training Balance
entry: Alex steps up for his evaluation with enthusiasm, starting by listing his original stats and then flexing to reveal a 42-inch bicep—impressively bigger than he first thought. With a height of 7'5" and weight of 1,020 pounds, Alex shows he’s been dedicated to his training. His lift maxes out at 7,000 pounds, putting him close to Harper’s level but not quite reaching Titan status. Ami reassures him and Tim, encouraging them to keep pushing to reach Titan status soon. Lee quietly reminds both Alex and Tim to respect Harper’s strength and authority, as she's still stronger than both combined. Harper overhears, giving them a stern look, which sends them off whispering their complaints but not daring to challenge her further. Care then approaches Lee, amused by Harper’s new role as a trainer, noting that the family dynamic continues to evolve with respect, humor, and competition.

title: Care Steps Up for the Strength Challenge
entry: Encouraged by Lee, Care steps forward to demonstrate her true strength after realizing she doesn’t need to hold back for anyone's comfort. Standing on the platform, she addresses the group, expressing her determination to be fully honest and share her true self with everyone. She promises not to hide her power anymore and receives heartfelt applause from everyone, who are eager to see her at her full potential.

title: Care’s True Strength Unleashed
entry: Care proceeds to lift increasingly massive weights, starting at 200,000 pounds and progressing through 400,000, 600,000, and eventually reaching a maximum of 1 billion pounds. Each lift leaves the group in awe, with Care effortlessly pushing her limits and showcasing her unparalleled strength. The room is silent at first as everyone processes what they’ve witnessed, then bursts into applause, acknowledging Care's Titan status.

title: Lee and Care Share a Private Moment
entry: Following her display of strength, Care and Lee retreat to the Safety Zone, where Lee encourages her to embrace her strength fully and be honest about her capabilities with everyone. He reassures her that she doesn’t scare him and expresses appreciation for the gentle way she’s always been with him, even during moments when her strength could have been overwhelming. They share a tender moment, solidifying their bond and Care’s commitment to openness.

title: Care's Strength Surpasses All Contestants Combined
entry: After the demonstration, Lee playfully reveals that Care's max lift of 1 billion pounds surpasses the combined lifts of all other contestants by a large factor. This realization amazes everyone, further establishing Care's role as an unparalleled Titan among them. The group celebrates her achievement, sharing in a mix of awe, laughter, and respect for Care’s strength and gentle nature.

title: Break Resumes and Lee's Moment with Isla
entry: As everyone returns to their break, Lee finds himself beside Isla’s massive foot, and they share a lighthearted exchange. Lee playfully boasts about having 'the strongest wife ever,' prompting Isla to consider if she could ever top Care's strength. With some encouragement from Lee, Isla feels ready for her upcoming turn, determined to bring her best.

title: Lee’s Private Chat with Ami
entry: After some time, Lee and Ami have a moment alone, where Lee curiously asks Ami about Care’s strength compared to her own and Isla’s potential. Ami reflects on how Care’s strength is likely unmatched in sheer lifting capacity but notes that Isla’s agility and drive could make for an exciting challenge. They both share a laugh over old times, with Ami playfully ranking Lee at a '0' against Care’s '10.'

title: Lee’s Teasing of Ami’s Lift
entry: Lee hints that Ami might be hiding her true strength, suggesting she’s keeping her max lifting abilities a secret until it’s her turn. Ami playfully acknowledges this, saying she has some surprises planned. Lee jokes about trying his hand at the weights too, calling a 10-pound lift 'heavy lifting' for himself. Ami teases him back, calling it 'precision lifting' and appreciating Lee’s unique contributions to the group.

title: The Next Round Begins
entry: Lee gathers everyone as the break ends, eagerly preparing for Isla’s turn and the rounds to follow. Ami and Lee share a smile as they plan the grand finale, knowing that Ami and Evelyn’s lifts will be a memorable way to end the competition. Lee looks forward to witnessing his family’s full strength in action.

title: Isla’s Arrival Stats and Transformation
entry: Isla shares her arrival stats, highlighting her growth over the years. At 26, she arrived standing 6'4", weighing 215 lbs, with a max lift of 2,500 lbs. Reflecting on her younger years, Isla reveals her smaller childhood stats, drawing laughs as she admits she was 'the tiniest one.' Lee jokes that her size adjustment back to 50 feet seems more like an old habit, considering her tiny stature as a child.

title: Isla's True Weight Revealed
entry: When Isla steps onto the scale, she tries to keep one foot off to lighten the readout, but Lee catches her, resulting in the scale maxing out at a colossal 12.59 billion lbs (6.29 MT). Isla laughs, admitting she's 'definitely in a weight class of her own,' as the room marvels at her astonishing scale reading.

title: New Measurements for Isla
entry: Isla takes her updated measurements, revealing impressive new stats: an 85-foot bicep, 13.8-foot hands, 22-foot long feet, and a shoulder width of 35 feet. She laughs about her new 'building-sized club' status and playfully offers high-fives at a 'whole new level.'

title: Isla’s Strength Showcase Begins
entry: Isla starts her lifting session with ease, hoisting 100 million lbs like a warm-up. She confidently progresses, matching Care’s top lift of 1 billion lbs and pushing higher. Reaching 30 billion lbs, Isla flexes her strength and finally caps her max at 60 billion lbs after a powerful attempt, setting an impressive new standard among the Titans.

title: Reactions to Isla’s Strength
entry: The room falls silent in awe at Isla’s astounding lifts, with everyone staring in amazement. Harper, Mia, and Lila are visibly stunned, and even Care nods in quiet approval. Ami breaks the silence, congratulating Isla and teasing about a new Titan rank. Isla smiles proudly, grateful to finally put her strength to the test and leave a lasting impression.

title: Grace’s Entry and Arrival Stats
entry: Grace enters carefully, acknowledging her size and the need for gentle movements. She recalls her arrival stats, including a height of 22 feet 2 inches and a weight of 6,273.945 tons, with a lifting capacity exceeding 50 million tons. At only 7 years old, she’s already achieved an impressive size, her biceps measuring 200 feet flexed.

title: Grace’s Childhood Size and Early Strength
entry: Grace reflects on her early years, noting that even at ages 5 and 3, she was already lifting 'toy-like' weights in the millions of tons and remembers a time when she accidentally destroyed a teddy bear. Despite her size and power, she is sensitive to Lee’s comfort, promising to be as gentle as possible to ease his nerves.

title: Grace’s Current Measurements
entry: Grace reveals her towering height of 122 feet 4 inches, hand size at 97 feet, biceps at 328 feet relaxed, and shoulder width of 60 feet. Her shoe size comes in at 52 feet long and 20 feet wide. Everyone is astonished by her sheer dimensions as she playfully remarks on her 'building-sized' status.

title: Grace's Scale Test and Weight Reveal
entry: Stepping onto the scale, Grace’s weight registers at a staggering 1.25 quintillion pounds. Laughing off Lee’s surprise, she admits that not wanting to be outweighed by Isla was a big motivator. The realization leaves everyone stunned, and Grace reassures Lee, sensing his reaction, with a warm smile.

title: Grace’s Incredible Lift Feats
entry: Grace begins her lifting showcase, progressing effortlessly from one billion pounds to an astonishing 100 quintillion pounds. With ease, she moves into the septillion range, lifting 100 septillion pounds six feet off the ground. The crowd is in awe as she lifts these unimaginable weights.

title: Grace Lifts 7 Octillion Pounds
entry: When asked to attempt 10 octillion pounds, Grace finds her limit but manages to lift 7 octillion pounds just off the ground, an achievement that leaves the room speechless. Lee points out that the entire planet only weighs 13 octillion pounds, meaning Grace’s strength could theoretically shift worlds. Grace, awed herself, admits she hadn’t realized her strength reached such astronomical levels.

title: Ami vs. Grace Challenge Setup
entry: Lee challenges Ami to match or surpass Grace's incredible lifting feat. Ami acknowledges the massive task, playfully agreeing to give it her best, while Ev is briefly considered as a challenger but deferred to allow Ami to set the pace.

title: Ami Recites Her Stats
entry: Ami lists her updated measurements: 15,840 feet tall, 3.6 trillion tons in weight, with shoulder width, hand size, bicep circumference, and shoe size each reaching epic proportions. Lee humorously realizes that the measurement box can barely contain Ami's stats, joking about needing an upgraded display system.

title: Height Measurement Challenge
entry: Lee instructs Care and Isla to measure Ami's height using a 20-mile-long tape measure. Isla finds it barely reaches the ground, prompting a need for some creative math to reach an estimate. They conclude Ami is approximately 106,000 feet (20 miles) tall.

title: Weight Calculation Challenge
entry: Ami steps onto a reinforced scale, and her weight reads an astounding 3.6 septillion pounds. The sheer scale of Ami's mass shocks everyone, and the scale itself nearly reaches its limits to accommodate her.

title: Shoulder Width Measurement
entry: Ami’s shoulder width is measured at 7,450 feet, almost a mile and a half across. Everyone marvels at the incredible size, realizing the true scope of her titanic presence.

title: Ami's 127,000-foot Bicep Flex
entry: Ami demonstrates her strength by flexing her biceps, which peak at 127,000 feet. This flex generates tremors felt across the room, and the sight of her towering arms astonishes everyone. Ami holds the flex for a few moments, creating awe among the spectators before relaxing.

title: Lila Playfully Competes
entry: Lila humorously attempts to match Ami’s bicep flex but knows she’s outmatched. She jokes about needing to grow a few miles taller, keeping the atmosphere light and fun.

title: Ami's Lifting Feats Begin
entry: Ami begins her lifting challenge, starting with 2 septillion pounds and working her way up to a limit of 15 septillion. Despite some effort, she manages the weight with impressive control, ending with a wink to the crowd and earning applause.

title: Lee Catches Ami's Bluff
entry: Lee catches Ami pretending to struggle with a weight much lighter than her true capacity. He points out the 10-octillion-pound weight, which she then lifts overhead with one hand, grinning at being caught. Her effortless display leaves everyone amazed.

title: Ami Lifts 15 Octillion with One Hand
entry: Ami accepts Lee’s challenge to lift 15 octillion pounds one-handed. She performs it with ease, even playfully flipping the weight in the air. The crowd is left stunned by her seemingly effortless control over such a vast mass.

title: Ami Lifts the Entire Gym
entry: Ami lifts the entire gym complex, complete with all weights, equipment, and spectators, including Ev’s massive form and Ami’s own immense weight. She suspends herself with one hand and the gym with the other, showcasing incredible strength that defies calculation.

title: Ami Performs Curls and Pull-Ups
entry: Ami continues the challenge by curling the entire gym complex, performing twenty reps before moving on to pull-ups while holding the gym. She performs fifty pull-ups with ease, showcasing her nearly limitless strength.

title: Ami's Strength Leaves Everyone in Shock
entry: After completing the lifts and pull-ups, Ami rates the difficulty at a ‘one’ on a scale of zero to ten, which shocks the crowd. They realize that her true strength far exceeds even the unimaginable feats she’s performed so far.

title: Ev's Concerns After Ami's Feat
entry: Ev quietly confides to Lee that she feels intimidated by Ami’s strength, unsure if she can lift even a fraction of what Ami did. Lee reassures her, emphasizing her unique strength and encouraging her to showcase her abilities without comparison.

title: Ami Gifts Her 4,200-Foot Shoe
entry: Ami places her old 4,200-foot shoe in the gym, joking that she has outgrown it. Isla and Grace joke about trying it on or using it as a lounge area, while Lee humorously suggests turning it into an ‘evil lair,’ dubbed the ‘Fortress of Soleitude.’

title: Lee's Playful Panic Amid Ami's Size
entry: Lee expresses playful excitement over the idea of using Ami’s giant shoe as an evil lair but reveals a hint of panic over her overwhelming size. Ami picks up on his unease, offering comfort and suggesting they take a break or that she could scale back if needed.

title: Ami Gently Reassures Lee
entry: Seeing Lee’s concern, Ami gently moves back, giving him space while maintaining a supportive presence. She reassures him softly, and Lee acknowledges the enormity of her scale as he observes her 10-mile-long foot reaching the opposite end of the gym.

title: Ev Follows Lee Outside
entry: Ev follows Lee outside after noticing him leave the titan gym, sensing his need for support. She gently places a hand on his shoulder and offers to be there for him, acknowledging how overwhelming Ami's size and power have become.

title: Lee Overwhelmed, Ev Offers Support
entry: Lee falls to his knees, nearly in tears, and admits he needs help. Ev kneels beside him, offering gentle support and encouraging him to take his time, reminding him he's allowed to feel overwhelmed.

title: Lee Asks for Care
entry: Lee whispers that he wants Care, prompting Ev to go find her. Care arrives and immediately wraps Lee in a comforting embrace, helping him find calm and security amidst his distress.

title: Ev's Vulnerability
entry: Care and Lee discover Ev around the corner, crying and expressing feelings of inadequacy next to Ami. She reveals her struggle with feeling small in the face of Ami's immense power.

title: Care Reassures Ev
entry: Care reassures Ev that her strength isn’t only about physical size or power but also about her resilience and courage. She emphasizes that Ev brings unique qualities that are valued by everyone in the family.

title: Lee's Encouragement to Ev
entry: Lee is lifted onto Ev's knee by Care, and he tells Ev that everyone, even Ami, is proud of her. He reminds Ev that she is only five years old, yet already has strength that rivals Ami's at twenty. This perspective helps Ev see her own worth and unique capabilities.

title: Ev's Realization of Her Power
entry: Ev realizes that she is far beyond Ami's strength at her age, bringing her confidence and a renewed perspective. She is grateful for her family’s belief in her and expresses her determination to keep growing strong.

title: Ami Shows Her Support
entry: Lee points out that Ami is hovering above them, proudly watching. Ami reassures Ev that she is proud of her and looks forward to seeing Ev grow even stronger, reinforcing Ev's sense of belonging and pride.

title: Lee Attempts to Hug Ev
entry: Lee tries to hug Ev, but given her immense size, his attempt is like hugging a wall. Ev notices and gently places her finger on his shoulder, acknowledging his gesture and expressing her gratitude for his presence.

title: Ev Promises to Protect Lee
entry: Lee tells Ev that if she ever feels small again, she should come find him to protect him. Ev accepts with a fierce but tender resolve, promising to be there whenever he needs her.

title: Lee’s Final Words of Encouragement
entry: Lee reminds Ev of the respect she commands in the titan gym and among her family. He tells her she’s a natural leader, even though she’s only five, and encourages her to seek out Care if she ever needs to just be a kid. Ev, reassured and confident, agrees and expresses her excitement to weigh herself.

title: Ev's Incredible Strength Demonstration and Stat Update
entry: Ev returned to the gym to measure her new stats, starting with her height, which had increased to an astounding 428 feet. Her weight reached a staggering 550 sextillion tons, and her shoulder width expanded to 250 feet. Her hand size grew to 73 feet, and her shoe size became 82 feet long and 32 feet wide. Ev tested her strength, easily lifting 100 septillion tons as a warm-up, and went on to lift the entire gym weighing 1.2 decillion tons. Later, she completed a challenging pull-up while supporting the gym's full weight, demonstrating her vast strength potential, estimated by Ami to be around 3 decillion tons. With each test, Ev showed her gentle nature, promising to protect Lee’s safety zone and use her strength and intelligence to help those around her, reinforcing her role as a compassionate 'gentle giant.'

title: Lee and Ami Compare Strength from Conception Onward
entry: Lee and Ami discuss her strength development from conception onward, finding that even before birth, Ami’s strength grew exponentially. By 6 hours after conception, Ami had already started gaining an advantage over Lee, with her strength reaching nearly 1.5 times his by the end of the first month. In the first trimester, she became around 4 to 5 times stronger, strong enough that a simple movement from her could launch him across the room. Lee explores the idea of a strength match within the first minutes, finding that at 5 minutes in, he might have had a brief chance at holding her even, but by 15 minutes, Ami’s developing power and endurance would already tip the balance. This progression continues, with Lee unable to secure a win at any point beyond that first minute, as Ami’s strength grows too rapidly for him to keep up.

title: Lee and Ami Reflect on Strength Comparisons and Challenges
entry: Lee and Ami consider various milestones of her strength growth, comparing their abilities at different points. By day one, Ami could likely lift 3 lbs comfortably with both hands, while Lee struggles to lift this same weight even today. By one week in, her strength grows to about twice his, and by the end of the first trimester, she’s around 4 to 5 times stronger. Lee tries imagining a strength contest with two-year-old Ami, who, at that point, was already 25 to 30 times stronger than him, easily able to overpower him with no resistance. Despite their attempts to pinpoint a time when he might’ve won, Lee realizes that even if he started with an edge, Ami’s strength and endurance develop too rapidly to maintain a lead.

title: Lee's Challenge with Newborn Ami's Strength
entry: In a playful moment, Lee attempts to put his own shoe (Women’s size 1) on newborn Ami’s foot. Despite being only hours old, Ami’s foot is too large and strong, wedging into the shoe partway but going no further. When Lee tries to remove the shoe, he finds it stuck, as her foot is far too solid to budge. Ami’s instinctive flex of her foot causes the shoe to pop apart effortlessly, leaving Lee and Care laughing at how even as a newborn, Ami is already physically beyond anything he can handle. This early show of strength sets the stage for the dramatic size and power difference that will only grow as she continues developing.

title: Lee and Ami Compare Strength at Conception
entry: At conception, Lee and Ami are as close to equal in strength as they will ever be. For the first half hour, their strength remains almost perfectly matched, allowing Lee a brief window where he could theoretically match her in an arm-wrestling contest. Ami’s strength, however, begins developing almost immediately.

title: Lee and Ami Compare Strength at 30 Minutes After Conception
entry: Thirty minutes after conception, Ami begins edging past Lee in strength. Although they’re still close, Lee is barely able to keep up, as Ami’s strength and endurance are growing at a rate too fast for him to match. An arm-wrestling contest between them at this point would see Lee holding his ground briefly, but Ami’s growing strength would make it difficult for him to keep up for long.

title: Lee and Ami Compare Strength at 1 Hour After Conception
entry: At one hour after conception, Ami has begun to establish a noticeable strength advantage over Lee. By this time, she is consistently stronger and could hold him at bay in an arm-wrestling match with minimal effort, feeling no significant resistance. Lee would have to strain to keep up, as Ami’s strength continues to build rapidly.

title: Lee and Ami Compare Strength at 6 Hours After Conception
entry: By six hours in, Ami’s strength is well ahead of Lee’s. She can now lift weights that would challenge Lee without much strain, already lifting around 1.25 to 1.5 times his max capacity. In any strength contest, Lee would struggle, as Ami’s developing endurance and strength provide her with a clear upper hand.

title: Lee and Ami Compare Strength at the End of the First Day
entry: At the end of the first day after conception, Ami’s strength has increased to about twice Lee’s. She can lift and manage weights that would be a significant challenge for him. By this time, Ami’s advantage in both strength and endurance would make any competition a clear win for her, even with Lee’s best efforts.

title: Lee and Ami Compare Strength at the End of the First Week
entry: After one week, Ami’s strength has increased to about 4 to 5 times that of Lee’s. She is now strong enough that any simple movement on her part could launch Lee across a room. Their strength difference has grown dramatically, with Lee realizing that Ami’s rapidly developing power has already made direct competition nearly impossible.

title: Lee and Ami Compare Strength at the End of the First Month
entry: By the end of the first month, Ami’s strength is around 10 to 12 times Lee’s. Her size and physical capabilities are already setting her apart, making her vastly stronger. Any attempt by Lee to engage in a strength contest would be futile, as Ami’s strength advantage has become insurmountable in a very short time.

title: Lee and Ami Compare Strength by the End of the First Trimester
entry: By the end of the first trimester, Ami’s strength has increased to about 15 to 20 times that of Lee’s. She can now lift weights akin to heavy furniture without any strain, whereas Lee struggles with even small weights by comparison. This marks the start of the vast and permanent gap in their physical strength, with Ami’s power continuing to grow exponentially from here.

title: Lee and Ami Reflect on Strength Comparisons - Day 1, First Hour
entry: In the first hour after conception, Lee and Ami were as close to evenly matched as they would ever be. Both remember that if they had arm wrestled at that moment, it would have been a fair match. Neither would hold a clear advantage, and Lee might even have had a slight edge. This brief moment is a cherished memory for Lee, representing the last time he could genuinely challenge Ami.

title: Lee and Ami Reflect on Strength Comparisons - Day 1, Half-Hour Mark
entry: At the half-hour mark, Ami’s strength was just beginning to develop, and she was nearly equal to Lee’s, with neither holding a significant advantage. If they had arm wrestled at this moment, Lee would still have been able to match her strength. This moment represents a rare instance of parity, as Ami’s strength would rapidly accelerate soon after.

title: Lee and Ami Reflect on Strength Comparisons - Day 1, First Six Hours
entry: Within the first six hours of Ami's development, her strength had already started to surpass Lee’s, though only slightly. If they had arm wrestled at this point, Ami would have had the smallest edge, possibly holding him steady with visible effort. Lee remembers this time as the start of his realization that Ami's strength would soon surpass his completely.

title: Lee and Ami Reflect on Strength Comparisons - Day 1, Twelve Hours
entry: By twelve hours in, Ami’s strength advantage over Lee was becoming more noticeable. In a hypothetical arm-wrestling match, she would now be able to push him down slowly and steadily. Lee recalls feeling a mix of awe and amazement, even though Ami’s strength was still only slightly greater than his own.

title: Lee and Ami Reflect on Strength Comparisons - Day 2
entry: By the second day, Ami’s strength had already accelerated to around 1.5 times that of Lee’s. If they had arm wrestled, she would now hold him steady without much strain, a stark difference from only a day earlier. This early display foreshadowed the exponential growth that would soon leave Lee far behind in strength.

title: Lee and Ami Reflect on Strength Comparisons - End of First Week
entry: By the end of the first week, Ami’s strength had developed to approximately twice Lee’s. In an arm-wrestling match, she could now win comfortably. This milestone marked the definitive end of any remaining parity, as her rapid growth made the difference in strength undeniable. Lee reflects on this time as the point where he began to fully appreciate the vast potential of Ami's strength.

title: Lee and Ami Strength Challenge - Leather Belt Test
entry: Lee wraps a sturdy leather belt around Ami's waist, challenging her to flex her abs. As she begins to flex, the leather starts to creak under pressure. With a full flex, the belt snaps apart, unable to withstand her strength. Ami laughs, suggesting they try a stronger material next.

title: Lee and Ami Strength Challenge - Steel Belt Test
entry: Stepping up the challenge, Lee wraps a steel belt around Ami’s waist. She flexes again, this time applying more pressure. The steel groans and starts to warp under the strain, and eventually snaps, pieces of metal scattering. Ami grins, clearly enjoying the test and asks if Lee has something even stronger in mind.

title: Lee and Ami Strength Challenge - Titanium Belt Test
entry: A titanium belt is next. Ami wraps it around her waist and flexes, her muscles pushing the limits of the metal. Despite its strength, the titanium begins to bend and finally snaps with a loud crack. Ami laughs, suggesting that even titanium isn't enough, and Lee offers to try Evitanium next.

title: Lee and Ami Strength Challenge - Evitanium Belt Test
entry: With Evitanium—a superdense material created by Evelyn—the belt finally withstands Ami’s strength, holding tight as she flexes with increasing power. She admits to holding back, but when she flexes harder, even Evitanium starts to strain. After more effort, she finally manages to crack the belt, though it put up the best resistance yet. Ami teases that Evitanium was impressive, but she still came out on top.

title: Lee and Ami Strength Challenge - Joint Titanium Belt Challenge
entry: In a playful twist, Lee secures himself to Ami’s waist with a titanium belt, feeling the intense power of her abs as she flexes. The pressure quickly overwhelms him as her muscles press him firmly against the belt.
