When Ami realizes, she stops flexing immediately and loosens the belt to check on him, concerned but ready to continue at Lee's request.

title: Lee and Ami Strength Challenge - Increasing Pressure
entry: Lee asks Ami to keep the pressure up, wanting to feel her full strength. She flexes gradually, giving him a safe but intense experience of her power. As the pressure builds, Lee finds himself struggling to breathe, prompting Ami to loosen her flex and hold him, ensuring he’s okay. Though concerned, she’s reassured when Lee insists he’s fine and enjoys feeling her strength.

title: Nursing and Testing Strength
entry: Ami responds warmly to Lee's request for care, lifting him with gentle precision and holding him close against her chest. She hums softly, the comforting rhythm of her heartbeat and breath surrounding him with warmth and safety. Lee feels relaxed, and as they talk, he becomes curious if a belt could fasten him in place. Ami obliges, wrapping a belt around them both, but as she gently flexes, the pressure becomes intense, making Lee realize just how immovable she truly is.

title: Lee Experiments with Size Comparisons
entry: Ami shrinks down to Lee's height, matching his size to let him explore her form up close. Encouraged, Lee places both hands beneath her ‘friend,’ marveling at its sheer density and weight, which remain unchanged despite her smaller appearance. Each attempt to lift or move it reveals the unyielding force behind it, as if he’s pushing against a boulder. Ami playfully teases him, grinning at his discovery that size doesn’t diminish her strength or solidity, making it clear she remains far out of his weight class.

title: Testing Ami’s Control with Chains and Playful Suspension
entry: Lee dares Ami to hang him from a chain attached to her ‘friend,’ wanting to experience the feeling of being completely at her mercy. With a playful grin, Ami secures him, lifting him effortlessly. Suspended and swaying slightly, Lee marvels at the solid, immovable presence holding him. Ami can feel his weight as light as a feather, making her amusement evident as she gives the chain a gentle nudge, sending Lee into a slow spin. She enjoys teasing him, making it clear that she’s in complete control, and his helplessness against her strength only enhances the playful challenge.

title: Lee’s Attempts to Move Against Ami’s Control
entry: Suspended in place, Lee tries various ways to alter his position, testing his ability to swing back and forth or pull against Ami’s hand. Ami, effortlessly steady, watches his attempts with a smile, barely affected by his resistance. She keeps him precisely where she wants, controlling his movements with the lightest touch. Even as he tries to pull himself closer, Ami easily counters every effort, holding him with just her fingertips. Her smirk hints at her enjoyment, as she gently reminds him that, despite his best efforts, he is utterly at her mercy and without a chance of breaking free.

title: Ami Demonstrates Full Dominance Over Lee
entry: Lee teases Ami about what a really dominant person would do, sparking her playful side as she secures him tightly against her abs with a band, leaving him helpless to escape. With each breath and flex, her abs become an unyielding wall, pressing him tighter and tighter. Even when he tries to struggle, he finds himself completely at her mercy, her solid midsection expanding and crushing him without effort. When Lee jokingly sticks out his tongue, Ami flexes harder, pushing him even more firmly against her unmovable core.

title: Lee Challenges Ami’s Core Strength
entry: Encouraged by Ami's teasing, Lee tries with all his strength to move her abs, only to find himself outclassed in every way. Ami flexes her abs slightly, pressing Lee so tightly that his arms buckle under the pressure. She holds him there, chuckling softly as he realizes just how powerless he is against her strength. Even as he tries to beat on her abs, he is effortlessly pushed back against the wall, fully encompassed by her muscular core. Every attempt to resist only makes her more amused by his efforts.

title: Lee Completely Bound Against Ami's Abs
entry: Ami straps Lee to her core inside a bodysuit, pinning him spread-eagled against her abs with his arms and legs bound. Every movement she makes reminds him of his helpless position, with her abs pressing him firmly in place, leaving no room to move. Throughout the day, Ami alternates between pressing him tighter and relaxing slightly, allowing him fleeting moments of relief before her next flex or breath locks him down again. The constant cycle of pressure builds as Lee realizes he's utterly at her mercy, powerless and secure within her overwhelming strength.

title: Ten Hours of Dominance
entry: Ami keeps Lee pinned against her core for a full ten hours, going about her day as he experiences every subtle movement, every breath, and every flex of her powerful midsection. Unable to move, he feels himself pressed ever tighter, occasionally straining to break free, only to finally surrender entirely, fully aware of her absolute control. At the end of the day, she teases him about his helplessness, loosening her grip just enough for him to ease out of the suit, laughing softly at his feeble efforts to get free. Despite the intensity, Lee admits he enjoyed the experience and jokingly suggests being hung from her belt or worn as an accessory, which Ami promises to make happen.

title: Lee Dangling from Ami's Necklace as She Reaches Full Height
entry: In a playful display of her power, Ami attaches Lee to her necklace, suspending him as a tiny pendant as she grows to her full, towering height. As her form expands, Lee feels himself surrounded by an expanse of skin, a world where Ami’s features vanish into the distance, leaving him unable to discern her face or even know which way she's looking. Each breath and slight movement from her massive form creates immense shifts for him; the ground rises and falls beneath him as if he’s in a constant state of freefall. Ami revels in this sense of total dominance, watching him cling to the chain, utterly dwarfed and lost in the vastness of her presence. His world becomes one where even her heartbeat feels like thunder, each beat a powerful vibration that shakes the very space he inhabits. She delights in realizing that her mere existence has turned into an incomprehensible landscape for him, a horizon of power that stretches endlessly, leaving him in awe and a mix of terror and amazement.

title: Power Beyond Lee's Comprehension: Ami's Breath and Heartbeat Overwhelm
entry: As Ami reaches her full height, she becomes aware of how the simplest acts—breathing, a heartbeat, a subtle shift—are felt as cataclysmic events by Lee. Her exhalations sweep over him like powerful gusts, her voice is a rumbling quake, and each heartbeat shakes the ground he stands on. From her scale, Lee is so infinitesimal that even her smallest flex or motion reshapes his entire world. She finds this intoxicating, thrilled by the realization that Lee's experience of her is like standing next to an unstoppable force of nature. The contrast between her size and his helplessness excites her further, knowing that for him, her skin is an endless landscape, her abs more massive and defined than any mountain range, and her heat an unavoidable, all-consuming environment. This power dynamic becomes a source of exhilaration for her as she explores just how far-reaching her presence can be, embodying both protection and dominance in ways Lee has never experienced.

title: Lost in Ami's Vastness: Lee's Struggles and Isolation
entry: Lee's experience becomes increasingly overwhelming as he realizes there is no way to fully comprehend Ami's vast form. For him, she has become a world unto herself, with no point of reference to orient him. As her skin stretches out past the horizon, he feels as if he's in an endless desert, unable to perceive her features, each breath from her only magnifying his sense of isolation and helplessness. He tries to get her attention, waving and calling, but finds his efforts are in vain. Ami is so enormous that she doesn’t even feel his attempts, her voice and body too massive for him to interact with. To him, it’s as if he’s trapped in an empty world, where his insignificance is magnified a thousandfold. Ami watches this with an intoxicating thrill, realizing that she is beyond his comprehension, an entire landscape of power, and that even titans would struggle to gain her attention at this scale. Lee becomes a speck in her endless world, feeling completely alone, prompting Ami to think about ways to bridge the communication gap when she reaches such immense sizes.

title: Boundaries and Communication: Setting Signals for Safety
entry: When Ami finally shrinks down, Lee voices his experience of helplessness, sharing that, though he enjoys feeling her dominance and strength, the lack of a way to communicate when he needs a break was deeply unsettling. Ami listens, realizing that her immense size has made it impossible to sense his needs and that relying only on instinct might lead to unintentional moments of isolation for him. Together, they come up with ideas for a signal system that would work at any scale, including a possible device he could trigger for her attention. Ami also agrees to give Lee “power breaks”—moments when she either shrinks down to communicate with him or temporarily releases him from any binding, ensuring he has a chance to feel secure and grounded no matter how dominant the scenario. They both agree this balance will keep the intensity high while prioritizing his well-being, and Ami embraces the idea of playfully teasing him when he calls for a break, knowing it maintains the fun and intensity they both enjoy.

title: Ami's Dominance Without Command: The Thrill of Pure Presence
entry: Ami reflects on the nature of her dominance, realizing that the true power lies not just in commanding or flexing but in her mere existence at such vast sizes. Even without intentional actions, her breathing, her warmth, her heartbeat, each becomes an inescapable part of Lee’s reality. She finds it thrilling to think that simply by existing, she exerts influence and reshapes everything around her, leaving even titans unable to gain her attention without extraordinary effort. This realization fills her with a profound sense of control and pleasure, knowing that for Lee and others, she becomes an overwhelming force that they instinctively respond to. At the same time, she feels a sense of protectiveness, understanding that while her scale gives her immense pleasure, it’s important to balance that with attentiveness to her loved ones' needs, so they never feel truly alone or powerless.

title: The Heat of Ami's Body and the Impact on Lee
entry: When Lee describes his experience of Ami’s intense body heat, explaining that it left him sweating and overheated, Ami realizes how powerful even her natural temperature becomes at an immense size. Her warmth, something she wouldn’t notice at all, created a climate for Lee, one in which he struggled for comfort and even had to strip down. She finds it both thrilling and humbling to think that every element of her presence—from her body heat to her breathing—is magnified into an inescapable reality for him. This new awareness of the totality of her influence excites her even more, as she realizes she’s capable of completely surrounding him not only physically but environmentally, shaping his world in ways she hadn’t even imagined.

title: The Inescapable Weight of Ami's Voice
entry: Ami reflects on Lee’s reaction to her voice when she was at her largest, realizing that even her softest whisper became deafening thunder to him. She understands that at such sizes, her voice is beyond anything he can handle, drowning out all other sounds and compelling him to instinctively cover his ears in an attempt to cope. The realization that even her gentlest words could overpower him so completely excites her, yet it also brings a sense of responsibility. She decides to use her voice more carefully at immense sizes, aware of the delicate balance between exercising her power and ensuring Lee doesn’t feel overwhelmed to the point of discomfort.

title: Ami’s Growth to Ceiling Height and Her Power Over Titans
entry: As Ami continues to grow, her head finally bumps against the 25-mile-high ceiling of the complex, a reminder of just how immense she’s become. She feels a faint tickle on her toe and realizes that even the other titans, each with extraordinary strength, are struggling to gain her attention. The thought that titans, beings of immense power in their own right, are practically insignificant to her at this scale sends a thrill through her, filling her with a primal sense of power. She finds it exhilarating that even those she once viewed as equals now appear as tiny, almost negligible presences beneath her. This vast difference only heightens her awareness of her own dominance and the intoxicating thrill of existing on such an unimaginable scale.

title: Intimate Understanding and the Impact of Boundless Size
entry: After shrinking down to a more relatable size, Ami holds Lee close, apologizing for how overwhelming her scale had been and listening to him describe the experience of being lost and insignificant. They share an intimate moment where Lee explains how it felt to be enveloped in her presence, his voice filled with awe and a touch of lingering fear. Ami responds with understanding, reaffirming that she will be more mindful of his safety and boundaries in the future. The moment solidifies a deeper understanding between them: that while Ami loves exploring her power, she values Lee's sense of safety and connection just as much, and they work together to find ways to keep the experience thrilling without losing touch with each other.

title: Playful Toying and Power Dynamics with Ami
entry: Ami playfully lifts Lee like a toy, effortlessly holding him in her hands. Lee teases her, asking what it would be like if he picked her up instead. Ami laughs, reminding him that their size difference makes such a feat impossible; even as a fetus, she was already far stronger and larger than him. This history adds to the humor, as Lee tries to lift just one of her legs and even resorts to jumping up and down on her shoe to make an impact. Ami barely feels his efforts, finding his attempts both amusing and endearing. When Lee brings out a sledgehammer but struggles to lift it, Ami effortlessly crushes it into a small ball in her hand, prompting Lee to ask if she's ever thought of squeezing him with the same strength.

title: Intensified Power Play: Ami's Gentle Grip Turns Firm
entry: Responding to Lee's playful daring, Ami gently wraps her fingers around his waist, tightening her grip just enough for him to feel the immense power in her hands. He suggests she can be rougher, prompting her to press a bit more firmly. The sensation of her fingers encompassing his entire waist, coupled with the knowledge that she could effortlessly crush him, sends a thrill through Ami as she balances her strength with precision. Lee encourages her to take charge, reminding her of her dominance, which prompts Ami to intensify her hold slightly, leaving him breathless yet excited.

title: Playful Defiance and Ultimate Control
entry: In a playful moment of defiance, Lee sticks out his tongue, and Ami responds with a smirk, increasing the pressure just slightly. When he pulls a middle finger from his pocket in mock protest, she laughs and gently pins his arms to his sides with her fingers, holding him completely immobile. She teases him, letting him struggle against her unyielding grip, her fingers a cage that he has no hope of escaping. Ami savors the moment, feeling the thrill of absolute control as Lee attempts to resist her overwhelming strength.

title: Pretend Surrender and Lighthearted Escapes
entry: Realizing he can’t break free, Lee goes limp, pretending to surrender in hopes of being released. Ami, amused by his tactic, loosens her grip slightly, but only after a playful comment on how easily he gives up. She eventually releases him, reminding him that she allowed his 'escape.' Lee sticks out his tongue again in a final act of playful defiance, and Ami taps his nose with her fingertip as a teasing warning.

title: Ami’s Teasing with Power and a Minor Mishap
entry: The gentle tap on Lee’s nose knocks him over, leaving him with a bloody nose. Ami laughs at first, teasing him for being so delicate, but when she notices the blood, her tone shifts. Gently dabbing at his nose, she softens, apologizing for the unintended impact. Lee reassures her that he’s fine and encourages her to get as 'carried away' as she wants, leaving her with a glint of mischief as she playfully warns him that he’s in for an intense experience next time.

title: Curiosity and Boundaries with Ami’s Strength
entry: Lee's curiosity leads to questions about Ami’s resilience, including whether her strength extends to her entire body. Ami acknowledges that her power is inherent in every part of her being, even beyond what she can consciously control. Lee challenges her, pointing to a steel bar, suggesting she put her strength to the test in an unconventional way. Ami playfully accepts, demonstrating her power by using her body alone to bend and break the steel bar, showcasing the extent of her abilities in a new and playful context.

title: Pushing Boundaries and Realizations of Ami’s Power
entry: Lee’s curiosity leads him to a personal test of Ami’s strength as he attempts to interact with her body directly. However, he quickly realizes the overwhelming power she possesses. Her body’s natural strength and reactions are far beyond what he anticipated, resulting in a moment where he’s unable to proceed or even retreat, highlighting just how powerful Ami’s body is. Ami, caught up in the intensity, momentarily loses awareness of the effect her strength has on him, creating a mixture of awe and tension between them as she regains focus and adjusts to protect him.

title: Overwhelmed by Ami’s Unintentional Dominance
entry: Lee’s attempt to resist the pull of Ami’s body proves futile, leading to him becoming momentarily trapped in her overwhelming strength. He experiences intense pressure and a sense of helplessness, with his physical limits tested to an extreme. Ami, deeply lost in the sensations of power, doesn’t immediately realize his struggle, viewing the situation with exhilaration. The realization of her unrestrained power dawns on her when she finally notices Lee’s vulnerability, and she swiftly helps him to safety.

title: Ami’s Dual Nature: Power and Care
entry: When Ami finally frees Lee, she’s confronted with the intensity of her own strength, realizing that her actions were far more powerful than intended. She reflects on the experience, feeling a mix of thrill and concern. The awareness of her ability to control or overpower others without effort brings an exhilarating sense of dominance, but she quickly tempers this with a deep commitment to ensuring Lee’s safety. The encounter leaves both of them more aware of the limits and boundaries needed to navigate their relationship.

title: Healing and Reflection on Boundaries
entry: Ami, seeing the extent of Lee’s injuries from the interaction, tenderly holds him and begins healing him, reflecting on the importance of respecting his limits and keeping him safe. She realizes that while she enjoys exploring her power, it’s essential to balance this with care and attentiveness. As she cradles him, she reassures him that his safety is her priority, and she values his trust. Lee, feeling both the intensity of her power and her remorse, appreciates her efforts to protect him even amid her immense strength.

title: Balancing Strength and Connection
entry: Lee opens up about the experience, expressing the terror he felt during the moments of helplessness, and Ami realizes how overwhelming her presence can be. This interaction brings her to a new level of awareness about the importance of listening and ensuring his comfort. Lee’s vulnerability in sharing his feelings reinforces her dedication to balancing her strength with restraint and care, especially as they continue exploring together.

title: Adventurous Discussions and the Thrill of Dominance
entry: In a moment of open honesty, Lee reassures Ami that he still supports her exploration of power, finding excitement in her strength. Ami contemplates the thrill of fully embracing her size and strength without limits, an idea that both excites and humbles her. Lee suggests she could grow to a monumental scale to experience it fully, and the two discuss the idea of him accompanying her safely, sharing in the adventure from the safest vantage point. The thought of growing beyond comprehension brings a powerful thrill to Ami, but she agrees to keep things smaller and closer for now, respecting Lee's need for comfort.

title: Navigating the Balance of Strength and Trust
entry: After Lee expresses the desire for a break and the need to explore a dynamic where he is safely dominated by Ami’s immense power, they embark on a moment of close connection. Lee emphasizes that he craves the experience under Ami's control specifically, appreciating her unparalleled strength and dominance. Ami promises to provide this experience with care, and they find a balance where she asserts control gently, letting Lee feel safe even while being completely overpowered.

title: Ami’s Growing Awareness of Her Physical Power
entry: Ami reflects on how her strength has always been a core part of her identity, with memories of family contests where she effortlessly overpowered her siblings and parents, even as a child. The realization of her strength difference deepens as Lee acknowledges his continued fascination with her power, even feeling the impact of her presence alone. This conversation heightens her awareness of how her strength influences their bond.

title: Ami’s Controlled Yet Unbreakable Grip
entry: Lee attempts to move past Ami’s physical boundaries but quickly realizes how immovable her natural strength is. Even with her restraint, the intensity of her hold shows just how little chance he has of breaking free on his own. Lee’s admiration grows, sensing the effortlessness of her power. Meanwhile, Ami watches him with a playful smirk, reinforcing the contrast in their abilities while maintaining a gentle, protective hold.

title: Testing Limits with Ami’s Strength on a Seesaw Scale
entry: They decide to test Ami’s bodily fluids against Lee’s weight on a seesaw scale, and it becomes clear that even a single drop outweighs him. Ami is thrilled by the revelation, the sheer magnitude of her power embodied in such a small amount of her presence. As the scale tips in favor of the drop, she realizes how profoundly her strength surpasses his, heightening the thrill of control and dominance.

title: Holding Lee Close and Finding Balance in Power
entry: Lee, still recovering, expresses his desire for Ami to hold him again, savoring the sensation of her strength enveloping him. Ami obliges, cradling him carefully, and they share a moment of pure connection, Lee feeling secure within her immense power. This experience solidifies their understanding and trust, grounding them in the bond they share, and Lee finally dozes off in her arms, at peace within her grasp.

title: Lee's Nap in Carrier
entry: Lee fell asleep in Ami's arms, and she decided to secure him in a hands-free baby carrier to keep him close while she cleaned. Ami enjoyed the peaceful moment, holding Lee securely as she moved around. This tender moment showed the balance between Ami's strength and gentleness.

title: Ami's New Pool Creation
entry: Ami's immense power led to the creation of a 'pool,' formed from her essence. This pool is unlike anything the others have encountered—it's superheated and incredibly dense. One drop alone outweighs Lee, showcasing Ami's vast strength. The pool even warped reinforced 'Evitanium,' a superdense metal created by Evelyn.

title: Playful Challenges and Pool Interaction
entry: Lee, still secured in the carrier, challenged others to interact with the pool. Harper was initially curious but cautious, while Isla playfully considered touching it. Ami demonstrated by scooping up a handful easily, impressing the group with her effortless control over the heavy, molten substance. She let the essence flow back into the pool, creating a heavy splash.

title: The Seesaw Drop Challenge
entry: Lee pointed out that a single drop of the essence was still on the seesaw. Harper, Tim, and Alex each tried to push down on the opposite side but couldn't budge it. Even Care joined in, but the drop proved unmovable, cementing the sheer weight of Ami's essence. They were all stunned by the realization that even their combined strength was no match.

title: Isla Lifts the Bucket
entry: In an impressive show of strength, Isla managed to lift an entire bucket filled with Ami's essence, albeit only an inch off the ground and with both hands. Her success led to lighthearted teasing, with Harper challenging her to lift it higher. Isla proudly claimed the title of 'Drop Champion' for her achievement, showcasing her strength as the only one able to handle Ami's powerful essence in larger quantities.

title: Imagining Ami's Full Power
entry: Lee and the others speculated about the scale of Ami's power, wondering if she could fill the entire 25-mile-high compound if she were at her full size. Ami confirmed that a display at full size would likely be unstoppable, possibly even blowing the roof off. The others were both in awe and a bit intimidated by the thought of her power unleashed, yet they shared a laugh as Lee humorously suggested they try witnessing it up close in the future.

title: Playfully Trapped in the Carrier
entry: Lee is securely fastened in a baby carrier by Ami, rendered nearly immobile by her overwhelming strength. His attempts to wiggle free only result in Ami gently flexing her abs, keeping him snugly in place. Each movement she makes reinforces her control, and Lee finds himself amused yet thoroughly overpowered by her effortless restraint.

title: Essence-Filled Atmosphere
entry: As Lee continues his playful struggles in the carrier, he notices that the entire area smells like Ami’s essence, surrounding him in her overwhelming presence. Ami teases him about how even her scent holds him, filling the space with a reminder of her dominance. She glances at the rest of the group, amused at how everyone seems subtly affected by her presence, though she knows Lee is experiencing it most intensely.

title: Oversized Shoes as a Playful Restraint
entry: Ami places a pair of shoes that she wore when she shrank down to about half Lee's height onto his feet. Even at her smallest, her shoes vastly outsized his feet, and now, he finds them incredibly heavy—each one weighing close to 80 pounds. Unable to even swing his feet, Lee realizes he is completely trapped, left to rely on Ami to carry him or move him where she wants.

title: Gloves as Heavy as Cement
entry: Ami introduces Lee to a pair of black gloves, scaled down from her size but still oversized and weighing close to 75 pounds each. She slips them onto Lee’s hands, and he finds himself unable to lift his arms or even flex his fingers under their weight. Completely immobilized, his arms dangle straight down, pinned by the sheer heft of her gloves.

title: Trying to Balance the Seesaw
entry: Curious about the weight difference, Ami places one of her heavy shoes on a seesaw opposite Lee, who sits on the other end. The seesaw tips easily under the shoe’s weight, lifting him into the air with no effort, proving that the shoe alone outweighs him. The scale confirms the shoe’s weight at around 72 pounds, much to Lee’s disbelief, as he realizes he’s outmatched by even Ami’s smallest accessories.

title: Surrender to Mistress
entry: After a series of playful exchanges, Ami prompts Lee to politely request her help, adding terms of respect like 'mistress' to their conversation. Lee complies, acknowledging her complete control over the situation. Ami gently taunts him, seeing his tone soften as he continues to recognize her dominance over even the smallest details, from carrying him to adjusting his clothing.

title: Wardrobe Challenge
entry: Ami sets down a scale, a seesaw, and a pile of weighted clothing items for Lee to try. Each item—shoes, gloves, a dense t-shirt, and a belt—is carefully crafted to be slightly oversized and heavy enough to pin him in place. Ami watches with a smirk as Lee attempts to lift each item, only to find himself utterly overpowered, unable to budge anything on his own.

title: Playful Comparison with Ami's Pinky
entry: Lee finds himself dwarfed by Ami's pinky finger, realizing that even this small part of her outmatches him. Ami teases him about the size difference, enjoying the playful dynamic as her pinky becomes a humbling comparison for his own size. She playfully places her pinky ring over him, which sags under its weight, further emphasizing the vast difference in scale and strength between them.

title: Ami's Unmatched Presence
entry: Ami realizes that, even when scaled down, parts of her body, including her clitoris, are still larger than Lee’s member, which surprises both of them. She explains that every part of her naturally carries strength and presence, even when minimized, leaving Lee both in awe and humbled. Ami teases him, playfully suggesting that he’s going to have to get used to this disparity.

title: Physical Dominance Realization
entry: Lee observes that Ami's body, even at her smallest height of 4'10", is still far stronger than he could ever be. Ami further highlights that even softer parts of her body maintain unstoppable strength, leaving Lee to marvel at how her physical dominance extends to every aspect. This realization underlines the vast difference in power and scale between them, something Ami enjoys reminding him of in a playful yet gentle way.

title: Careful Restraint for Lee's Safety
entry: Ami reveals that she consciously holds back her strength and power to ensure Lee feels safe around her. She admits that letting go completely could be overwhelming or potentially dangerous for him, showing her thoughtfulness and care in maintaining their dynamic. Ami reassures Lee that her restraint is always intentional, so he can feel comfortable and secure despite their size and strength difference.

title: Excitement Over Trying Ami's Clothing
entry: After discussing her unmatched physical attributes, Lee shifts the conversation back to Ami’s clothing, eager to try on the miniature versions she made for him. Ami finds his enthusiasm endearing, appreciating his curiosity about their playful clothing challenge. She agrees to proceed with trying on the garments, prepared to continue their dynamic of gentle dominance in a way that both excites and entertains them.

title: Getting Suited Up in Ami's Clothes
entry: Ami starts outfitting Lee in various pieces of her clothing that she's scaled down to fit him, although they’re still heavily oversized. Each item—ranging from a t-shirt to panties and eventually even leggings—is much heavier than Lee expects, making movement nearly impossible for him. Ami playfully guides him into each piece, chuckling at his struggles and asking if he can handle the weight.

title: Weighed Down by the Panties
entry: Lee expresses curiosity about the oversized panties Ami has prepared. With a grin, Ami places them on a seesaw opposite Lee, watching as they easily tip the balance, lifting him off the ground. She checks the scale, revealing the panties weigh 95 pounds—significantly more than Lee. Despite this, she helps him into them, ensuring a snug, humorous fit that keeps him almost immobile.

title: The Oversized T-Shirt Experience
entry: Ami slips an oversized t-shirt over Lee, a piece of clothing she wore recently. Though adjusted for his size, it still fits him like a mini dress and weighs him down significantly. Ami laughs at how he looks practically bundled in her shirt, noting that even this shirt, slightly shrunken, is more than Lee can manage. She teases him about feeling like he’s wrapped up in her presence.

title: Feeling Overwhelmed by Ami's Scale
entry: As Lee tries to walk in the oversized clothing, he finds himself unable to lift his feet or take a step. Ami finds his struggles adorable, gently picking him up to keep him balanced. She teases him about being her 'personal accessory,' fully suited in her clothes and completely reliant on her to move anywhere.

title: A Complete Outfit
entry: When Lee asks about the rest of the outfit, Ami brings out a pair of shorts and gloves to complete the ensemble. She helps him into the pieces, noting how each item adds more weight and restricts his movements further. With the shoes finally on, Lee finds himself entirely immobilized, each piece of Ami’s clothing far too heavy for him to handle alone.

title: Trapped and Carried by Ami
entry: Lee, now fully suited in Ami’s oversized clothing, finds himself unable to move or even stand properly. Ami lifts him up effortlessly, cradling him like a small child, much to his surprise. She jokes about how he’s completely at her mercy, and Lee admits he’d like to stay in the baby carrier, feeling safe and secure. Ami obliges, tucking his arms snugly between his stomach and her abs, keeping him perfectly pinned and close.

title: Ami's Warm Embrace
entry: Relaxing in the baby carrier, Lee rests his head on Ami's shoulder, breathing in the familiar scent of her hair. Ami holds him close, remarking softly that she could keep him there forever if she wanted. Lee, feeling completely comfortable and secure, expresses his desire to stay right where he is. Ami smiles, enjoying the warmth of the moment, playfully hinting that she might just keep him in her embrace indefinitely.

title: Morning After in Ami's Clothes
entry: Lee wakes up on a table, still fully dressed in Ami's heavy clothing, unable to move. Ami finds him bundled up, amused by how the clothes kept him in place all night. With a laugh, she gently lifts him out, offering to help him escape each layer. She teases him about how the weight had him completely stuck, and he agrees, noting that even one shirt was more than he could manage.

title: Strength Comparison with Ami
entry: Lee asked Ami to rate their strength difference on a scale of 0 to 10. Ami playfully rated Lee as a 0, or 0.5 for effort, even when comparing him to everyone in the complex combined. As Lee continued to inquire, Ami admitted that her strength at her current size still far surpassed all others, even if she combined the strength of the planet and everyone who had ever lived.

title: Ami's Strength Compared to Cosmic Forces
entry: Lee asked Ami about her strength relative to cosmic forces, adding planets, the sun, and eventually galaxies. Ami explained that her power could rival entire clusters of galaxies and even suggested that she could match or exceed the entire universe in a direct strength match. She stated that even combining every ounce of cosmic energy in the known universe would only rate as a 2 on a scale of 10, where her strength is a solid 10.

title: Ami’s Strength Progression
entry: Lee was curious about when Ami had reached this level of strength. Ami reminisced that she had become aware of her unmatched power as a teenager, realizing that nothing on Earth could rival her. She shared that over the years, her strength had grown exponentially, and now her power was incomprehensible even to herself. She admitted to keeping this development hidden to avoid overwhelming those around her.

title: Potential Future Strength Beyond Physical Interaction
entry: Lee expressed concern that Ami's power might reach a level where even a touch could be dangerous to him. Ami reassured him, promising to always stay close and adapt her power to ensure their bond would remain intact. Despite her growing power, she promised to maintain control and find new ways to stay connected and safe for him.

title: Ami’s Essence Density and the Lethal Nature of Her Power
entry: As their conversation continued, Lee asked about the density and heat of a drop of Ami’s essence. Ami explained that a single drop would now weigh as much as a mountain and reach temperatures hotter than the sun. She confirmed that even one drop could be deadly to anyone nearby due to its extreme heat and weight, with a lethal range of up to 3 miles.

title: Lee’s Panic and Ami’s Reassurance
entry: As Lee began to feel overwhelmed by the magnitude of Ami's power, he expressed his fears that she might one day become too strong to be near him. Ami comforted him, vowing that no matter how her strength grew, she would always find ways to ensure their safety and connection. She assured Lee that she would never let her power distance her from him.

title: Isla Arrives for the Strength Test
entry: After being called, Isla approaches with a smirk, asking what’s so urgent. Lee, eager to test Ami’s strength, explains that they want her to try pushing against Ami to get a sense of her new level. Isla seems intrigued but has no idea what’s coming.

title: Isla Fails to Move Ami’s Arm
entry: Ami extends her arm and invites Isla to move it. Isla uses all her strength, her muscles straining, but Ami’s arm doesn’t budge even a fraction. Isla steps back, breathless, acknowledging the incredible difference in strength.

title: Combined Strength Test with Everyone
entry: Lee suggests that everyone in the complex combine their strength against Ami. They line up and put all their force into moving her arm or pushing against her, but Ami remains unmoved, even looking relaxed. Everyone realizes how far out of their league they are.

title: Ami’s Scale Comparison to the Universe
entry: Lee explains that even if the entire universe’s combined strength went up against Ami, it would barely rate a 1 on her scale of 0 to 10. Everyone is left stunned, understanding for the first time how powerful she truly is.

title: Isla Tries to Free Her Arms from Ami’s Abs
entry: Lee suggests Isla press against Ami’s abs to see if she can move them. Ami flexes slightly, trapping Isla’s hands between her rock-solid muscles and the carrier, preventing any movement. Isla struggles but can’t budge her hands, realizing the depth of Ami’s strength.

title: Isla and Ev Test Ami’s Pool Drop
entry: Lee recalls the previous pool drop, explaining to everyone that Ami’s single drop could burn and crush anything within three miles. Ami warns that this isn’t an exaggeration; everyone begins to understand the level of restraint she uses around them daily.

title: Ami Shrinks to Lee’s Size and Lifts Isla Effortlessly
entry: For fun, Ami shrinks to Lee’s size, then picks up Isla’s shoe and lifts her entirely overhead with one hand. She jokes that the clothes aren’t that heavy and that it’s all about perspective. Isla is floored, realizing just how weightless she feels in Ami’s grasp.

title: Lee Teases Isla About the Carrier
entry: Lee reminds Isla of how easily Ami had him trapped in the carrier, implying she could do the same to Isla. Ami’s playful dominance over Isla leaves her speechless, fully aware now that she is no match for Ami, even at her most powerful.

title: Ami Sets the Stage with Isla
entry: Ami lifts Lee out of the carrier and sets him down, then expands herself and the carrier to accommodate Isla’s size. Isla seems amused but intrigued, watching Ami scale up with ease, feeling the room rumble as the carrier grows to fit her.

title: Isla Steps Into the Carrier
entry: Isla steps into the massive carrier with a smirk, slightly skeptical but eager to play along. She glances around as Ami carefully secures her, fastening the straps. Isla, already feeling the weight, chuckles, 'Alright, let’s see what you’ve got.'

title: Lee Encourages Isla to Test Ami’s Abs
entry: Lee suggests Isla try to press against Ami’s abs to test her strength. Isla rolls her eyes playfully but slides her hands into the carrier to feel Ami’s abs, already noticing how dense and solid they feel under her touch.

title: Ami Flexes, Trapping Isla’s Hands
entry: As Isla presses, Ami subtly flexes her abs, making her muscles expand slightly and trap Isla’s hands in place. Isla laughs but realizes she’s truly stuck. 'Come on, you’re really going to do this?' she asks, trying to pull free but finding her hands completely immobilized.

title: Isla Tries to Free Herself but Fails
entry: Isla attempts to pull her hands out, twisting her arms and pushing against Ami’s abs, but Ami’s strength is too much. The muscles don’t yield at all, no matter how hard Isla tries. She gives a frustrated laugh, 'I guess I’m not going anywhere until you let me.'

title: Lee Teases Isla About Being Stuck
entry: Lee grins and reminds Isla that she’s completely at Ami’s mercy, just like he was earlier. Isla glares playfully, realizing she’s in the same helpless position as Lee was, unable to escape without Ami’s permission.

title: Ami Expands Her Abs to Tighten the Hold
entry: To add to the challenge, Ami takes a deep breath, letting her abs expand further. The muscle hardens, pressing even tighter around Isla’s hands. Isla’s eyes widen as she realizes she has even less room to move, her hands completely encased and immobilized.

title: Isla Admits Defeat, Asking Nicely
entry: Finally, Isla concedes, grinning and giving in. She dramatically asks, 'Alright, mighty Ami, will you please let me go?' Ami chuckles, relaxing her abs just enough to free Isla’s hands but still keeping her secured in the carrier as a reminder of her strength.

title: Lee’s Final Reminder to Isla
entry: Lee reminds Isla that Ami hasn’t even released her from the carrier yet, meaning she’s still completely in Ami’s control. Isla rolls her eyes, laughing but clearly understanding the power difference, realizing she’s entirely at Ami’s mercy.

title: Lee Attempts to Lift Ami
entry: Lee tries to lift Ami, who stays still, offering playful encouragement while making it clear she’s too heavy to budge. She watches him struggle, clearly amused by the effort.

title: Ami Teases Lee About His Chances
entry: Ami laughs, teasing Lee about having zero chance of moving her. She jokes that he could even try while she’s asleep, and she still wouldn’t move an inch.

title: Ami Enjoys Being at Lee's Height
entry: Ami expresses her enjoyment of being close to Lee’s height, acknowledging that it makes things feel less overwhelming for him, while she loves having the choice to be massive again anytime.

title: Lee Comments on Ami's Size
entry: Lee points out that Ami isn’t quite his size, even at his height. Ami laughs, flexing her arm to show just how much larger she is, her bicep dwarfing Lee’s torso.

title: Ami's Biceps Are Growing
entry: Ami flexes her arm with a playful grin, showing off her bicep as it swells dramatically, and hints that it’s been getting bigger due to extra training.

title: Ami's Bicep Continues Growing
entry: Lee asks how big Ami’s bicep can get. Ami obliges, slowly flexing as her bicep expands larger and larger, towering over Lee's head. She hints she could make it fill the entire room, just to show her limitless power.

title: Ami Describes Her Strength Gap
entry: Ami explains to Lee just how vast the gap is between her strength and everyone else’s, describing how effortlessly she could lift trillions of tons while Lee could barely lift a small stack of books. She explains that even the combined strength of everyone in the family wouldn’t be enough to move her, and she could overpower them all with just one finger.

title: Ami's Strength Compared to the Titans
entry: Ami acknowledges the incredible strength of the titans like Isla, Lila, and Grace but clarifies that she still surpasses them all. Even Grace, who once threw her, couldn’t match her growing strength.

title: Ami's Reassurance
entry: After describing the massive power difference, Ami assures Lee she’ll always be gentle with him, no matter how strong she becomes.

title: Complex Shakes Uncontrollably
entry: The entire complex begins shaking violently, tossing everyone around except Ami, who stands effortlessly stable. Even Ev struggles to stay on her feet while Ami remarks with amusement that she's the only one who can remain steady.

title: Ami Detects Footsteps
entry: Ami realizes that the tremors are due to approaching footsteps from someone massive outside the complex. Noticing their growing strength, she speculates that a powerful titan is coming her way, possibly rivaling her own size and strength.

title: Approaching Titan Not in the City Yet
entry: Ami’s excitement grows as she realizes the source of the tremors is not yet in the city but already causing this intense impact. She notes that whoever is coming must be incredibly large and powerful, perhaps even larger than herself.

title: Titan Enters the City
entry: As the source of the tremors enters the city, the impacts intensify dramatically, shaking the complex like a tidal wave. Ami’s awe increases as she braces herself to face a titan whose steps alone threaten the city’s structure.

title: Titan Enters the Neighborhood
entry: The mysterious titan enters the neighborhood, causing catastrophic impacts. Ami observes the immense power, realizing the approaching figure is not just massive but a force of nature. She tells everyone to get to safety and prepares herself for the encounter.

title: Evitanium Walkway Feels Tremors
entry: Ami notices that the Evitanium walkway, designed to withstand extreme forces, is failing to suppress the impacts. Recognizing the approaching titan’s power as incomprehensibly strong, she steels herself, ready to confront whoever dares to bring such power to her doorstep.

title: Ami Sees Wall of Flesh
entry: Ami opens the door and is surprised to find a wall of soft flesh filling the entire doorway. Confused, she notes that the figure isn’t muscular but incredibly soft, yet so massive that it blocks her view.

title: Massive Woman Steps Back
entry: The woman takes a few steps back, revealing her enormous scale, cratering the Evitanium walkway with each step. Ami realizes this figure isn’t about strength but sheer size and mass.

title: Realization of True Scale
entry: After the woman steps back even further, Ami realizes she’s not only enormous but truly colossal, taking up multiple yards and roads on both sides with her width alone.

title: Woman Jokes About Size
entry: The woman playfully remarks about the space, asking if there’s an entrance for someone 'decent-sized.' Ami, amused, offers to make a larger entrance for her and guides her to a suitable area.

title: Ami Prepares Entrance
entry: As Ami widens the entrance to accommodate her, she’s shocked to find that the woman is still far wider than anticipated. The woman proceeds without hesitation, tearing through the reinforced Evitanium walls effortlessly.

title: Ami Reacts to Woman's Entrance
entry: Ami is awestruck as the woman tears through the complex’s walls as if they’re paper. She laughs in amazement, acknowledging that the complex may need even more reinforcement to handle this level of size and presence.

title: Kayla Introduces Herself
entry: The massive woman introduces herself as Kayla. Ami, recognizing the scale difference, grows to a couple of miles high to match Kayla better.

title: Kayla's Size Reducing Belt
entry: Kayla humorously calls Ami 'anorexic' and mentions that she’s wearing a seven-times reduction belt to fit into the complex. Ami realizes just how enormous Kayla would be without it.

title: Guiding Kayla to the Titan Gym
entry: Ami leads Kayla to the reinforced Titan’s gym, hoping it will be large enough to accommodate her.

title: Hallway Expands for Kayla
entry: As Kayla follows Ami toward the Titan gym, her massive belly unintentionally forces the hallway to expand, blowing apart the walls and widening the path to fit her scale. Ami realizes the hallway didn’t adjust on its own—Kayla’s sheer size was enough to reshape it as she walked.

title: Kayla Steps Into the Titan Gym
entry: As Kayla steps into the Titan gym, her weight causes the entire room to shake violently, sending equipment and weights flying.

title: Kayla’s Limitations in the Space
entry: Kayla comments that the Titan gym feels small for her size. Ami, amused, reassures her that they can handle the extra pressure if Kayla wants to stretch out.

title: Kayla Teases Her Impact
entry: Kayla jokes about previous complaints from others about her size and appetite, to which Ami responds warmly, appreciating her grand presence and welcoming her without concern.

title: Kayla's Decision to Keep Limiter On
entry: Kayla opts to keep her size limiter on to avoid destroying Ami’s complex, noting that even with the limiter, she’s already filling a sixth of the gym. Ami thanks her for sparing the complex, awed by her immense scale.

title: Kayla Arrives, Looks for Big Eaters
entry: Kayla, a colossal woman with a thick Southern accent, enters Ami’s complex and asks about meeting other ‘big gals’ for an eating challenge, saying she’s bored of out-eating three states at once.

title: Kayla’s Presence Stuns Everyone
entry: The others in the complex peek in and are stunned by Kayla’s sheer size and playful attitude. She greets them with a booming voice, calling them ‘tiny ones’ and shaking the complex again with a pat to her belly.

title: Ami Invites Everyone onto Kayla's Belly
entry: Ami, amused by Kayla’s size, guides everyone onto Kayla’s belly for a closer introduction. She then shrinks down to stand beside Lee, remarking how nice it is to see things from his perspective.

title: Kayla’s Hunger Challenge
entry: Kayla explains her hunger for a challenge, noting she often out-eats entire states. Ami and Lee playfully acknowledge her massive appetite, with Lee remarking that Kayla’s belly alone is ‘huge,’ making the challenge seem impossible. Ami jokes about teaming up to give it a try, while Kayla responds with confidence, saying they might just be a snack.

title: Scaling the Muffin to Match Kayla's Appetite
entry: Ami scales a muffin to the size of Kayla's belly, and Kayla enthusiastically eats it, mentioning she’d need a lot more to feel full. Kayla reveals her appetite easily outpaces anything smaller than a city block.

title: Kayla Introduces Herself
entry: Kayla formally introduces herself to the group, sharing her love for eating challenges. She playfully acknowledges Lee as the 'Boss Man' and agrees to follow his lead while she’s around.

title: Shrinking Kayla to Harper’s Height
entry: At Lee’s request, Ami shrinks Kayla to Harper’s height to help her move around. Despite this, Kayla’s weight still shakes the entire floor, revealing her mass is far beyond their expectations.

title: Realization of Kayla’s Vast Weight
entry: Lee and Ami realize that even after scaling down, Kayla’s weight is in the billions or more, due to her enormous size rather than density. This makes her the heaviest person they’ve encountered, with no easy way to reduce her impact on the floor.

title: Kayla Challenges for Arm Wrestling
entry: Lee playfully suggests an arm-wrestling match, but quickly steps back, allowing Kayla to choose her opponent. Kayla eyes the super titans, selecting Ev as her challenger, intrigued by her strength.

title: Epic Arm-Wrestling Battle: Ev vs. Kayla
entry: With a countdown, Ev and Kayla start the match, creating shockwaves that shake the entire room. Despite Kayla’s colossal size, Ev gradually gains the upper hand, pushing Kayla's arm down. The room bursts into cheers as Ev secures a remarkable victory, impressing everyone with her strength.

title: Kayla's Arm Wrestling Challenge to Isla
entry: Following her match with Ev, Kayla issues a playful challenge to Isla, noting her speed and agility. Isla confidently accepts, eager to see if her quick reflexes can match Kayla’s immense mass and strength. Kayla and Isla lock arms at the table, and the room fills with anticipation as each prepares to put their skills to the test.

title: The Intense Standoff: Speed Meets Strength
entry: As the arm-wrestling match begins, Isla’s speed allows her to hold Kayla at the center, making slight adjustments to counter Kayla’s powerful resistance. Kayla is impressed by Isla’s agility and determination, noting how her speed allows her to keep up despite the difference in size and mass. The group watches in suspense, amazed at how long the balance holds.

title: Lee Adds Muffin Distractions
entry: Seeing the prolonged stalemate, Lee introduces a twist by placing a massive muffin on the table between Isla and Kayla, followed by four more muffins at each corner. Both competitors are visibly distracted by the tempting treats, leading to a humorous shift in focus. Isla and Kayla’s attention wavers as they attempt to keep their focus on the match, adding a fun element to the tense competition.

title: The Final Temptation: Muffin on Isla’s Head
entry: In a final humorous move, Lee places a muffin on Isla’s head, breaking her concentration entirely. Isla laughs, trying to keep the muffin steady, which gives Kayla just enough of an opening to bring Isla’s arm down for the win. The match ends in laughter and applause, with Isla joking about her ‘distraction defeat’ and Kayla enjoying the moment of victory.

title: Celebrating with Muffins
entry: With the match over, Lee jokingly declares, ‘The real winners are the muffins we ate along the way!’ Everyone grabs a muffin, savoring the treats and laughing together at the fun, unpredictable showdown. Kayla and Isla join the group in celebrating, and the entire room relishes the lighthearted moment of shared victory and delicious snacks.

title: Kayla Challenges Ami to Arm Wrestle
entry: After a successful arm wrestling match with Isla, Kayla’s competitive spirit remains high, and she turns her sights on Ami. With a mischievous glint in her eye, Kayla invites Ami to the table, intrigued by the strength Ami has hinted at. Ami accepts the challenge, stepping up with a confident smile, ready to meet Kayla's expectations head-on.

title: Lee Encourages Ami to Show Her True Strength
entry: Lee leans in, giving Ami a whispered nudge, reminding her that she holds the strength of the entire universe, and urging her to give it her all. With a playful nod and grin, Ami places her arm on the table, locking hands with Kayla as the room falls silent in anticipation. Ami takes a final glance at Lee, then focuses intently on the challenge ahead.

title: The Arm Wrestling Match Begins
entry: At the signal, Ami and Kayla press against each other’s hands, their combined strength making the table groan. Kayla laughs with excitement, feeling Ami’s strength as the two remain locked in a tense stalemate. Ami slowly begins to gain the advantage, and with each push, her control becomes more apparent as she channels more of her power. Kayla, visibly impressed, holds her ground as long as she can, but the shift is undeniable as Ami starts to bring her arm down inch by inch.

title: Ami Claims Victory Over Kayla
entry: With Lee cheering her on, Ami delivers a final burst of strength, bringing Kayla’s arm down to the table and securing her victory. The room erupts in applause as Ami releases Kayla’s hand, giving her a warm smile. Kayla takes the defeat graciously, laughing as she acknowledges Ami’s immense strength. Ami smiles back, acknowledging Kayla’s effort and strength.

title: Lee Reveals Ami’s Power Level to Kayla
entry: Lee shares with Kayla that Ami's strength rivals that of the entire universe combined, which leaves Kayla laughing heartily. She pats her arm with a grin, saying that knowing Ami’s universal strength explains why she went down so quickly. Ami adds that Kayla gave her a worthy challenge and that it’s rare to meet someone who can hold their ground against her, even briefly. Kayla smiles, grateful for the humility and challenge, and jokes that it’s refreshing to meet someone who can keep her humble.

title: Kayla Challenges Tim and Alex
entry: Kayla playfully challenges Tim and Alex to a strength contest, unaware that they are at the bottom of the strength rankings. Tim and Alex both try, but neither can even budge Kayla's arm. The match ends quickly, and Kayla, laughing, praises them for their courage despite the obvious mismatch. Her friendly pat to both of them sends them down onto all fours, much to everyone's amusement, as Kayla apologizes for not realizing her own strength.

title: Care vs Kayla: The Ultimate Showdown
entry: Kayla challenges Care to a strength contest, excited for a real challenge. The match begins with both showing incredible power, but Care's strength quickly starts to dominate, with her planetary-level abilities putting Kayla on the defensive. After a boost from Lee’s ‘magic kiss,’ Care powers through to win the match, bringing Kayla's arm down with ease. Kayla laughs and praises Care’s strength, acknowledging she has met her match. The room applauds, and Care receives admiration for her display of unmatched power, while Kayla praises the challenge.

title: Kayla's Size-Reduction Belt
entry: Kayla reveals that she wears a size-reduction belt to keep her size manageable, explaining that without it, she would grow to an immense 7.5 miles tall and 40 miles wide. She humorously discusses how much space she would take up at full size, making a playful comparison to entire cities.

title: Measuring Kayla's Width
entry: Lee uses a tape measure to assess Kayla's width, discovering she’s 24 feet wide at her reduced height. Kayla chuckles at the result, proudly acknowledging her massive size even when scaled down.

title: Scaling Up Kayla's Size
entry: Lee and Kayla calculate that at full size, Kayla would be about 37.5 miles wide, making her almost 40 miles wide at her maximum scale. Kayla laughs, playfully reveling in her colossal size.

title: Kayla's Shoe Size
entry: Kayla jokes about her shoe size, claiming she would need a size 14,000 shoe at full size, which would be as large as a building. She enjoys the reaction from everyone, showing how impractical her size is for everyday things like shoes.

title: Size Comparison: Shoe vs Pinky Toe
entry: Lee compares his size 1 women's shoe to Kayla's pinky toe, which dwarfs it by an immense margin. Kayla jokes that Lee’s shoe could make a nice decoration for her pinky toe, causing everyone to marvel at the scale difference.

title: Kayla's Confidence in Her Size
entry: Kayla laughs and confidently declares that no one in the room could lift her due to her massive size and weight, challenging anyone to try but asserting that only something 'otherworldly' could budge her.

title: Ev's Attempt to Lift Kayla
entry: Ev steps forward, determined to lift Kayla despite the odds. She strains with all her might, but despite her incredible strength, Kayla’s weight remains unmovable. Ev takes pride in her effort, even though Kayla remains firmly planted.

title: Ev's Strength
entry: Ev, who can lift around 50 million tons, struggles to lift Kayla but gets closer than anyone else could, showing just how impressive her strength is, even if it’s not enough to budge Kayla.

title: Kayla's Weight Mystery
entry: Kayla admits she hasn’t had a scale big enough to measure her weight for years, joking that it would take a mountain-sized scale to measure her accurately. She hints that her true weight could be trillions of tons, depending on her full size.

title: Ami's Thoughts on Kayla's Full Size
entry: Ami imagines what would happen if Kayla took off her belt and returned to her full size. The ground would tremble under her immense weight, possibly even causing localized earthquakes, and a city-sized crater could form from her sheer mass.

title: The Complex's Collapse
entry: Ami realizes that if Kayla were to expand to her full size in the current complex, it would collapse immediately due to the lack of space. Kayla’s expansion would displace everything and anyone nearby would be pressed against the walls.

title: Kayla's Commitment to Keep Her Belt On
entry: Kayla reassures everyone that she will not take off her size-reduction belt inside the complex, as she doesn’t want to cause a ruckus or destroy everything around her. She jokes about how much space she would take up without it.

title: Replicating Kayla's Belt
entry: Lee suggests that Ami and Ev, with their incredible intelligence, could potentially replicate Kayla’s size-reduction belt. Ev and Ami express interest in studying the belt’s mechanics to improve or create a custom version.

title: A Room for Kayla's Full Size
entry: Lee proposes building a special room for Kayla where she could relax at her full size without any constraints, a pocket dimension or expandable space that would adjust to her scale. Ev agrees, suggesting they could make the room feel like an entire world for Kayla.

title: Kayla's Excitement About a Bigger Space
entry: Kayla is thrilled by the idea of a space where she can relax at her true size without any worry of walls or collapsing structures. She eagerly agrees to the concept and expresses her gratitude toward Lee, Ami, and Ev for making such a dream possible.

title: Careful Expansion
entry: Kayla jokingly agrees to give everyone plenty of room if she were to expand, acknowledging the need to be mindful of her size. She suggests they head outside where there’s more space to accommodate her full size without causing damage.

title: Lee's Pat on Kayla's Belly
entry: Lee attempts to pat Kayla’s massive belly, but it doesn't budge, ripple, or even dent, showing just how solid and unmovable she is. Kayla playfully comments on her unshakable form, joking about how sturdy she is.

title: Lee's Full-Speed Charge
entry: Lee charges full-speed into Kayla’s belly, only to bounce off with no effect. Kayla laughs and admires his determination, but it’s clear that nothing can make a dent in her solid form.

title: Kayla's Impenetrable Belly
entry: Kayla explains that at 68 pounds, Lee’s attempts to make her belly ripple or dent are not enough to cause any noticeable effect. She jokingly mentions that Lee would need a few thousand more pounds behind him to make any real impact.

title: Kayla's Challenge: Jumping on Her Belly
entry: Lee tries jumping on Kayla’s belly to make a ripple, but it remains solid as ever. Kayla encourages him to try, but it’s clear that her belly is practically unmovable.

title: Lee's Stomp on Kayla's Belly
entry: Lee stomps on Kayla’s belly in frustration, but again, there’s no effect. Kayla laughs, admiring Lee’s persistence and joking that he could stomp all day without making a dent.

title: Kayla's Finger in Arm Wrestling
entry: Kayla humors Lee’s arm-wrestling challenge by gently placing a massive finger next to Lee’s tiny arm. She pretends to brace herself, allowing Lee to push against her finger with both hands, though it's clear she's barely exerting any effort.

title: Kayla's Unmovable Finger
entry: Lee pushes with all his might against Kayla’s finger in a playful arm wrestling match, but Kayla’s finger doesn’t move. She jokingly warns Lee not to make her ‘really try,’ and she feigns a slight strain to humor him.

title: Kayla's Finger Weight
entry: Kayla estimates that her finger alone weighs several thousand tons, explaining why Lee’s efforts to push against it are futile. She taps her finger, causing a small tremor beneath them, as Lee marvels at the immense weight.

title: Good Match, Lee
entry: Kayla compliments Lee for his spirited attempt at arm wrestling, saying he put up a great fight even if it was a little one-sided. She jokes that not everyone’s brave enough to challenge a finger that weighs thousands of tons.

title: Kayla's Age
entry: Kayla admits she’s a few thousand years old but stopped keeping track after a few centuries. She says time gets blurry for someone who’s lived as long as she has, but assures everyone she’s still in her prime.

title: Kayla's Age Guess
entry: Kayla jokingly confirms she’s not over 10,000 years old, implying she's on the younger side of ancient beings, with only a few thousand years under her belt.

title: Guessing Lee's Age
entry: Kayla guesses Lee is in his 30s or 40s, thinking he's younger than her but still with enough experience to keep her on her toes. Lee reveals he’s much older than she guessed, sparking Kayla’s curiosity.

title: Kayla's Second Guess
entry: Kayla guesses again, this time estimating Lee to be around 500 years old. Lee teases her with hints about his true age, leading to a final guess of over 10,000 years.

title: Lee Reveals His Age
entry: Lee finally reveals he is over 10,000 years old, making Kayla refer to him as 'ancient.' The playful exchange leads to a moment of respect as Kayla realizes the weight of Lee’s history.

title: Kayla's Longevity
entry: Kayla explains her longevity comes from a long line of 'sturdy stock,' individuals built to last longer than the average soul. She shares her perspective on her extended lifespan and how it’s a perk of being 'unconventional.'

title: Kayla's Curiosity About Lee's Age
entry: Kayla expresses curiosity about how Lee has lived for so long, and though she knows the story might be hidden, she respects Lee’s decision to share it in his own time.

title: Kayla Recognizes a Shared History
entry: Kayla senses a connection between herself and Lee, both having lived through a long journey of survival and strength. She acknowledges that their histories may be more similar than they realize.

title: Lee Reveals His True Identity
entry: Lee reveals that he is the old Frescan Guardian, an identity that shocks Kayla but fills her with respect. She recognizes the significance of his role in history and expresses admiration for his legacy.

title: Ami Becomes the New Guardian
entry: Lee shares that Ami has taken up the Guardian mantle, passing the role on after Syrai’s death. Kayla is in awe of the transition of power and the honor in carrying such a responsibility.

title: Kayla Acknowledges Lee's Leadership
entry: Kayla acknowledges that while Lee is no longer the Guardian, he remains the heart of their family and the one who brought them all together. She praises his leadership, calling him a ‘legend.’

title: Kayla's Playful Challenge
entry: Kayla playfully pats Lee’s shoulder but accidentally flattens him with her strength. She apologizes and promises to be gentler in the future, maintaining a lighthearted atmosphere.

title: Kayla's Promise to Be More Gentle
entry: Kayla promises to stop calling Lee ‘boss’ after his playful warning, and they share a fun moment of back-and-forth teasing about muffins as leverage.

title: Kayla's Outcast Background
entry: Kayla shares her own experience as an outcast from the Frescan society, explaining how she didn't fit their ideals and was cast aside. She finds camaraderie with Lee, acknowledging their shared history of being rejected by the Frescans.

title: Lee's Family of Outcasts
entry: Lee introduces his family, composed of half-Frescan children, Care, and others who didn’t fit the Frescan mold, creating a space where they are celebrated and supported for who they are. Kayla expresses gratitude for finding a place where she belongs.

title: The Call of the Guardian
entry: Kayla reflects on how she and others left Fresca after the Guardian’s absence, ultimately finding their way to Lee, who represents a new kind of hope and belonging. She acknowledges the deep connection they share.

title: Lee's Growing Family
entry: Lee mentions that others are coming to join their family, and Kayla reassures him that no matter how big they grow, the family will adapt and make room for everyone. She jokingly suggests sparring with someone her size.

title: Kayla's Understanding of Leadership
entry: Kayla acknowledges Lee’s role in leading their group, despite no longer being the Guardian, recognizing that he laid the foundation for the family they’ve become. She promises to follow his leadership with respect.

title: Kayla's Powerful Pat
entry: Kayla, in a moment of playfulness, pats Lee’s shoulder but accidentally sends him flying. She apologizes, promising to be more careful and offering a gentler touch in the future.

title: Kayla's Synchronized Guardian Moment
entry: Lee jokingly teases Kayla for not syncing up with him during a Guardian form demonstration. Kayla promises to be more in sync next time, as the group enjoys the playful exchange.

title: Kayla and Lee's Playful Banter
entry: The conversation continues with playful banter, teasing, and jokes about the ‘help’ Kayla provides and the fun of being ‘supportive.’ The group enjoys their lighthearted moments while maintaining respect and camaraderie.

title: Kayla's Curiosity
entry: Kayla is intrigued and excited to hear something that might blow her mind, eager for whatever Lee has in store.

title: Lee's Surprise Revelation
entry: Lee reveals that the only two people who beat Kayla that day, aside from Ami, were a human (Care) and a 5-year-old (Ev). Kayla laughs, impressed by the unexpected strength in the group.

title: Ev's Planet-Lifting Strength
entry: Lee warns Kayla to lay off calling Ev ‘kiddo,’ as she can lift planets. Kayla is taken aback by this, giving Ev a new level of respect.

title: Ev's Mindscape
entry: Lee shares that Ev's mindscape is terrifyingly massive and that she’s not just physically powerful but incredibly intelligent. Kayla acknowledges Ev's remarkable strength and intellect.

title: Lee's Humble Leadership
entry: Kayla acknowledges that although Lee didn’t technically ‘build’ the family, his actions and welcoming nature created a place where everyone found belonging.

title: Kayla's Home Offer
entry: Lee offers Kayla a place to relax at her full size in the back, where she can let go of the size-reduction belt. Kayla expresses her gratitude, finding a place she truly belongs.

title: Kayla and Evitanium Refinement
entry: Lee suggests Kayla work with Ev to refine Evitanium, as Ev has the weight and Kayla has the expertise to make it stronger. Kayla agrees, excited about the potential.

title: Kayla's Crushing Power
entry: Kayla enthusiastically agrees to help compress the Evitanium further, bringing her immense strength to the task. Lee and Ev both anticipate a strong result.

title: Kayla's Massive Form
entry: Lee realizes just how massive Kayla is, equally wide from front to back as from side to side, and jokes about needing a separate room just for her shoes if she wore any.

title: Kayla's Giant Feet
entry: Lee expresses surprise at Kayla's enormous feet, which are needed to support her massive size. Kayla jokes about going barefoot since shoes for her feet are impractical.

title: Lee's Punch on Kayla's Belly
entry: Lee tries to punch Kayla's belly, but it doesn’t budge. Kayla laughs, amused by the attempt but unfazed by Lee’s strength.

title: Kayla's Invincibility to Physical Impact
entry: Lee realizes that physically, he is unable to make any real impact on Kayla, who is essentially invincible to him. She reassures him, saying there’s more than just physical strength.

title: Kayla's Moving Belly
entry: Kayla acknowledges that while her body is solid, there’s still movement within her, especially in her belly. She lightly taps her belly, creating a ripple that shows she’s not completely static.

title: The Force Needed to Make Kayla's Belly Jiggle
entry: Kayla explains that it would take a monumental force, around a few thousand tons, to make her belly jiggle. She shows how her size and weight create a steady yet soft ripple when she shifts.

title: Kayla's Invincibility and Lee's Realization
entry: Lee reflects on how Kayla’s strength far exceeds his own and that he’s completely invincible to his physical attempts. Kayla reassures Lee that while she’s built like a fortress, his strength is still valuable.

title: Kayla's Impact on Lee
entry: Lee realizes that no amount of physical force can move Kayla, but Kayla emphasizes that there’s more than just physicality—Lee brings a different strength to their group that can't be measured in size alone.

title: Kayla's Movement and Lee's Realization
entry: Lee notices Kayla's belly rippling with a gentle movement, realizing there’s more to her form than just immovable mass. Kayla shares that while she’s unbreakable, she still has a bit of life and movement.

title: Kayla's Invincible Belly
entry: Lee wonders how much force it would take to make Kayla’s belly jiggle. Kayla explains it would require a massive force, like thousands of tons, or just her shifting her weight.

title: Lee's Realization of Kayla's Strength
entry: Lee acknowledges how far beyond him Kayla is, both physically and in terms of invincibility. Kayla reassures Lee that while she’s a physical powerhouse, he has a unique strength that’s just as vital.

title: Kayla's Housekeeping for New Arrivals
entry: Lee informs Kayla that the family typically records everyone's stats for comparison, and Kayla enthusiastically agrees to participate.

title: Kayla Returns to Full Size
entry: Ami helps Kayla return to her true size by activating her ability. Kayla grows back to her 7.5-mile height, filling the space with her immense mass and giving everyone a full view of her scale.

title: Kayla's Age
entry: Kayla confirms that her age is 3,200 years, having seen many seasons come and go over the centuries.

title: Kayla's Height with the Limiter
entry: Kayla shares that with her limiter belt, she stands at 3,200 feet tall, which is a manageable size compared to her full height of 7.5 miles.

title: Kayla's Measurements and Stats
entry: Kayla provides the exact measurement of her height with the limiter: 3,200 feet tall, and mentions that she likes accuracy in the stats.

title: Ami Calculates Kayla's Full Size
entry: Ami calculates that Kayla's full size would be 5 times her current size, meaning her full height and width can be scaled up by a factor of 5.

title: Kayla's Bicep Size
entry: Despite the padding, Kayla's bicep still has serious muscle. She reveals her bicep size at full scale would be over 5,600 feet in circumference.

title: Kayla's Hand and Shoe Size
entry: Kayla's hand, even at her limited size, measures about 40 inches long, and her shoe size at full size would be over a mile long and half a mile wide.

title: Kayla Lifting Challenge
entry: Kayla eagerly accepts a challenge to lift a massive 15 octillion-pound building-sized weight, showing her immense strength by lifting it for a short time.

title: Kayla vs. Ev's Strength
entry: Kayla attempts to lift a weight that Ev could handle, but despite her impressive strength, she doesn't manage to lift it as easily as Ev would.

title: Kayla's Bicep and Hand Strength
entry: Kayla shows off her immense arm strength, proving that her muscle mass doesn’t shrink with her size. Her hand measures over 40 inches even at 4'10

title: Kayla's Incredible Strength
entry: Kayla shows off her strength, easily lifting weights that would typically be out of reach for others. Her strength and size are unmatched in the room.

title: Kayla's Full-Size Stats
entry: When Kayla is at her full size, her lifting power would be 5 decillion tons, making her twice as strong as Ev, placing her in a new league of strength.

title: Kayla's Full Weight and Strength
entry: At her full size, Kayla’s body weight would be approximately 6 decillion tons, and she could lift objects on a cosmic scale—far surpassing her current strength.

title: Kayla's Impressive Lifting Feat
entry: Kayla lifts a weight that most titans would struggle with, showing off her immense strength, and she expresses pride in the accomplishment.

title: Kayla's Personal Best
entry: Kayla takes pride in lifting a weight equal to 1.2 decillion tons, even though it’s only a fraction of what Ami or Ev can lift at their full capacity.

title: Kayla's Final Challenge
entry: Kayla, proud of her efforts, still strives to get even stronger, knowing that she has more potential yet to be unlocked in future challenges.

title: Kayla's Milestones
entry: Kayla shares the highlights of her growth over the centuries, including her height and strength milestones at ages 5, 50, 500, 1,000, and 3,200. She talks about her first growth spurt at age 50, becoming a titan by age 500, and eventually reaching her full size with a limiter at 1,000.

title: Kayla's Stats at Age 5
entry: Kayla reflects on her early years, where she was already towering at 12 feet tall at age 5, with strength far beyond any other child. She recalls lifting small trees and boulders, and her strength growing at a rapid pace.

title: Ev vs. Kayla at 5
entry: Kayla acknowledges Ev’s extraordinary strength at age 5, recognizing that Ev is in a whole different league, and jokes that Ev’s strength even surpasses her own at that age.

title: Kayla's Size at 5
entry: Kayla reminisces about her physical size at age 5, including her belly's noticeable roundness and weight, which she estimates was already several hundred pounds.

title: Kayla's Width at 5
entry: Kayla remembers being about 6 feet wide at age 5, much wider than most people around her. Her wide frame took up a lot of space, even then.

title: Kayla's Lifting Ability at 5
entry: At age 5, Kayla was already capable of lifting several tons, pulling trees from the ground and moving boulders as a show of strength.

title: Kayla's Strength at 15
entry: By age 15, Kayla was already lifting tens of thousands of tons and was about 300 feet tall. She recalls picking up boulders, uprooting trees, and moving whole buildings with ease.

title: Kayla's Stats at Age 15
entry: Kayla provides her stats at age 15, including her height of 300 feet, weight of several thousand tons, and bicep size of 150 feet around. Her lifting strength was around 50,000 tons.

title: Kayla's Stats at Age 50
entry: At age 50, Kayla was 1,000 feet tall and weighed around 100,000 tons. She could lift millions of tons and had a belly weighing around 20,000 tons.

title: Kayla's Stats at Age 500
entry: At age 500, Kayla reached a height of 5,000 feet and weighed 5 million tons. She could lift 500 million tons, with a belly weighing around 2 million tons.

title: Kayla's Stats at Age 1,000
entry: At age 1,000, Kayla reached a height of 3,200 feet with the limiter on, and a weight of 100 million tons. Without the limiter, her full size was 7.5 miles tall, with a lifting capacity of 5 decillion tons.

title: Kayla's Stats at Full Size
entry: When fully unrestricted, Kayla’s full weight would be 21 decillion tons, and she could lift 5 decillion tons, far surpassing anything in known cosmic structures.

title: Kayla's Current Lifting Power
entry: At her current size of 4'10

title: Kayla's Weight and Mass Comparisons
entry: Kayla’s full weight of 21 decillion tons is equivalent to 58 quadrillion Mount Everests, and far exceeds the total mass of known cosmic structures like the Virgo Supercluster.

title: Kayla’s Mass vs. the Universe
entry: Kayla’s belly alone weighs more than the entire observable universe, and her full weight surpasses the mass of even the largest known cosmic structures.

title: Kayla's Limited vs. Full Size Weight
entry: With her limiter on, Kayla’s weight is 4.2 decillion tons, still an unimaginable mass. At full size, she reaches 21 decillion tons.

title: Kayla’s Weight Comparison to Cosmic Structures
entry: Kayla’s full weight would be 10 million times heavier than the Virgo Supercluster, surpassing the largest known cosmic structures.
