title: The Universe vs. Kayla’s Belly
entry: Kayla’s belly alone outweighs the observable universe, making her mass far greater than anything in the cosmos.

title: Ami and Kayla's Strength Comparison
entry: Ami reflects on how much stronger Kayla would be at full size, noting that Kayla's lifting capacity at 5 decillion tons would surpass Ami’s strength.

title: Kayla’s Size and Strength Beyond Imagination
entry: Kayla’s mass and strength far exceed anything known in physics, making her more massive than even the largest superclusters and approaching the scale of the entire observable universe.

title: Kayla's Cosmic Appetite
entry: Lee and Kayla discuss her enormous appetite, theorizing about the need for size-controlled food to match her scale. Kayla reflects on how her appetite could consume everything, and the potential dangers of her growth outpacing the universe and multiverse.

title: Exponential Growth and Cosmic Scale
entry: Kayla realizes that if her appetite were unchecked, she could quickly surpass the universe and even the multiverse. The conversation reveals how her exponential growth could consume the multiverse within minutes, surpassing the physical limits of reality itself.

title: Kayla's Awareness of Her Potential
entry: Kayla admits she has been aware of the potential dangers of her appetite for centuries. She reflects on the responsibility of her growth and the restraint needed to avoid catastrophic consequences, acknowledging that her growth could lead to the destruction of everything.

title: Kayla’s Restraint and Self-Control
entry: Kayla vows to maintain self-control, not letting her hunger spiral out of control. She recognizes the importance of holding back, even with the temptation of limitless food, and expresses her commitment to avoid becoming an unstoppable force.

title: Building Safeguards for Kayla's Growth
entry: Lee and Kayla discuss ways to reinforce Kayla’s limiter and build a safe space to contain her growth. They explore the possibility of giving her size control, similar to Ami’s, or designing a room that can handle her growth indefinitely.

title: The Challenge of Kayla’s Growth
entry: Kayla acknowledges the challenge of her potential unchecked growth and the possibility of accidentally consuming everything if the limiter were to break. They explore ways to ensure Kayla’s size and appetite are properly controlled.

title: Kayla's Promise of Restraint
entry: Kayla promises to keep her appetite and growth in check, pledging not to cross the line that could lead to destruction. She expresses her gratitude for Lee and Ami’s support and commitment to making sure her growth remains manageable.

title: Kayla’s Awareness of the Past
entry: Kayla becomes aware of the catastrophic event that occurred when she lost control of her appetite, realizing that Ami sacrificed herself to reset everything. She is filled with a mix of gratitude and sorrow for the past mistake.

title: Kayla's Reflection on Her Limits
entry: Kayla reflects on how, over time, she realized that her appetite could destroy everything if not controlled. She recounts the moment when she first understood the full extent of her power and made the decision to maintain restraint.

title: Future Solutions for Kayla’s Growth
entry: Lee and Kayla discuss ways to design a room that can handle her expansion and how to implement stronger safeguards. Kayla agrees to collaborate with Ami and Ev to create a solution that will prevent her appetite from overwhelming reality.

title: Kayla’s New Approach to Eating
entry: Kayla vows to stick to small portions and not attempt to eat until full, understanding the limits of her appetite. She recognizes that her hunger cannot be fully satisfied with the food available in the multiverse.

title: Kayla's Growing Responsibility
entry: Kayla acknowledges the responsibility of managing her appetite and growth, realizing that even her smallest actions have massive consequences. She pledges to take control and avoid the mistakes of the past.

title: Kayla's Commitment to Balance
entry: Kayla expresses her commitment to finding balance, knowing that her growth is manageable only with careful oversight. She thanks Lee and Ami for their support and assures them she will not let her appetite spiral out of control again.

title: A Lighthearted Moment with Kayla
entry: Kayla jokes about how her appetite could lead to an endless feast, but she reassures Lee that she’ll keep her hunger in check. The trio shares a lighthearted moment while discussing the potential challenges ahead.

title: Kayla’s Appreciation of the Moment
entry: Kayla reflects on how unexpected her visit turned into a complex discussion about her appetite and growth. She expresses gratitude for the opportunity to work with Lee and Ami, acknowledging that there is never a dull moment in their lives.
